['', 'Strong professional experience creating production RESTful web services', 'Python expertise', 'Strong professional experience creating production RESTful web servicesProfessional Amazon Web Services (AWS) experiencePython expertiseStrong SQL experience and database performanceStrong critical thinking and analytical skillsOutgoing personality and the willingness to take initiative to complete challenging workExcellent communication (verbal and written) skills', 'Outgoing personality and the willingness to take initiative to complete challenging work', 'StaffQuest is searching for a Data Engineer with Python and cloud experience that is passionate about machine learning and AI. This is a Full Time (FTE) opportunity with a small, high growth SaaS team supporting the healthcare industry. You will be responsible for collaborating with a cross functional team comprised of highly skilled designers / front end developers, product managers and data scientists. The back end data engineer will take accountability and ownership of the code base and produce design documents as well as automation friendly code. You will also perform design and code reviews, resolve production issues and ensure service is running smoothly at all times. We are seeking candidates with a passion for technology that will have a positive impact on the team and are natural leaders willing to share their knowledge base for the betterment of the team.', 'Strong SQL experience and database performance', 'Excellent communication (verbal and written) skills', 'Requirements', 'Professional Amazon Web Services (AWS) experience', 'Strong critical thinking and analytical skills']

['', 'Technically respected by the other members of the Platform team', 'Solid understanding of concurrency and distributed systems', 'Quantifind is a data science technology company whose AI platform uncovers signals of risk across disparate and unstructured text sources. In financial crimes risk management, Quantifind’s solution uniquely combines internal financial institution data with public domain data to assess risk in the context of Know Your Customer (KYC), Customer Due Diligence (CDD), Fraud Risk Management, and Anti-Money Laundering (AML) processes. Today these compliance processes are burdened by ever-increasing regulatory responsibilities and an expectation of frictionless transactions. You are constantly being proactive in finding new ways to improve the design, performance, and testing of the software that you build. You can effectively juggle immediate competing priorities while taking the long view to figure out how to build a bigger and better company and culture. You value the security of a company with a proven business model and enjoy the opportunities a startup offers.', 'Quantifind is seeking a Data Engineer for our Platform team in Menlo Park, California, or Atlanta, Georgia. Quantifind is operating fully remote for the foreseeable future, but we envision an eventual return to work that includes regular in-person touchpoints and shared office space. ['', 'About the Team', "As a member of our Software/Data Engineering Group, we look first and foremost for people who are passionate around solving business problems through innovation and engineering practices. You'll be required to apply your depth of knowledge and expertise to all aspects of the software development lifecycle, as well as partner continuously with your many stakeholders on a daily basis to stay focused on common goals. We embrace a culture of experimentation and constantly strive for improvement and learning. You’ll work in a collaborative, trusting, thought-provoking environment—one that encourages diversity of thought and creative solutions that are in the best interests of our customers globally.", 'Advanced knowledge of application, data, and infrastructure architecture disciplines', 'Create data tools for analytics and data scientist team members that assist them in building and optimizing our product into an innovative industry leader.', 'Experience with relational SQL and NoSQL databases, including Postgres and Cassandra.', 'Experience building and optimizing ‘big data’ data pipelines, architectures and data sets.', 'We are looking for a candidate with 5+ years of experience in a Data Engineer role, who has a Graduate degree in Computer Science, Information Systems or equivalent degree. They should also have experience using the following software/tools:', 'A successful history of manipulating, processing and extracting value from large disconnected datasets.', 'Experience performing root cause analysis on internal and external data and processes to answer specific business questions and identify opportunities for improvement.', 'Understanding of software skills such as business analysis, development, maintenance, and software improvement', 'Our Corporate Technology team relies on smart, driven people like you to develop applications and provide tech support for all our corporate functions across our network. Your efforts will touch lives all over the financial spectrum and across all our divisions: Global Finance, Corporate Treasury, Risk Management, Human Resources, Compliance, Legal, and within the Corporate Administrative Office. You’ll be part of a team specifically built to meet and exceed our evolving technology needs, as well as our technology controls agenda.', 'BS/BA degree or equivalent experience', 'Strong analytic skills related to working with unstructured datasets.', 'Experience with AWS cloud services: EC2, EMR, RDS, Redshift', 'Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability, etc.', 'We recognize that our people are our strength and the diverse talents they bring to our global workforce are directly linked to our success. ['', 'Help architect, build, and scale our initial data engineering platform, with an eye on security and privacy.', "You have professional experience working with modern data storage and processing technologies, and you've wrangled enough data to understand how often the complex systems that produce data can go wrong.", " Help architect, build, and scale our initial data engineering platform, with an eye on security and privacy. Work closely with the rest of engineering, as well as other stakeholders from our growth, sales, marketing, and product teams, to understand the data needs of the business and produce systems that enable better product and growth decision-making. Work on the data collection pipeline across the entire stack, from client-side event logging to ETL. Systems you'll touch may include data warehousing using MPP databases (e.g. RedShift or Vertica), workflow systems (e.g. Airflow or Luigi), streaming data processors (Kinesis, Kafka, etc.), and distributed data processing systems (Spark, Hadoop, etc.). Ensure that our business-critical data is accurate and correct. ", "Work on the data collection pipeline across the entire stack, from client-side event logging to ETL. Systems you'll touch may include data warehousing using MPP databases (e.g. RedShift or Vertica), workflow systems (e.g. Airflow or Luigi), streaming data processors (Kinesis, Kafka, etc.), and distributed data processing systems (Spark, Hadoop, etc.).", 'Ensure that our business-critical data is accurate and correct.', " You're passionate and thoughtful about building systems that enhance human understanding. You have professional experience working with modern data storage and processing technologies, and you've wrangled enough data to understand how often the complex systems that produce data can go wrong. You can write clear, correct code in at least one programming language, and are willing to become effective in others as needed to get your job done. You communicate with clarity and precision in written form; experience communicating with graphs and plots, or at least understanding how to enable other people to do this, is a big bonus. You may have experience administering modern large-scale data management systems such as ELK.", 'Who You Are', "What You'll Do", 'You may have experience administering modern large-scale data management systems such as ELK.', 'You communicate with clarity and precision in written form; experience communicating with graphs and plots, or at least understanding how to enable other people to do this, is a big bonus.', 'You can write clear, correct code in at least one programming language, and are willing to become effective in others as needed to get your job done.', 'Work closely with the rest of engineering, as well as other stakeholders from our growth, sales, marketing, and product teams, to understand the data needs of the business and produce systems that enable better product and growth decision-making.', "You're passionate and thoughtful about building systems that enhance human understanding."]

['', "As an Astronomer Data Engineer on our team,  you will grow to have a deep understanding of both Apache Airflow and Astronomer as you work with organizations ranging from seed stage startups to Fortune 50 enterprises.  You'll hone your expertise in Data Pipeline Engineering and be able to speak to, and deliver solutions, around Apache Airflow and the Astronomer platform. You'll interact with customers and partners to ensure their success.  You'll be a trusted advisor and help solve data pipelining challenges across all types of environments and use cases. Last but not least, you’ll have the opportunity to engage with the Apache Airflow project, a thriving open source community with 1000s of contributors.", 'A strong candidate:', 'Experience with Apache Airflow', 'Eager to get in the weeds of a technical challenge', 'We are a Remote company and this position can be remote within the US.', '2+  years of industry experience as a Data Engineer building production data pipelinesExperience with Apache AirflowA strong verbal and written communicatorEager to get in the weeds of a technical challengeExperience writing PythonExperienced with cloud infrastructure (Kubernetes, Docker, Terraform)', '2+  years of industry experience as a Data Engineer building production data pipelines', 'A strong verbal and written communicator', 'Experience writing Python', 'Experienced with cloud infrastructure (Kubernetes, Docker, Terraform)', 'Astronomer is the commercial developer of Apache Airflow, a community-driven open-source tool that’s leading the market in data orchestration. We’re a globally-distributed and rapidly growing venture-backed team of learners, innovators and collaborators. Our mission is to build an Enterprise-grade product that makes it easy for data teams at Fortune 500’s and startups alike to adopt Apache Airflow. As a member of our team, you will be at the forefront of the industry as we strive to make Apache Airflow the de-facto standard in data orchestration.', 'At Astronomer, we value diversity. We are an equal opportunity employer: we do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.\xa0\xa0Astronomer is a remote-first company.']

['', 'Responsibilities', 'Requirements', 'Ok, How About a Few Specific', 'Benefits', 'Data Science Engineer Requirements Are', ' Contribute to the development of the ML capabilities for the Nomi Health Develop and implement data models to guide business decisions Mapping data sources, including descriptions of the business meaning of the data, its uses, its quality, the applications that maintain it and the database technology in which it is stored. Documentation of a data source must describe the semantics of the data so that the occasional subtle differences in meaning are understood. Documenting interfaces and data movement by recording how mapped data is moved around the virtual enterprise. This includes the frequency of movement, the source and destination of each step, how the data is transformed as it moves, and any aggregation or calculations. Designing the movement of data through the enterprise, including sources of data and how the data is moved around in order to be improved. Defining integrative views of data to draw together data from across the enterprise. Some views will use a database of extracted data and others will bring together data in near real time, considering data currency, availability, response times and data volumes. Designing canonical data views to limit technical debt as data flows from point-to-point transformation. Defining technical standards and guidelines. Assess and document when and how to use the architected producers and consumers, the technologies to be used for various purposes, and models of selected entities, objects and processes. The guidelines should encourage reuse of existing data stores, as well as address issues of security, timeliness and quality. Investigate and participate in emerging technologies and new release Proofs of Concept (PoCs). Leveraging existing [core] data assets. Managing related metadata to include business descriptions of the data, details of any calculations or summaries, descriptions of the sources of the data, and indications of data quality and currency. Communicating the data architecture across the enterprise. Ensuring a focus on data quality by working effectively with data stewards so they can understand data semantics and identify opportunities for improving data quality.']

['', "Don't meet all of the requirements? That's okay! Feel free to submit your resume and our team will be in touch if there's a match.\xa0", 'Participate in the redesign of the data pipeline', 'Experience with data streaming applications and streaming technologies', 'Experience working with big data technologies: EMR/Hadoop, Spark, Spark Streaming, Kafka, Kinesis, Flink, etc.', 'Participate in the redesign of the data pipelineDevelop and release new pipeline capabilities\xa0Provide maintenance and support of the current pipelineExamine the pipeline data and transformations to optimize the efficiency and quality of the data, resolve data quality issues, and provide direction and support to correct identified issuesWrite test plansTake ownership of assigned tasks and relentlessly drive them to completion\xa0Review code changes', 'Holler is an AI powered content engine that helps people discover the perfect sticker or GIF in messaging apps. We also consider qualified applicants with criminal histories, consistent with applicable federal, state and local law. Holler is committed to providing reasonable accommodations for candidates with disabilities in our recruiting process. If you need any assistance or accommodations due to a disability, please let us know.', 'At least 5 years of experience in applications development with a concentration on applications that process data and address data qualityExperience with data streaming applications and streaming technologiesProficient with Scala, Python or GOExperience working with big data technologies: EMR/Hadoop, Spark, Spark Streaming, Kafka, Kinesis, Flink, etc.Experience with database technologies, RedShift, Hive, Impala, Cassandra, relational databases and no-sql databasesExperience with or exposure to large scale data storage technologies; ElasticSearch, RedisAbility to break down large requests into sub-tasks and provide higher-level status updates', "This individual will provide maintenance and support for the current pipeline, and will also play a key role in the new architecture, design, and development of the future pipeline. In addition, the Big Data Engineer will have a significant role in restructuring our data lake and data stores.\xa0Holler's pipeline data is used in daily reporting and is a crucial tool for the data science team in the creation and training of models.", 'Take ownership of assigned tasks and relentlessly drive them to completion\xa0', 'Proficient with Scala, Python or GO', 'Experience with database technologies, RedShift, Hive, Impala, Cassandra, relational databases and no-sql databases', 'Develop and release new pipeline capabilities\xa0', 'Provide maintenance and support of the current pipeline', 'Examine the pipeline data and transformations to optimize the efficiency and quality of the data, resolve data quality issues, and provide direction and support to correct identified issues', 'Requirements:']

Every day, around the globe, our imprints, books, journals, platforms and technology solutions reach millions of people. For over 175 years our brands and imprints have been a trusted source of knowledge to these communities and today, more than ever, we see it as our responsibility to ensure that fundamental knowledge can be found, verified, understood and used by our communities – enabling them to improve outcomes, make progress, and benefit the generations that follow. ['Overview', "MUST BE US CITIZEN, NO C2C** We are the world's leading live streaming platform for gamers and the things we love. We make it possible to watch, play and chat with millions of other fans from around the world. We are looking for a Data Engineer to join our team ASAP! If you have 3+ years of experience in Data Engineering along with Python and SQL, we want to speak to you! For this role, we’re looking for a data engineer to join the Creator Analytics team: Responsibilities Build ETL pipelines between our Salesforce instance and our data warehouse  Maintain a high level of trust in these data sets: keep existing data sources fresh against changing requirements, definitions, and data quality issues.  Improve reliability and performance: Conduct unit, integration, and system tests on our data sources in order to validate data against source systems, and continuously optimize performance in order to improve query speed and reduce cost. ['', 'Job Title: \xa0Data Analyst', 'Description:\xa0Apple is interested in an eCommerce data and operations engineer to help build new eCommerce data processes and operations for various internal and external projects. Candidates with experience in eCommerce catalogs, assortment data, pricing, eCommerce content data sets, or large-scale content publishing processes are ideal. Their comprehensive capabilities include electrical & lighting, energy solutions, facilities engineering, HVAC & mechanical, janitorial, landscape & turf, mission critical solutions and parking, provided through stand-alone or integrated solutions.', 'Track inventory of critical spare parts to ensure adequate stock is always maintained.', 'Adhere to Standard Operating Procedures and safety procedure and ensure compliance by vendors, customers, and other parties.', 'Coordinate development of and/or maintain as-built drawings and other building documentation.', 'Holds an understanding of computer systems, and is skilled with Microsoft Office products.', 'Has strong HVAC, mechanical, and electrical skills and experience.', "Has an associate's degree (AA/AS) or an equivalent combination of education and experience; data center experience is strongly preferred.Has a\xa0trade license or certification acquired through technical education/training.Has a\xa0facilities maintenance certification.Has experience working with mission-critical data equipment, and the willingness to work in a fast-paced, mission-critical environment.Has strong HVAC, mechanical, and electrical skills and experience.Holds an understanding of computer systems, and is skilled with Microsoft Office products.Has strong verbal and written communication skills."]

job_text: ['', '- Experience with data warehousing and data integration tools, demonstrable proficiency in Python coding, and passion to build', '- 3+ years’ experience in a data engineering role', 'BS in Math, Statistics, Data Science, Computer Science, Engineering, or Economics', '- Advanced working SQL knowledge and experience working with relational databases, query authoring as well as working familiarity with a variety of databases.', '- Flexibility to adapt and interconnect different tools, including SnowFlake, Tableau Prep, Alteryx.', '- Comfort manipulating and analyzing complex, high-volume, high dimensionality data from varying sources and Advanced SQL skills', '- Experience working with GCP', '- A successful history of manipulating, processing, and extracting value from large disconnected datasets.', '- Experience collaborating cross-functionally to build and optimize ‘big data’ sets, for both structured and unstructured data.', '- Experience solving analytical problems using quantitative approaches', '- Working knowledge of Python (not just programming) data manipulation and data wrangling techniques is a plus.']

['', 'Access to well-being tools, resources, and freebies', 'As a Software Engineer on the Messaging Platform team, you will build and manage services that scale to support millions of customers, across a wide range of devices and surfaces. You will need to orchestrate messages across multiple notification platforms and messaging providers, as well as support the multiple products and brands available at HBO. Your services are expected to drive improvements in customer engagement and churn reduction. You will also partner with our data and experimentation platform teams, to ensure that we have the ability to send messages to custom segments and test different experiences among multiple groups, to see which works the best.', 'Be passionate about software engineering with a strong sense of ownership for the code that you and your team write', 'The Essentials', 'HBO Max is the future of entertainment and storytelling', 'Build and support a message orchestration platform that allows product and marketing teams to reach customers across a wide range of surfaces (email, mobile devices, connected TVs, etc.)Have a deep understanding of software data structures and algorithmsBe a self-starter that can independently solve complex engineering problemsMaintain high quality coding standards for yourself and your teamDesign and deliver components of a complex architecture or distributed systemBe passionate about software engineering with a strong sense of ownership for the code that you and your team writeSeek self-improvement and are adaptable to suggestions and feedbackHold yourself and your team to high standards while maintaining friendly, respectful relationships', 'Paid time off every year to volunteer', 'HBO is one of the most respected and innovative entertainment brands in the world, serving iconic, award-winning programming to 140 million subscribers globally. A subsidiary of WarnerMedia, HBO is the world’s most successful pay TV service with an extensive array of programming that includes some of the most notable titles to be on television, including drama series Succession®, Watchmen®, Westworld®, Big Little Lies®, Game of Thrones®, The Sopranos®, Band of Brothers® and The Wire®, as well as comedy series Barry®, Insecure® and Sex and the City®. HBO is committed to retaining and recruiting skilled and motivated employees, placing a priority on qualified team players who contribute to the diversity of their workforce. HBO offers competitive benefits to include medical, dental, vision, a matched 401(k) plan, flexible spending, a commuter benefit program and tuition reimbursement.', 'The Perks', 'WarnerMedia is a leading media and entertainment company that creates and distributes premium and popular content from a diverse array of talented storytellers and journalists to global audiences through its consumer brands including: HBO, HBO Max, Warner Bros., TNT, TBS, truTV, CNN, DC Entertainment, New Line, Cartoon Network, Adult Swim, Turner Classic Movies and others.', 'Warner Media, LLC and its subsidiaries are equal opportunity employers. Qualified candidates will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, mental or physical disability, and genetic information, marital status, citizenship status, military status, protected veteran status or any other category protected by law.', 'Build and support a message orchestration platform that allows product and marketing teams to reach customers across a wide range of surfaces (email, mobile devices, connected TVs, etc.)', 'BS degree in Computer Science, or a related field with 2+ years of relevant experience', 'Experience with messaging and notification APIs (Firebase, APNs)Experience with customer relationship management platforms (Braze)Full-stack industry experience, or hands-on familiarity with both client and server technologySuccess in delivering and operating reliable low-latency, services operating in a 24x7 environment', 'WarnerMedia’s streaming entertainment offering, HBO Max launched in May 2020 and is the culmination of some of the most innovative new technology and greatest creative talent in the industry. Anchored by the entire HBO service, arguably the greatest brand in television, HBO Max also features fan favorites from the WarnerMedia library including Warner Bros., New Line, DC, CNN, TNT, TBS, truTV, Turner Classic Movies, Cartoon Network, Adult Swim, Crunchyroll, Rooster Teeth, Looney Tunes, and more. HBO Max is home to key third-party library acquisitions such as Friends, South Park and Doctor Who, and more than 50 exclusive Originals in its first year, from the likes of groundbreaking creative talent such as J.J. Abrams, Ridley Scott, Jordan Peele, Steven Soderbergh, Michael Mann, Mindy Kaling, Reese Witherspoon, Anna Kendrick, Greg Berlanti, Melissa McCarthy, Robert Zemeckis and other visionaries. Find out more information at HBOMax.com.', 'The Nice to Haves', 'The Job', 'Seek self-improvement and are adaptable to suggestions and feedback', '2+ years of professional development experience using languages such as Java, C, C++, C#, Javascript, Typescript, Golang', '\xa0', 'Part of the WarnerMedia family of powerhouse brands', 'The Daily', 'Full-stack industry experience, or hands-on familiarity with both client and server technology', 'Warner Media, LLC and its subsidiaries are equal opportunity employers.\xa0Qualified candidates will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, mental or physical disability, and genetic information, marital status, citizenship status, military status, protected veteran status or any other category protected by law.', 'Have a deep understanding of software data structures and algorithms', 'Be a self-starter that can independently solve complex engineering problems', 'Maintain high quality coding standards for yourself and your team', 'Hold yourself and your team to high standards while maintaining friendly, respectful relationships', 'Company Overview :', 'Experience with customer relationship management platforms (Braze)', 'We are the team responsible for the messaging platform of HBO Max. This platform is used to communicate with HBO members across the entire customer lifecycle, from acquisition, to onboarding, engagement, and retention. We enable our product and marketing teams to reach millions of our customers, notifying them about new shows, providing personalized content recommendations, and alerting when there are account issues. We leverage a variety of communication channels, such as push notifications and email, to reach customers wherever they prefer to be contacted.', 'WarnerMedia is a leading media and entertainment company that creates and distributes premium and popular content from a diverse array of talented storytellers and journalists to global audiences through its consumer brands including: HBO, HBO Now, HBO Max, Warner Bros., TNT, TBS, truTV, CNN, DC Entertainment, New Line, Cartoon Network, Adult Swim, Turner Classic Movies and others.', 'Business Unit Overview :', 'Success in delivering and operating reliable low-latency, services operating in a 24x7 environment', 'Design and deliver components of a complex architecture or distributed system', 'Exclusive WarnerMedia events and advance screeningsPaid time off every year to volunteerAccess to well-being tools, resources, and freebiesAccess to in-house learning and development resourcesPart of the WarnerMedia family of powerhouse brands', 'Experience with messaging and notification APIs (Firebase, APNs)', 'Exclusive WarnerMedia events and advance screenings', 'Access to in-house learning and development resources', 'BS degree in Computer Science, or a related field with 2+ years of relevant experience2+ years of professional development experience using languages such as Java, C, C++, C#, Javascript, Typescript, Golang\xa0']

['', 'Highly skilled in data architecture and ETL design', 'Passion for solving complex and ambiguous problems and ability to make technical tradeoffs', 'Interest in mentoring, coaching and leading junior engineers in the team', 'Designing data architecture to support all business teams.', 'Core Technologies: Spark,\xa0Scala, Kafka, Kinesis, Python, Airflow, EMR, ECS', 'Passion for the latest distributed analytics technologies, ETL, and Big Data systems (such as data manipulation, data engineering, data analysis)', 'Develop solutions to turn millions of data points into actionable insights', 'Highly motivated to enable data-driven decision making by building supportive data products', 'Role impact:', '"One of our core values at Tally is \'Change shoes often.\' We do this with our peers and our customers every day, and we want candidates to share in our commitment to empathy.\xa0Empathy really is the foundation of inclusion, and Tally prides itself in being a company that prioritizes inclusion and diversity. We’re dedicated to creating a workplace culture where people are included and treated equitably."', 'Core Technologies:', '\xa0', 'Jason Brown, Co-founder and CEO', 'Our Data Platform team is responsible for managing our data infrastructure, architecting and implementing business-critical data pipelines, enabling data driven decision making by building data products, maintaining high code quality standards to improve the availability, reliability and accuracy of our data, and supporting all internal teams.\xa0Our Data platform consists of AWS Redshift and AWS S3 and Glue catalog-based data lake solutions and other big data distributed sql engines. We use Apache airflow as our primary ETL orchestration and workflow monitoring platform.', 'Tally makes people less stressed and better off financially through full financial automation. We’ve successfully launched Tally, the first and only fully automated debt manager to put billions of dollars back into people’s pockets. Currently backed by some of the world’s top investors, including Andressen Horowitz and Kleiner Perkins ($92MM in total funding to date), Tally’s vision is to automate people’s entire financial lives so they can be less stressed and better off financially.', 'Passion for the latest distributed analytics technologies, ETL, and Big Data systems (such as data manipulation, data engineering, data analysis)Interest in mentoring, coaching and leading junior engineers in the teamHighly skilled in data architecture and ETL designCollaborate well with other data/software engineers and business partnersPassion for solving complex and ambiguous problems and ability to make technical tradeoffsHighly motivated to enable data-driven decision making by building supportive data productsHealthy appreciation of security principles and work hard to protect the consumer’s data', 'Constantly strive to evolve the data architecture and scalability', 'Healthy appreciation of security principles and work hard to protect the consumer’s data', 'Collaborate well with other data/software engineers and business partners', 'A message from our leadership:', 'In this role we value:', 'Develop solutions to turn millions of data points into actionable insightsConstantly strive to evolve the data architecture and scalabilityDesigning data architecture to support all business teams.']

job_title: QA Data Engineer - Machine Learning Specialist
job_text: ['Responsibilities', '', 'Proficiency with a deep learning framework such as TensorFlow or Kerask-fold cross-validationCreating validation sets to test modelsEvaluate models using metrics on accuracy, precision, loss and recallWriting ML Unit TestsCreating and implementing Performance and Security testing in ML ModelsProficiency with Python and basic libraries for machine learning such as scikit-learn and pandasProficiency with OpenCVFamiliarity with LinuxAbility to select hardware to run an ML model with the required latency', 'BigR.io is a technology consulting firm empowering data to drive innovation and advanced analytics. We specialize in cutting-edge Big Data, Machine Learning, and Custom Software strategy, analysis, architecture, and implementation solutions. We are an elite group with MIT roots, shining when tasked with complex missions. Whether it’s assembling mounds of data from a variety of sources, surfacing intelligence with Deep Learning, or building high-volume, highly-available systems, we consistently deliver', 'Familiarity with Linux', 'Creating and implementing Performance and Security testing in ML Models', 'Analyzing the errors of the model and designing strategies to overcome them', 'Supervising the data acquisition process if more data is needed', 'Writing ML Unit Tests', 'W2 only, sorry no sponsorship!', 'Proficiency with a deep learning framework such as TensorFlow or Keras', 'Defining data augmentation pipelines', 'Understanding business objectives and developing models that help to achieve them, along with metrics to track their progress', 'Remote- east coast hours', '\xa0', 'Skills', 'Help deploy\xa0models to production', 'Creating validation sets to test models', 'Proficiency with Python and basic libraries for machine learning such as scikit-learn and pandas', 'We are looking for an expert in QA/SDET Machine Learning solutions\xa0to help us create and implement\xa0test ML solutions that are extracted\xa0from our data. You will lead all the automation/QA processes within the\xa0data collection, cleaning, and preprocessing, and validating\xa0training models that are\xa0deployed to production. The ideal candidate will be passionate about artificial intelligence and how to test it while\xa0staying up-to-date with the latest developments in the field.', 'Understanding business objectives and developing models that help to achieve them, along with metrics to track their progressTest the ML algorithms that could be used to solve a given problem and ranking them by their success probabilityVerifying data quality, and/or ensuring it via data cleaningSupervising the data acquisition process if more data is neededDefining validation strategiesDefining the preprocessing or feature engineering to be done on a given datasetDefining data augmentation pipelinesTraining models and tuning their hyper-parametersAnalyzing the errors of the model and designing strategies to overcome themHelp deploy\xa0models to production', 'Test the ML algorithms that could be used to solve a given problem and ranking them by their success probability', 'Verifying data quality, and/or ensuring it via data cleaning', 'Defining validation strategies', 'Defining the preprocessing or feature engineering to be done on a given dataset', 'Job Description', 'Evaluate models using metrics on accuracy, precision, loss and recall', 'Proficiency with OpenCV', 'k-fold cross-validation', 'Ability to select hardware to run an ML model with the required latency', 'QA Data Engineer - Machine Learning Specialist', 'Training models and tuning their hyper-parameters']

['', 'Lead complete research and development projects in collaboration with build, test, and engineering teams, including planning, experimental design and preparation, execution, and communication of final results', 'Formulate, lead, and facilitate complex data analysis projects.\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Responsibilities', 'Qualifications', 'Strong knowledge of and experience with programming (python, ETL frameworks, cloud computing) and databases (SQL, etc)', 'We are looking to build relationships with people who share our values:', 'Excellence without Ego.', 'Driven by our vision of the affordable, reliable, net-zero carbon grid of the future, Mainspring has developed\xa0a new category of power generation — the linear generator — that delivers onsite, fuel-flexible power to\xa0help\xa0accelerate the transition to the future grid.\xa0', 'work at the interface of mechanical/systems engineering, data analysis/science,', 'Adept at report writing and presentation of results', 'Pragmatic Optimism.', 'Responsibilities\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'The Linear Generator is a sophisticated, automated, and integrated system spanning a wide range of engineering disciplines including thermodynamics, mechanical, electrical, software, and controls. You will lead, design, perform, and analyze experiments on our Linear Generators as part of a dynamic test engineering team. This includes hands-on work and operation on our Linear Generator prototypes and test system, debugging, and advanced data analysis aimed at improving our product. This position is within the test engineer team with a strong focus on exploring our diverse stream of data to extract insights about performance and durability of our units, and will require strong collaboration with the software team that is developing architecture and infrastructure of our software systems. ', 'and software engineering with activities that will include:', 'The unique combination of attributes offered by Mainspring’s linear generator enables applications on both the customer and utility sides of the meter for the $750B global electricity equipment market. Mainspring began pilot customer installations in 2020 and plans its full commercial launch in 2021 with Fortune 100 customers and partnerships with top-tier utilities.', 'Proactive Collaboration.', 'Proficiency in statistics, data analysis, and research methods', 'Mainspring is based in Menlo Park and is backed by top-tier venture and strategic investors such as Khosla Ventures, Bill Gates, American Electric Power, and Centrica Innovations.\xa0More information can be found at www.mainspringenergy.com.\xa0\xa0', '\xa0', 'Pragmatic Optimism.\xa0Building a new category of world-class power generation requires the optimism of ambition and creativity, balanced with practicality to solve problems efficiently.\xa0The challenges that arise are opportunities for growth.\xa0\xa0Excellence without Ego.\xa0We bring expertise and commitment to creating the best customer experience, from sales to deployment and service, just as we apply deep technical rigor to building and delivering world-class products.\xa0We strive for excellence and behave as leaders with the humility to acknowledge our challenges, both collectively and as individual contributors.Proactive Collaboration.\xa0The integration and cross-disciplinary nature of Mainspring’s business requires intentionally seeking out others who bring different skills, perspectives, and priorities.\xa0Our culture of inclusion and respect extends beyond our team to interactions with our partners and customers.', 'Provide insights about the performances of our linear generators using time series data collected from our units at customer sites and internal R&D units', 'Proactive Collaboration.\xa0The integration and cross-disciplinary nature of Mainspring’s business requires intentionally seeking [' Develop, maintain, document, and test internal software repositories to support scalable model development across several datasets, analytics platforms, and model types ', '  MS, or PhD in Computer Science, Statistics, Data Science, or related field.  ', ' Life-Work Integration ', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'What We’re Looking For In You:', 'Purpose and Passion  Comprehensive Benefits  Life-Work Integration  Community  Career GrowthAt Boston Scientific, you will find a collaborative culture driven by a passion for innovation that keeps us connected on the most essential level. With determination, imagination and a deep caring for human life, we’re solving some of the most important healthcare industry challenges. Together, we’re one global team committed to making a difference in people’s lives around the world. This is a place where you can find a career with meaningful purpose—improving lives through your life’s work.About This RoleThis role will have technical leadership responsibilities for the development and implementation of analytical programs to improve the product performance and compliance of life saving and sustaining medical devices.The successful candidate will be a project leader in the improvement of product performance analytics within the Peripheral Interventions (PI) business unit, while actively working within a network of data scientists across all Boston Scientific business units to ensure alignment and the best predictive methods are employed. The individual will be a key participant in the establishment and implementation of a Data Analytics Strategy within PI.This role requires the knowledge to set up a logical workflow to identify the location of data in various databases and then to relate the data into a visualization and modeling-ready dataset. Boston Scientific’s data are located in both on-premises Enterprise Data Hub and in cloud locations that include Microsoft Azure and Amazon Redshift. On-premises data will eventually be completely migrated to cloud warehouses. A good understanding of general data architecture will help to learn the BSC schemas and data access permissions. The knowledge to identify required data entities, the skill to model them for visualization, and the skill to design a forecast model with BI tools along with Python and SQL are a must. The visuals and models are then published in security-controlled locations.Boston Scientific uses several advance Business Intelligence (BI) tools that include Tableau and Microsoft Power BI as a part of analytics modernization. The role will primarily interact with Power BI using group. However, aptitude and previous experience with either platform is beneficial to acquire relatable technical skills with BSC applications and their connectivity. Extensive knowledge of Microsoft Excel Power Query is a good substitute for Power BI as it is the shared data model engine in both applications.Excellent problem solving, critical thinking, and communication skills are required to have clarity of vision for a project and determination to realize useful outcomes through the use of Power BI, Power Platform (the Microsoft Analytics Ecosystem natively integrated to other O365 apps), data warehouse architecture, data permission structures, institutional metrics requirements, and the needs of data review audiences. Strong communication skills are applicable in leadership and cross-functional reviews at every stage of strategy development and implementation, and in the training of others to use BI tools at every stage of an analytics workflow.Preferred location would be Maple Grove, MNYour Responsibilities Will Include  Develop deep learning models to provide real-time predictions   Devise testing, maintenance, and monitoring strategies for integrating machine learning models deployed in production   Develop, maintain, document, and test internal software repositories to support scalable model development across several datasets, analytics platforms, and model types   Assesses manufacturing processes for automation and analytics opportunities   Interact with a variety of databases and data types, including image and non-image data   Prepare and present technical data and recommendations at technical reviews   Train and/or provide work direction to technicians, engineers, and manufacturing personnel when required as part of data generation, collection, and algorithm development efforts   Serve as a core team lead or extended team member on new development projects  Minimum QualificationsWhat We’re Looking For In You:  BS degree with 2 - 4 years of experience building and deploying advanced data analytics within a technical field OR MS or PhD with 0 - 2 Years experience within a technical field.  Preferred Qualifications  MS, or PhD in Computer Science, Statistics, Data Science, or related field.  About UsAs a global medical technology leader for more than 35 years, our mission at Boston Scientific (NYSE: BSX) is to transform lives through innovative medical solutions that improve the health of patients. ['', 'Responsibilities', 'Qualifications', '•\xa0Expert in AI model training for HPC systems ', '•\xa0Manage hyperparameter optimizations ', '•\xa0Implement distributed training technologies to speed up model training ', '•\xa0Develop distributed data technology ', '•\xa0Experience with diverse AI model architectures & training procedures\xa0', '•\xa0Background in statistics or machine learning ', 'Huge plus (but not required):', '•\xa0Experience with Tensorflow\xa0', '\xa0', 'We are making AI a core technology with the goal of accelerating and improving drug development by enabling in silico design of novel biologics and their associated producing cell lines. Our proprietary Engine is the platform managing this technology, including data processing, deep learning model training, and model deployment. AI deep learning models require special expertise to be trained quickly, scaled, and tuned for performance. The AI Models Engineer will be tasked with developing model training technologies, identifying training bottlenecks, and standardizing hyperparameter training.', '•\xa0Bachelor of Science Degree required', '•\xa0Develop new model architectures for increased performance', 'Deep Learning Engineer, AI Models, AI Group', '•\xa0Dev-ops experience for HPC systems', '•\xa0Self-driven coder (public demo code a big plus) ', 'Job Description', 'We seek candidates who will dive all in to participate in our creative company culture that’s collaborative, multidisciplinary, and committed to a big vision for positive impact. We are defying conventions and innovating without boundaries. We are disrupting an industry with bold ideas and passionate pursuit of new possibilities. We are looking for original thinkers, creative scientists, and data-devoted gurus. Successful candidates will be excited to work in a dynamic startup environment and contribute as a key member of a project team. If this sounds good to you, we invite you to join us in our quest to redefine possible.', 'We offer highly competitive salaries and benefits, including medical and dental insurance, paid time off, and 401(k) with a generous company match. Legal authorization to work in the U.S. is required.\xa0', '•\xa0Develop a system for identifying training bottlenecks ', 'Responsibilities ']

job_title: Data Engineer / Data Modeler / BI Engineer(Open to Remote)
job_text: ['', ' Demonstrated experience providing customer-driven solutions, support or service. Solid knowledge and understanding of processes, tools and deliverables for business data analysis. Solid knowledge and understanding of translating business requirements into functional and technical specifications. Solid knowledge and understanding of data integration, data warehousing, and business intelligence concepts and technologies. Solid knowledge and understanding of data models and database design and development concepts and methods. Solid knowledge and understanding of data architecture and development standards. Solid knowledge and understanding of the systems development life cycle (SDLC). Solid knowledge and understanding of developing ETL programs, data processing programs in a specific language for a specific platform. Solid knowledge and understanding of testing and quality assurance methodologies, automation, and tools. ', 'User data visualization tools (Tableau, Power BI)', 'Offer to selected candidate is contingent on signing a non-disclosure agreement for proprietary information, trade secrets, and inventions.', 'Design data warehousing, advanced analytics and business intelligence solutions. Design semantic layer, virtualization layer, appropriate use of BI client tools and technical components within BI client tools. Write functional and technical specifications.', 'Perform database activities such as setup, configuration, troubleshooting, tuning & optimization, database object creation & modification and metadata management.', 'Job Description:', 'Ensure capture and publish of metadata, proactive and ongoing data quality controls, monitoring and reporting.', ' Partner with business stakeholders to understand their needs, gather and analyze business requirements, perform data analysis, assist in change management, training and testing efforts. Solicit business, functional, non-functional and technical requirements through interviewing and requirements gathering process. Document requirements, including business rules, functional and non-functional requirements and data definitions.  Develops user acceptance testing and quality assurance test scenarios and cases working with business partners to help ensure data delivery meets business requirements. Collaborates with stakeholders to produce and maintain accurate test documentation. Design data warehousing, advanced analytics and business intelligence solutions. Design semantic layer, virtualization layer, appropriate use of BI client tools and technical components within BI client tools. Write functional and technical specifications. Performs impact analysis and communicates changes and impact to those affected. Assist with establishing design standards and best practices to optimize performance and efficiency of the data warehousing environment. Develop code, scripts, Extract Transform Load (ETL) mappings, stored procedures, universes, queries, reports, dashboards, and analytical applications. Ensure capture and publish of metadata, proactive and ongoing data quality controls, monitoring and reporting. Perform database activities such as setup, configuration, troubleshooting, tuning & optimization, database object creation & modification and metadata management. Perform ETL tool related activities such as repository and folder creation and management, troubleshooting and ETL performance optimization. Perform second and third level production support activities including production incidence prioritization and resolution, defect and small enhancement implementation. May assist junior level employees with data or project issues. ', 'Solid knowledge and understanding of developing ETL programs, data processing programs in a specific language for a specific platform.', 'Travel is required up to 10% of the time', ' We are open to hiring candidates to work remotely (anywhere in the USA). Offer to selected candidate is contingent on signing a non-disclosure agreement for proprietary information, trade secrets, and inventions. Open to hiring at level 2 or level 3 of the job family. ['', 'Strong written and oral communication skills, including the presentation and visualization of results and documentation.', 'Experience working on complex and dynamic projects, making decisions under uncertainty, and dealing with shifting priorities.', 'Applying cutting-edge analytical methods to solve complex biomedical questions by integrating disparate data types and delivering actionable insights and testable hypotheses', 'bluebird is proud to be an equal opportunity employer, seeking to create a welcoming and diverse environment. All applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, veteran status or any other applicable legally protected characteristics.', 'Prior experience in virology, immunotherapy, stem cell biology, or gene therapy is a bonus.', 'Delivering translational analyses of exploratory, clinical, and manufacturing data to identify emergent data trends to answer key questions on the mission to deliver regulatory filings for our SGD therapies', ' Applying cutting-edge analytical methods to solve complex biomedical questions by integrating disparate data types and delivering actionable insights and testable hypotheses Collaborating with wet lab scientists to design experiments leveraging high-throughput experimental generation. Collaborating with research scientists to characterize novel gene therapies using multi-omics approaches, e.g., single-cell RNAseq. Visualizing and distilling data to explain key findings to cross-functional teams and external stakeholders. Delivering translational analyses of exploratory, clinical, and manufacturing data to identify emergent data trends to answer key questions on the mission to deliver regulatory filings for our SGD therapies Being an advocate for driving awareness, acceptance, and adoption of advanced analytics across the organization. Identifying and applying new avenues which demonstrate how data-driven approaches and data sciences translate catalyze development in research, clinical projects, and bioengineering. ', 'How You’ll Fly', "As a Data Sciences bird, you'll help to bring more patients their bluebird days by:", "At bluebird, only two things matter - patients and our people. When you join the nest, you're not just landing a new gig, you become a part of a flock that's soaring to new heights. We’re 1100+ doers, thinkers and collaborators across the globe with a strong sense of our values and our purpose. Our innovation and sustainability are rooted in the diversity of our teams and results are achieved through cooperation and the incorporation of multiple points of view. This is personal and we approach every challenge with radical care. The time is now to rise up and recode the science, the systems, and the status quo.", 'PhD in data sciences, bioinformatics, statistics, or other computational/quantitative discipline with 2+ years of post-doctoral experience.', 'Strong curiosity about emerging trends in genomics/computational biology and data sciences.', 'You will be an integral part of bluebird’s Severe Genetic Diseases Data Sciences team. The team works across research, clinical, and pharmaceutical sciences to advance our gene therapies by leveraging expertise in bioinformatics, engineering, statistics, stem cell and disease biology, and human genetics. We apply advanced analytics to molecular, clinical, manufacturing and public domain data to support bluebird’s mission to recode for life. Come work with a cheerfully nerdy group of birds that loves rising to the challenge much as we do staying locked in an endless loop trying to make the best bird pun.', 'Being an advocate for driving awareness, acceptance, and adoption of advanced analytics across the organization.', 'Strong organizational skills to keep multiple projects moving forward at once.', ' PhD in data sciences, bioinformatics, statistics, or other computational/quantitative discipline with 2+ years of post-doctoral experience. Strong expertise in Python or R and experience working in Linux environment. Preferred to have an understanding of common NGS analysis workflows (DNA and/or RNA). Knowledge of core concepts in data analysis and applied statistics – model testing, regression, classification and clustering methods. Strong curiosity about emerging trends in genomics/computational biology and data sciences. Prior experience in virology, immunotherapy, stem cell biology, or gene therapy is a bonus. Strong written and oral communication skills, including the presentation and visualization of results and documentation. Strong organizational skills to keep multiple projects moving forward at once. Experience working on complex and dynamic projects, making decisions under uncertainty, and dealing with shifting priorities. ', 'About The Nest', 'You’re the bird we’re looking for if you have:', 'Collaborating with wet lab scientists to design experiments leveraging high-throughput experimental generation.', 'About The Flock', 'What You’ll Bring', 'Knowledge of core concepts in data analysis and applied statistics – model testing, regression, classification and clustering methods.', 'Visualizing and distilling data to explain key findings to cross-functional teams and external stakeholders.', 'bluebird bio is deeply committed to fostering an environment where diversity and inclusion are not only valued, but prioritized. We believe a diverse and inclusive community empowers us to act courageously, care deeply, and dream boldly to impact people in big ways. Diverse viewpoints bring diverse capabilities which strengthen our focus and fuel our growth. ', 'Collaborating with research scientists to characterize novel gene therapies using multi-omics approaches, e.g., single-cell RNAseq.', 'Strong expertise in Python or R and experience working in Linux environment. Preferred to have an understanding of common NGS analysis workflows (DNA and/or RNA).', 'Identifying and applying new avenues which demonstrate how data-driven approaches and data sciences translate catalyze development in research, clinical projects, and bioengineering.']

['', 'Vianai is looking for experienced data science practitioners who are able to work with customers to identify and implement projects where our platform can be deployed to generate business value.\xa0\xa0', 'About You:\xa0', 'Track record of developing novel learning algorithms/systems\xa0', 'About Us: Who we are and How we Work:\xa0', 'US West Coast, SF Bay Area preferred ', 'Preferred Qualifications\xa0', 'Professional experience in statistical modeling, machine learning, or data mining practice\xa0', 'Where is the job?\xa0', '\xa0\xa0', 'Hands on experience with deep learning with areas of computer vision, natural language processing techniques etc.\xa0', 'Able to travel to customer site\xa0', 'Able to work onsite in Palo Alto, CA,\u202for Tel Aviv,\xa0Israel\xa0', 'M.S. or Ph.D. in Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, Statistics or related field\xa0', 'The Vianai technology principles and strategy are embodied by a next-generation platform for enterprise machine learning and AI that will\xa0dramatically\xa0increase the number of people who can build and train ML-centric applications.\xa0We plan to\xa0achieve\xa0this\xa0through a dramatic simplification and streamlining of the development experience, coupled with an unprecedented level of interactivity and\xa0explorability.\xa0', 'We are professionals\xa0and experts\xa0focused\xa0on\xa0building\xa0organizational\xa0wisdom by\xa0activating\xa0artificial\xa0intelligence and\xa0amplifying\xa0human\xa0minds. We are also sisters and brothers, fathers and mothers, sons and daughters, partners and friends. Our family comes from around the world. We love the environment. We believe in science and in spirituality, and we honor every living thing that shares the planet with us. We are teachers, and we are lifelong students.\xa0\xa0', 'Strong Industry domain knowledge and experience preferred\xa0', 'Experience with big data techniques (such as Hadoop, Spark)\xa0', '\xa0', 'Experience with big data techniques (such as Hadoop, Spark)\xa0Hands on experience with deep learning with areas of computer vision, natural language processing techniques etc.\xa0Strong Industry domain knowledge and experience preferred\xa0Publication track record on deep learning / machine learning\xa0PhD degree in Computer Science, Physics, Applied Mathematics, Statistics or related quantitative field\xa0', 'Collaborative & Independent: Someone who values communication and connection with others and is able to collaborate as part of a team and work independently\xa0', 'Expert & Student: We want to work with someone who has deep domain expertise and is also open and curious to new ways of doing things.\xa0', 'Ability to visualize data and present core insights in a clear and compelling way\xa0', 'The Opportunity:\xa0\xa0', 'We are committed to advancing inclusion, equity and diversity because we believe that to design more transparent and beneficial AI systems, we need architects of all types. The combination helps us gain clarity, find ideas and move to the best solution faster.\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Maker & Manager:\u202fSomeone who be hands-on and do the work, as well as\u202flead thought and teams. A colleague who will jump in the trenches and lead by example.\xa0', 'Experience with Machine/Deep Learning software packages such as TensorFlow/MXNet/SparkML/R etc.\xa0', 'Candidate should be able to in a\xa0multi-task\xa0creative environment, rapid prototype, and agile development environment.\xa0', 'Our company is founded on a culture of trust, empowerment and respect. We bring our whole self to work — the non-perfect, messy, sometimes imposter, sometimes expert, sometimes vulnerable and sometimes superhuman self that contributes to what we believe in. We strive to provide everyone, regardless of race, sex, age, gender, ability or sexual orientation, with a safe environment so each person can focus on doing what they do best, and help us change the world.\xa0\xa0', 'While\xa0Vianai\xa0is a part of each one of us, it isn’t all of us.\xa0\xa0', 'Excellent communication, relationship skills and a strong team player\xa0', 'Our ideal colleague:\xa0', 'PhD degree in Computer Science, Physics, Applied Mathematics, Statistics or related quantitative field\xa0', 'Publication track record on deep learning / machine learning\xa0', 'Qualifications\xa0', 'Expert & Student: We want to work with someone who has deep domain expertise and is also open and curious to new ways of doing things.\xa0Maker & Manager:\u202fSomeone who be hands-on and do the work, as well as\u202flead thought and teams. A colleague who will jump in the trenches and lead by example.\xa0Collaborative & Independent: Someone who values communication and connection with others and is able to collaborate as part of a team and work independently\xa0', 'M.S. or Ph.D. in Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, Statistics or related field\xa0Track record of developing novel learning algorithms/systems\xa0Professional experience in statistical modeling, machine learning, or data mining practice\xa0Candidate should be able to in a\xa0multi-task\xa0creative environment, rapid prototype, and agile development environment.\xa0Experience with Machine/Deep Learning software packages such as TensorFlow/MXNet/SparkML/R etc.\xa0Ability to visualize data and present core insights in a clear and compelling way\xa0Excellent communication, relationship skills and a strong team player\xa0Able to work onsite in Palo Alto, CA,\u202for Tel Aviv,\xa0Israel\xa0Able to travel to customer site\xa0', 'The Vianai platform delivers simplicity by tying together all the key tasks that a\xa0data\xa0scientist is responsible for in a single interactive\xa0and\xa0visual experience. Rather than having to master numerous libraries and environments,\xa0a data\xa0scientist can iterate over multiple versions of data, features and models in an environment that can be directly exposed to and shared with business domain experts, dramatically improving solution performance, cycle-time and buy-in. At the heart of\xa0our\xa0platform is a breakthrough,\xa0domain-specific language for Machine Learning and Data Science that is able to express all aspects of an algorithm (models and parameters) in a simple, fully running specification. Anyone who can write standard mathematical expressions can directly create optimized ML models that run and scale.\xa0', 'We ask tough questions to each other and of ourselves. We don’t shrink from our responsibility to our community, and to all of humanity.\xa0']

['', 'Responsibilities', 'Core Values', 'Benefits', " Ones we actually live by Lead with integrity We operate at a high level of integrity that is deeply rooted in large ways and in small daily activities and practices. We act with honor and truthfulness in all that we do. Be supportive We achieve the best results through the combined efforts of each individual. Our culture creates an eagerness in employees to take initiative and personal interest in the people with whom they work with. Foster inclusivity We place a high value on equality and fair treatment in the workplace. All employees are treated with a high level of respect all while ensuring a safe, diverse and welcoming work environment free of any form of discrimination. Extreme ownership We own everything in our world, to an extreme degree. We are responsible for not just those tasks which we directly control, but for all those that affect whether or not our mission is successful. Trust-based culture Our executive team maintains open communication and radical transparency in all aspects of the business. We also provide an open line of communication for all employees to voice their opinions. We welcome all suggestions and improvements by team members. Be positive We are a team where positivity is contagious. We’re truly passionate about what we do and look for others who approach their work with the same energy. We're not afraid to get messy and view every challenge as an opportunity to learn and grow. We value talent and dedication just as much as we encourage creativity and passion. We also believe diversity drives innovation. We are committed to inclusion across race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status or disability status. We celebrate multiple approaches, and diverse points of view that drive us forward every day. If you require an accommodation in order to participate in our hiring process, please contact us to make your needs known in advance to ensure appropriate accommodations are in place. Due to COVID-19, our standard recruitment process has slightly changed. Click here to learn more about how Underground Cellar is continuing to hire during this time and what you can expect throughout the hiring and onboarding process."]

['', 'Python Backend Lead Engineer', 'Strong expertise in Python in Linux environments', 'Are you a Backend Software Engineer thinking about your next step? If you are an ambitious, hands-on, backend engineer with strong systems architecture skills this is the role for you.', 'Experience with network object storage like Google Cloud Storage or S3.', 'Role Requirements', 'Minimum of 5 years’ experienceTrack record of successful backend systems design & architecture.Strong expertise in Python in Linux environmentsExperience with network object storage like Google Cloud Storage or S3.Experience with Docker containerized development & deployment.Thorough understanding of Git development workflows and branching.Proficiency with SQL (especially PostgreSQL).Experience planning sprints and coordinating within and between teams.Strong English communication skills, both verbal and written.Must be able to work most of a Pacific Time work day.', 'Proficiency with SQL (especially PostgreSQL).', 'Experience planning sprints and coordinating within and between teams.', 'Must be able to work most of a Pacific Time work day.', 'I have partnered with an exciting 3D, AI start-up based in California. They are looking for a talented\xa0Python Backend Lead Engineer who is excited to help organize and lead a team to build cloud services, APIs, data pipelines and tools for mass-scale, AI-powered, consumer apps.', 'Minimum of 5 years’ experience', 'The team are applying novel 3D computer vision & graphics technologies to innovative mass-scale consumer apps for hundreds of millions of users around the world, on web & mobile devices.', 'Track record of successful backend systems design & architecture.', 'Experience with Docker containerized development & deployment.', 'Thorough understanding of Git development workflows and branching.', 'Strong English communication skills, both verbal and written.', '\xa0']

['', 'Robust benefits package including access to a 401k and various medical, dental, and vision plans, as well as a $100/month in fitness and wellness reimbursement\xa0Free delivered lunch and other goodies sent homeFull support for remote working during covidAn extremely enthusiastic team that appreciates collaboration', 'You have experience building scalable and fault-tolerant data platform.', 'Our team is 200+ engineers, product managers, and designers from top tech companies including Google, Microsoft, Twitter, Moat, Oscar, and AppNexus.\xa0', 'Our data backend is Java and Python micro-services coupled with Spark, Kinesis, AirFlow, Snowflake, and Postgres, all hosted on AWS.', 'Partner with Product Management and Engineering to translate customer needs into a better overall product.', 'Data Engineering at Attentive is responsible for data ingestion and curation across our growing suite of products to be used in client reports, client analytics, targeting, and machine learning. As both data volume and data use cases are growing exponentially, our charter is to scale our data systems and platforms accordingly.\xa0', 'Role Background:\xa0', 'We believe our company will win in the long run through product innovation.', 'You will be an effective people manager who also has the capability to contribute as a highly-technical hands-on data engineer when the need arises.You have experience building scalable and fault-tolerant data platform.You will hold your own in technical and business discussions with the product team and the rest of the engineering organization.You can understand the business of your customers, identify problems or opportunities then address them using technology.Partner with Product Management and Engineering to translate customer needs into a better overall product.You will write simple, yet elegant, readable, and well-documented code.You can apply an entrepreneurial approach and passion to problem-solving and building products.You have built and shipped complex software productsYou have managed a high-performance team', 'Product Development @ Attentive:', 'An extremely enthusiastic team that appreciates collaboration', 'Attentive is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We’re committed to diversity and maintaining a work environment that is free from harassment and discrimination. We’re committed to them because our core values demand it - values like Integrity First, Listening & Cultivating Discussion, and Default to Action. We believe in embracing “self” and that our true strength lies in the diversity of our employees. For this reason, applicants from all backgrounds are encouraged to apply, and will not be discriminated against on the basis of any protected status under federal, state, or local law.', 'You have managed a high-performance team', 'You @ Attentive:', 'We’re seeking an experienced Engineering Manager to build and lead a team of Software Engineers tasked with establishing and maturing our data platform and tooling. By creating a scalable platform for event data, your team will help other groups at Attentive to facilitate data lineage, data catalog, data discovery, and share data without a database monolith. This is a hands-on role where you are expected to balance people management, cross-functional leadership, and coding. You should be comfortable letting your team takes true ownership of projects while keeping enough of an eye on things to make sure the train stays on the tracks.', 'Our data backend is Java and Python micro-services coupled with Spark, Kinesis, AirFlow, Snowflake, and Postgres, all hosted on AWS.Our frontend is built on current best practices leveraging Babel, Webpack, React, and Redux.Our team is 200+ engineers, product managers, and designers from top tech companies including Google, Microsoft, Twitter, Moat, Oscar, and AppNexus.\xa0We believe our company will win in the long run through product innovation.To get there, we obsess over iteratively delivering customer value through rapid prototyping and data-driven decision making.', 'We work with 2,000+ of the most innovative brands like Sephora, Coach, Urban Outfitters, CB2, PacSun, Lulus, and Jack in the Box. Attentive was founded in 2016 by the co-founders of TapCommerce, a mobile marketing platform that was acquired by Twitter in 2014.', 'You will write simple, yet elegant, readable, and well-documented code.', 'You will hold your own in technical and business discussions with the product team and the rest of the engineering organization.', 'Robust benefits package including access to a 401k and various medical, dental, and vision plans, as well as a $100/month in fitness and wellness reimbursement\xa0', 'Attentive is a personalized text messaging platform changing the way consumers interact with businesses and organizations. The company is one of the fastest growing startups in New York City and recently raised a $230 million investment led by Coatue in September 2020, just 5 months after its Series C round due to strong customer traction. Other investors in Attentive include Bain Capital Ventures, Sequoia, IVP.\xa0\xa0', 'You will be an effective people manager who also has the capability to contribute as a highly-technical hands-on data engineer when the need arises.', 'Free delivered lunch and other goodies sent home', 'To get there, we obsess over iteratively delivering customer value through rapid prototyping and data-driven decision making.', 'Our frontend is built on current best practices leveraging Babel, Webpack, React, and Redux.', 'Full support for remote working during covid', 'You can apply an entrepreneurial approach and passion to problem-solving and building products.', 'You can understand the business of your customers, identify problems or opportunities then address them using technology.', 'Benefits & Perks:', 'You have built and shipped complex software products']

', ' They say it’s all about location and Berkeley Lab has it all: a view above the San Francisco Bay, cool breezes, and world-class multidisciplinary science within a diverse and respectful research ecosystem of 5,000 people. Nearly 90 years ago, Ernest Orlando Lawrence, the inventor of the cyclotron, brought physicists, biologists, engineers and mathematicians together in Berkeley above the University of California campus to tackle the most urgent scientific challenges. Today, after garnering 13 Nobel Prizes, Berkeley Lab has sustained and grown that tradition of open, interdisciplinary team science, exemplified by how the U.S. Department of Energy Joint Genome Institute (JGI) addresses the most pressing energy and environmental challenges using integrative genome science approaches. JGI takes up residence in the new, state-of-the-art Integrative Genomics Building (IGB) along with the U.S. Department of Energy Systems Biology Knowledgebase (KBase) to expand the frontiers of energy and environmental science in partnership with the worldwide community of researchers. Will you join us and be a critical part of our next ground-breaking discoveries? job_title: Staff Data Scientist - Omnichannel Supply Chain Tech. Strategy
job_text: ['', 'You’ll sweep us off our feet if…', 'Imagine working in an environment where one line of code can make life easier for hundreds of millions of people and put a smile on their face. That’s what we do at Walmart Global Tech. We’re a team of 15,000+ software engineers, data scientists and service professionals within Walmart, the world’s largest retailer, delivering innovations that improve how our customers shop and empower our 2.2 million associates. To others, innovation looks like an app, service or some code,\xa0but Walmart has always been about people. People are why we innovate, and people power our innovations.\xa0Being human-led is our true disruption.\xa0', 'You have strong communication skills ', 'You’ll make an impact by:\u202f\xa0\xa0', 'You’ll make an impact by:', 'About Global Tech\xa0', 'We’re virtual\xa0', "You hold a Master's degree, PhD is a plus. \xa0", 'You have a strong supply chain background', 'Collaborating with our data engineers\xa0to\xa0gather\xa0the right\xa0information from\xa0our\xa0various sources\xa0so that you can\xa0implement advanced statistical methodologies\xa0and design interventions to optimize how our business can best perform\xa0', '\xa0', 'You have retail experience, but open to other industries\xa0', 'We’re virtual', 'About Global Tech', 'You have strong experience developing strategic, complex Data Science models', 'Working virtually this year has helped us make quicker decisions, remove location barriers across our global team, be more flexible in our personal lives and spend less time commuting.\xa0 Today, we are reimagining the tech workplace of the future by making a permanent transition to virtual work for most of our team. Of course, being together in person is an important part of our culture and shared success. We’ll collaborate in person at a regular cadence and with purpose.\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Partnering with business and technical stakeholders to translate\xa0challenging retail\xa0business problems\xa0into\xa0state-of-the-art data science\xa0solutions\xa0\xa0', 'Advising on\xa0analysis\xa0and\xa0modeling techniques,\xa0selecting the\xa0best fit\xa0for structured\xa0& unstructured, complex data,\xa0and developing\xa0custom analytics models\xa0to\xa0generate insights that drive value for our customers and\xa0unlock competitive advantage for\xa0our organization\xa0', 'Being human-led is our true disruption.', 'Advising on\xa0analysis\xa0and\xa0modeling techniques,\xa0selecting the\xa0best fit\xa0for structured\xa0& unstructured, complex data,\xa0and developing\xa0custom analytics models\xa0to\xa0generate insights that drive value for our customers and\xa0unlock competitive advantage for\xa0our organization\xa0Collaborating with our data engineers\xa0to\xa0gather\xa0the right\xa0information from\xa0our\xa0various sources\xa0so that you can\xa0implement advanced statistical methodologies\xa0and design interventions to optimize how our business can best perform\xa0Conducting\xa0exploratory\xa0analysis\xa0including hypothesis testing,\xa0statistical inference, and statistical analysis (predictive\xa0and/or prescriptive)\xa0Partnering with business and technical stakeholders to translate\xa0challenging retail\xa0business problems\xa0into\xa0state-of-the-art data science\xa0solutions\xa0\xa0', 'The Item & Inventory team at Walmart Global Tech. builds impactful technology to drive our Omnichannel strategy to engage with customers and drive the future of retail. We are looking for an exceptional, experienced technical talent to design and create the algorithms and models to fuel our efforts.', "You have a strong supply chain backgroundYou have strong experience developing strategic, complex Data Science modelsYou have retail experience, but open to other industries\xa0You hold a Master's degree, PhD is a plus. \xa0You have strong communication skills ", 'Conducting\xa0exploratory\xa0analysis\xa0including hypothesis testing,\xa0statistical inference, and statistical analysis (predictive\xa0and/or prescriptive)\xa0']
