Tasks include design and coding of Flash LiDAR application and driver software, integration of software and hardware, and software sustaining.', 'Participate as a Software Engineer in a fast-paced multi-disciplinary design team creating state-of-the-art Flash LiDAR cameras and applications.', 'Excellent communication skills.', 'Experience', 'Real Time Operating Systems (i.e., VxWorks) experience with embedded processors', 'Desired Skills: ', 'Experience with Visual Studio or other integrated development environment (IDE).', 'Experience:', 'Agile development experience.', 'Familiarity with board support packages (BSP) and device drivers for operating system and application software support.', '\xa0', 'New college graduate to 3+ years of experience.', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related engineering degree.', 'Software development experience in C# and/or C++.', 'Experience with major elements of the software development cycle including design, coding, integration, and systems test.', 'Experience with ARM or similar embedded processor, hardware interfaces, and instrumentation/ sensor systems.', 'Object Oriented (OO) design experience.', 'Basic Qualifications: ', 'About ASC:', 'Advanced Scientific Concepts LLC, ASC, is the leading provider of global shutter flash LIDAR cameras for space, military, manned airborne, and thru-water markets. Flash LIDAR is the sensor modality of choice for navigation, object tracking, and situational awareness applications. ASC is located in beautiful Santa Barbara CA. We offer a competitive benefits package which includes medical / dental coverage, paid vacation, PTO / sick leave, and a 401K plan.', 'Working experience writing application programming interfaces (API), software libraries']

job_title: Sr. Data Analyst / Data Engineer – SQL / SSIS / PowerBI / Snowflake
job_text: ['', 'The role will be a split between traditional Data development, BI, and data project planning, and you will serve as a SME for Development and IT Departments. The role will require candidates to use SQL to query, scrub and validate data, and pull together key data points as requested by the business. Very strong SQL skills and a “data mindset” are required to be successful in this role.', 'Migration from On-Prem to SnowFlake HIGHLY DESIRED', 'Prior experience in Python', 'PREFERRED', 'Sr. Data Analyst / Data Engineer – SQL / SSIS / PowerBI / Snowflake', 'ABOUT THE POSITION', 'SnowFlake Cloud Platform', 'Salary:', 'Experience working with a star-schema data warehouse', 'PowerBI report building tools including online environment.', 'Salary:\xa0100k to 120k, plus excellent benefits. ', 'SnowFlake Cloud PlatformPrevious production experienceMigration from On-Prem to SnowFlake HIGHLY DESIREDPrior experience in Python', 'Delivering reporting or cloud-based data support', 'SQL / T-SQL', 'Previous production experience', 'PowerBI', 'GTN Technical Staffing is seeking a Sr. Data Analyst / Data Engineer for a Direct-Hire opportunity in Dallas, TX. We are looking for a Sr. Data Analyst / Data Engineer with a strong SQL, SSIS, and PowerBI background to contribute to a Data Analytics team. The Sr. Data Engineer will be responsible for SSIS and PowerBI development with over 40 TBs of data on SQL Server 2014. Our customer will be migrating to the Cloud (Snowflake) in 2021, and any previous experience with Cloud migrations or working with Snowflake for Data Analytics is highly desired.\xa0', 'DETAILS', 'Candidates must be able to create their own complex queries to query SQL Server 2014 databases.', '\xa0', 'Location:', 'Excellent communication skills and ability to engage with senior leaders and coworkers to design compelling dashboards that lead to actionable insights.', 'TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS', 'Data scrubbing, data cleansing, data validation', 'JIRA', 'Residency Requirements:\xa0', '5+ years in the following skill sets…', 'SQL / T-SQLCandidates must be able to create their own complex queries to query SQL Server 2014 databases.Data scrubbing, data cleansing, data validationExperience working with a star-schema data warehousePowerBIPowerBI report building tools including online environment.Delivering reporting or cloud-based data supportJIRAWorkflow management and project trackingExcellent communication skills and ability to engage with senior leaders and coworkers to design compelling dashboards that lead to actionable insights.', 'Residency Requirements:\xa0Only US Citizens and Green Card holders can be considered as the client is not offering sponsorship.', 'Workflow management and project tracking', 'Position Type:', 'Only Dallas/Fort Worth candidates can be considered. ', 'Position Type:\xa0Direct-Hire', 'Location:\xa0100% REMOTE until Q3\xa0of 2021, then onsite in Dallas afterwards. Only Dallas/Fort Worth candidates can be considered. ']

job_title: Lead Software Engineer - Transportation Management Systems (Remote)
job_text: ['', 'As a Lead Engineer at TJX, you will lead the design, development and implementation of products in the Transportation Management System and Logistics team.\xa0We are looking for a hands-on engineer ready to contribute to the delivery of a globally-distributed, high-uptime applications. This role leverages your experience in supply chain system design, development, and configuration.', 'In this role you’ll assist with leading the Supply Chain Solution Delivery Team in multiple IT disciplines including Functional, Non-Functional, Application Testing, Quality Assurance and Deployment disciplines for delivering our Transportation Management System. You’ll bring significant experience providing software engineering supporting the design of complex and enterprise scale systems to meet business needs for an international retail company. Provide technical leadership on designs that address critical business needs of a large-scale supply chain and logistics implementation of products across multiple sites.\xa0', 'Knowledge of & experience in multiple areas: programming language (e.g. Java, C# etc.), scripting language (Javascript, powershell, bash etc.) & database query language (SQL etc.).', 'Challenging, collaborative, and team-based environment', 'Demonstrated knowledge of Oracle database technologies - Oracle SQL, Store Procedures, and Business Intelligence.', 'Five (5) years’ development experience with transportation management or supply chain systems, (Blue Yonder/JDA or Manhattan Preferred)Demonstrated knowledge of Oracle database technologies - Oracle SQL, Store Procedures, and Business Intelligence.Knowledge of & experience in multiple areas: programming language (e.g. Java, C# etc.), scripting language (Javascript, powershell, bash etc.) & database query language (SQL etc.).', 'Global IT Organization which collaborates across U.S., Canada, Europe and Australia, click here to learn more', 'Inclusive culture and career growth opportunities', 'What you’ll do', 'What you’ll need', 'Minimum Qualifications', 'Lead Software Engineer - Transportation Management Systems', 'Inclusive culture and career growth opportunitiesGlobal IT Organization which collaborates across U.S., Canada, Europe and Australia, click here to learn moreChallenging, collaborative, and team-based environment', 'Five (5) years’ development experience with transportation management or supply chain systems, (Blue Yonder/JDA or Manhattan Preferred)', 'What you’ll discover', '\xa0']

job_title: Jr Data Analyst / SQL Server Developer
job_text: ['', 'Work on project teams to solve business problems with technological solutions.', 'Experience with SQL Server 2014, 2016 and 2017.', 'A bachelor’s degree in Business, Finance, Accounting, or Information Technology or equivalent combination of education and work experience.', 'Design, build and maintain SSAS cubes and data marts.', 'Possess an analytical mindset with exceptional problem-solving ability.', 'Description', 'Build strong relationships with key business stakeholders and technology partners.', 'Build skills in SSIS for data processing, retrieval and other transformation tasks.', 'Develop SQL queries for ad hoc data requests.', 'A bachelor’s degree in Business, Finance, Accounting, or Information Technology or equivalent combination of education and work experience. Strong verbal and written communication skills, for both technical and business audiences. Functional knowledge or direct experience with data modeling and data warehousing. Proficient in Excel using advanced features such as pivot tables, vlookup, etc. Functional knowledge of financial analysis, budgeting, forecasting and key performance indicators. Experience with SQL Server 2014, 2016 and 2017. Broad exposure with the SQL Server product stack, including Analysis Services (SSAS), Integration Services (SSIS), Reporting Services (SSRS) and Power BI. T-SQL development skills for building queries for data mining and analytics. Possess an analytical mindset with exceptional problem-solving ability. Demonstrate perpetual learning and improvement. ', 'Strong verbal and written communication skills, for both technical and business audiences.', 'Create/modify reports in SSRS and Power BI.', 'Broad exposure with the SQL Server product stack, including Analysis Services (SSAS), Integration Services (SSIS), Reporting Services (SSRS) and Power BI.', 'The Candidate Will Be Expected To', 'T-SQL development skills for building queries for data mining and analytics.', 'Demonstrate perpetual learning and improvement.', 'Work closely with our accounting team to assist with financial analysis and reporting.', 'Proficient in Excel using advanced features such as pivot tables, vlookup, etc.', 'Functional knowledge of financial analysis, budgeting, forecasting and key performance indicators.', 'Functional knowledge or direct experience with data modeling and data warehousing.', 'Effectively and clearly communicate with other employees in all departments and levels of management.', 'Build strong relationships with key business stakeholders and technology partners. Effectively and clearly communicate with other employees in all departments and levels of management. Work closely with our accounting team to assist with financial analysis and reporting. Design, build and maintain SSAS cubes and data marts. Create/modify reports in SSRS and Power BI. Develop SQL queries for ad hoc data requests. Build skills in SSIS for data processing, retrieval and other transformation tasks. Work on project teams to solve business problems with technological solutions. ']

For a full list, see our career page', 'Our team\xa0brings a diverse set of technical and cultural backgrounds and we like to\xa0think pragmatically in choosing the tools most appropriate for the job at hand. \xa0', 'You are passionate about using data to make a large impact on the product and the business.', 'Find out more information on the\xa0Doximity technology blog', 'Here are\xa0some of the ways we bring\xa0value to doctors', 'You are fluent in Python and SQL.', 'You will be contributing to at least one large or medium-sized data project at any given time.', "Here are\xa0some of the ways we bring\xa0value to doctorsOur\xa0web applications are\xa0built\xa0primarily\xa0using Ruby, Rails, Javascript (Vue.js), and\xa0a bit of\xa0GolangOur data engineering stack runs on Python, Snowflake, MySQL, Spark, and AirflowOur production application stack is hosted on AWS and we deploy to production on average 65 times per dayWe have over 450 private repositories in Github containing our applications, forks of gems, our own internal gems, and\xa0open-source projectsWe have worked as a distributed team for a long time;\xa0we're currently about 75%+ distributedFind out more information on the\xa0Doximity technology blogOur\xa0company core valuesOur\xa0recruiting processOur\xa0product development cycleOur\xa0on-boarding & mentorship process", 'Pre-IPO stock incentives', 'You will aid in iteration planning, retrospectives, and devise effective delegation strategies for you and your team.', "We have worked as a distributed team for a long time;\xa0we're currently about 75%+ distributed", 'Our\xa0recruiting process', 'Benefits & Perks', 'You default to concise and effective written and verbal communication.', 'Generous time off policy', 'About The Job', "One of Doximity's\xa0core values\xa0is stretching ourselves. Even if you don't check off all the boxes below we encourage you to apply. Doximity is full of exceptional people that don't fit a mold, join us!", 'Our\xa0on-boarding & mentorship process', 'You will review code, write technical proposals, and help your team grow by recruiting, training, and aiding in career progression plans.', 'Comprehensive benefits including medical, vision, dental, Life/ADD, 401k, flex spending accounts, commuter benefits, equipment budget, educational resources and conference access', 'You will contribute to the technical direction of software products.', 'About you', 'Our\xa0web applications are\xa0built\xa0primarily\xa0using Ruby, Rails, Javascript (Vue.js), and\xa0a bit of\xa0Golang', 'You are a data engineer at heart; excited to roll up your sleeves and help with hands-on data engineering problems.You have at least 2 years of experience as an Engineering Manager for a data-focused team of at least 3 members.You are passionate about helping others improve and grow their career by exercising coaching, mentorship, and delegation.You know what it takes to push major data projects through a development lifecycle.You are passionate about using data to make a large impact on the product and the business.You are fluent in Python and SQL.You have professional experience architecting, developing, and shipping data and ETL pipelines of all sizes. You do so through the lens of treating pipelines themselves as software.You understand the importance of carefully crafting and designing data models using methods like object-relational, entity-relationship, or dimensional modeling.You default to concise and effective written and verbal communication.Your leadership style is servant to the team and starts with empathy; you trust your team to make the right decision and empower them to execute.', 'We have over 450 private repositories in Github containing our applications, forks of gems, our own internal gems, and\xa0open-source projects', 'You are passionate about helping others improve and grow their career by exercising coaching, mentorship, and delegation.', 'Your leadership style is servant to the team and starts with empathy; you trust your team to make the right decision and empower them to execute.', 'You know what it takes to push major data projects through a development lifecycle.', 'You have at least 2 years of experience as an Engineering Manager for a data-focused team of at least 3 members.', '.. and much more! For a full list, see our career page', 'You are a data engineer at heart; excited to roll up your sleeves and help with hands-on data engineering problems.', '\ufeffDoximity is proud to be an equal opportunity employer, and committed to providing employment opportunities regardless of race, religious creed, color, national origin, ancestry, physical disability, mental disability, medical condition, genetic information, marital status, sex, gender, gender identity, gender expression, pregnancy, childbirth and breastfeeding, age, sexual orientation, military or veteran status, or any other protected classification. We also consider qualified applicants with criminal histories, consistent with applicable federal, state and local law.\xa0', 'We’re thrilled to be named the Fastest Growing Company in the Bay Area, and one of Fast Company’s Most Innovative Companies. Joining Doximity means being part of an incredibly talented and humble team. We work on amazing products that over 70% of US doctors (and over one million healthcare professionals) use to make their busy lives a little easier. We’re driven by the goal of improving inefficiencies in our $3.5 trillion U.S. healthcare system and love creating technology that has a real, meaningful impact on people’s lives. To learn more about our team, culture, and users, check out our careers page, company blog, and engineering blog. We’re growing steadily, and there’s plenty of opportunities for you to make an impact.', "Doximity is transforming the healthcare industry. Our mission is to help doctors be more productive, informed, and connected. As a software engineer focused on our data stack, you'll work within cross-functional delivery teams alongside other engineers, designers, and product managers in building software to help improve healthcare.\xa0", 'You will play a liaison role alongside Data, Product, and Engineering teams. Fostering relationships with other engineering managers, product managers and technical leads.', 'You will play a liaison role alongside Data, Product, and Engineering teams. Fostering relationships with other engineering managers, product managers and technical leads.You will contribute to the technical direction of software products.You will aid in iteration planning, retrospectives, and devise effective delegation strategies for you and your team.You will review code, write technical proposals, and help your team grow by recruiting, training, and aiding in career progression plans.You will strive to keep the team pragmatic, shipping, and focused on adding business value while maintaining a cohesive software stack.You will be contributing to at least one large or medium-sized data project at any given time.', 'Family support and planning benefits', "As a Data Engineering Manager at Doximity, we expect you to support and enable 3-7 data engineers in doing the best work of their careers. You will do this through strong leadership skills combined with technical expertise and product familiarity. Indeed, we expect you to be an excellent manager but also to roll-up your sleeves and make technical contributions. Our belief in technical leaders is so strong that your first six months at Doximity will consist of ramping up as an individual contributor. During this time, you will develop your product context and learn the data team's engineering patterns before tackling any leadership challenges.", 'Our\xa0product development cycle', 'Our data engineering stack runs on Python, Snowflake, MySQL, Spark, and Airflow', 'You have professional experience architecting, developing, and shipping data and ETL pipelines of all sizes. You do so through the lens of treating pipelines themselves as software.', 'Our production application stack is hosted on AWS and we deploy to production on average 65 times per day', 'About us', 'You will strive to keep the team pragmatic, shipping, and focused on adding business value while maintaining a cohesive software stack.', 'Our\xa0company core values']

Proficiency in Microsoft Office: Excel, Word, Access; Microsoft Outlook; Internet. Business Analysis Knowledge: Skilled to work in a fast-paced environment. You approach data with scientific rigor but bring a practical approach to product delivery   Strong communication skills, ability to work through and verbalize problems in a collaborative setting   Advanced technical skills with various programming languages and tools. Have Fun: Plan and participate in events like field day, baseball games, ski trips and happy hours. ['', 'About the Role', 'Within 6 months, you will', 'Freedom and responsibility - we aim to provide you with the tools and support you need to carry ideas through to fruition. With that, we expect you to be diligent in your work and learn from your mistakes to optimize final outcomes.', 'Focus on code quality with meaningful test coverage and legibility.Contribute to our agile culture through retrospective meetings and more.', 'Focus on code quality with meaningful test coverage and legibility.', 'Coordinate product dependencies and lead major features through development to production.Take point on significant new functionality and/or platform improvements.', 'Aligned values of ownership, empathy for our users; tenants, property owners, and property managers, and your co-workers.', 'Our values', 'You have:', 'Pure is a next-generation platform providing timely, unbiased service for tenants, property owners, and property managers.', "We're looking for experienced software engineers who enjoy seeing the impact of their ideas and their actions on users. We operate a lightweight agile development process and give our team the freedom and autonomy to do the right thing, and the support to validate their ideas and carry them forward to production.", 'Strong communication skills in addition to your coding ability.', 'Coordinate product dependencies and lead major features through development to production.', 'Collaborate regularly with your fellow engineers, and product lead to deliver value to our users.', 'Strong communication skills in addition to your coding ability.An appreciation and skill writing tests, including TDD where appropriate.Aligned values of ownership, empathy for our users; tenants, property owners, and property managers, and your co-workers.', 'We use software where it shines; removing or reducing the time-consuming tasks for property managers, while ensuring owners get paid on time, and tenants receive efficient service and safe, pleasant accommodation.', 'Get regular team feedback on your code through code reviews and pair-programming.', 'Contribute to our agile culture through retrospective meetings and more.', 'Doing more than just writing code; contributing to the business as a whole.', 'Our group is small today, but growing. We like others who are passionate about their craft and enjoy collaborating with others, and seeing their contributions through to production and the impact they have on our users.', 'Within 12 month, you will', 'Working closely with design, product, and other engineers to hone ideas and concepts.', 'An appreciation and skill writing tests, including TDD where appropriate.', 'Equal Opportunities & Equitability', 'Take point on significant new functionality and/or platform improvements.', 'Fight with a light-saber.', "While we're a new company, we know we value the following:", 'Within 1 month, you will', 'Develop and deploy changes to our production systems.Collaborate regularly with your fellow engineers, and product lead to deliver value to our users.Get regular team feedback on your code through code reviews and pair-programming.', 'About PURE', 'You enjoy:', 'Within 3 months, you will', 'Develop and deploy changes to our production systems.', "Team support - growing a business is a team sport. We're looking for people who are kind to their teammates and in both their words and actions.", 'Working across the full stack, utilizing VueJS, Javascript, Docker, MongoDB, Postgres.', 'User empathy - our users define our business. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, veteran status, disability status, marital status, citizenship status, or any other legally protected characteristics.', 'Engineering Timeline']

['', 'If this sounds exciting, we’d like to hear from you. Domain/ML experience not expected.', 'As a Software Engineer on the Explainable AI Team, you’ll design and develop the next generation of glass-box artificial intelligence. We are bridging the human-machine gap in ML, enabling humans to understand, debug, and fine-tune models automatically generated by machine learning systems.', 'You enjoy thinking about how people think. You’re excited to make something complex appear simple and intuitive to users.', 'We are pretty tech-agnostic, but use React/TypeScript on the front-end and will use OCaml or another FP language on the back-end.', 'Our Engineering Team', 'As a Software Engineer on the Explainable AI Team', 'What you’ll do', 'About you', '\ufeffInstabase is an equal opportunity employer and values diversity in all forms.\xa0We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender identity, sexual orientation, age, marital status, protected veteran status, disability, or any other unlawful factor.\xa0Instabase complies with local laws, including the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance.', 'Our Engineering Team\xa0architects the underlying operating system, core services, platform infrastructure, dev toolkits, core algorithms, machine learning models, packaged end-user apps, and app store marketplace. Instabase engineers are excited to solve hard problems for complex organizations and are self-starters from day one.', 'Find heuristically performant solutions to NP-hard algorithmic problems.', 'At Instabase, we’re passionate about building software to advance the state of the art in computing. We’ve built a fearlessly experimental, customer-obsessed team who are making discoveries to fundamentally change how people build and consume business applications.\xa0', 'At Instabase', 'You like getting to the bottom of deep, complex problems. You aren’t satisfied with “it works” until you understand why.', 'Build intuitive user interfaces for visualizing, tweaking, and debugging the internals of AI models.', 'Research, design, and implement program synthesis and modeling techniques for understanding documents from sparse datasets.', 'You’re curious. You’re into math or programming language design.', 'Research, design, and implement program synthesis and modeling techniques for understanding documents from sparse datasets.Build intuitive user interfaces for visualizing, tweaking, and debugging the internals of AI models.Find heuristically performant solutions to NP-hard algorithmic problems.Design data structures and APIs that span a deep and complex stack, from a sophisticated front-end down to a core inference engine.', 'Design data structures and APIs that span a deep and complex stack, from a sophisticated front-end down to a core inference engine.', 'Today, we’re partnering with the world’s leading companies to transform how they use data and technology. If these challenges excite you, we’d love to hear from you!\xa0', 'You’re curious. You’re into math or programming language design.You enjoy thinking about how people think. You’re excited to make something complex appear simple and intuitive to users.You like getting to the bottom of deep, complex problems. You aren’t satisfied with “it works” until you understand why.We are pretty tech-agnostic, but use React/TypeScript on the front-end and will use OCaml or another FP language on the back-end.If this sounds exciting, we’d like to hear from you. Domain/ML experience not expected.']

['', 'Responsibilities', 'Qualifications', ' Bachelors Degree in Operations Research, Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, Industrial Engineering, or related field from an accredited college or university with 1+ years of professional services experience  Professional knowledge of advanced analytical concepts, particularly ModSim (Modeling & Simulation), Optimization and Machine Learning;  Experience utilizing a strong mathematical background with advanced knowledge in one or more of the following fields: discrete optimization, integer programming (including commercial optimization solvers), discrete-event simulation, dynamic programming, local search heuristics, genetic algorithms, or other metaheuristics  Proficiency in programming languages (e.g. Python, R, C++, Julia), data analysis packages (e.g.scikit-learn, pyomo) as well as the ability to implement, maintain, debug and test; experience in commercial optimization solvers (e.g. CPLEX, Gurobi, Xpress)  Experience in software development using version control (Git), unit testing, Jira, and Confluence.  Ability to work with team members and clients to assess needs, provide assistance, and resolve problems, using excellent problem-solving skills, verbal/written communication, and the ability to present and explain technical concepts to business audiences  Professional experience with high proficiency in the use of Microsoft Office programs (Word, PowerPoint, Excel)  Active DoD Secret or DoD Top Secret (TS) clearance nice to have  Ability to travel up to 80% of the time; Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States without the need for visa sponsorship now or in the future ', ' Come up with innovative, repeatable, business use cases for real world optimization techniques, and quickly develop prototypes to test these use cases ', ' Bachelors Degree in Operations Research, Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, Industrial Engineering, or related field from an accredited college or university with 1+ years of professional services experience ', ' Experience utilizing a strong mathematical background with advanced knowledge in one or more of the following fields: discrete optimization, integer programming (including commercial optimization solvers), discrete-event simulation, dynamic programming, local search heuristics, genetic algorithms, or other metaheuristics ', ' Ability to travel up to 80% of the time; Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States without the need for visa sponsorship now or in the future ', ' Ability to work with team members and clients to assess needs, provide assistance, and resolve problems, using excellent problem-solving skills, verbal/written communication, and the ability to present and explain technical concepts to business audiences ', ' Apply various optimization techniques to generate solutions to large-scale optimization problems for KPMG clients, such as resource planning, scheduling, facility location, portfolio optimization, and pricing/revenue optimization. Techniques include but are not limited to linear/mixed-integer programming with commercial (e.g. CPLEX) as well as open-source solvers (e.g. CBC), dynamic programming, heuristics, metaheuristics, and more.  Develop and employ simulation models (Discrete Event, Agent-Based, and System Dynamics modeling) by using simulation software AnyLogic (Preferred), NetLogo, Simulink and/or ARENA  Process structured, unstructured and semi-structured data and apply data cleaning, data imputation and feature engineering methods prior to developing models  Develop predictive models using Machine Learning (e.g. classification, clustering, regression, dimensionality reduction methods), Natural Language Processing (OCR, information extraction), and statistical analysis methods such as time-series analysis,statistical inference, and validation tools;perform exploratory data analyses, generate and test working hypotheses, prepare and analyze historical data, and identify patterns  Work directly with KPMG clients and stakeholders to present and explain the key techniques and major results generated using non-technical language; understand client feedback and be able to accommodate it into model through programming  Come up with innovative, repeatable, business use cases for real world optimization techniques, and quickly develop prototypes to test these use cases  Utilize a diverse array of technologies and tools as needed, to deliver insights, such as Python, R, Julia, C++, Tableau, and more ', 'Description', ' Professional knowledge of advanced analytical concepts, particularly ModSim (Modeling & Simulation), Optimization and Machine Learning; ', ' Process structured, unstructured and semi-structured data and apply data cleaning, data imputation and feature engineering methods prior to developing models ', ' Work directly with KPMG clients and stakeholders to present and explain the key techniques and major results generated using non-technical language; understand client feedback and be able to accommodate it into model through programming ', ' Active DoD Secret or DoD Top Secret (TS) clearance nice to have ', ' Develop predictive models using Machine Learning (e.g. classification, clustering, regression, dimensionality reduction methods), Natural Language Processing (OCR, information extraction), and statistical analysis methods such as time-series analysis,statistical inference, and validation tools;perform exploratory data analyses, generate and test working hypotheses, prepare and analyze historical data, and identify patterns ', ' Professional experience with high proficiency in the use of Microsoft Office programs (Word, PowerPoint, Excel) ', ' Utilize a diverse array of technologies and tools as needed, to deliver insights, such as Python, R, Julia, C++, Tableau, and more ', ' Experience in software development using version control (Git), unit testing, Jira, and Confluence. ', ' Apply various optimization techniques to generate solutions to large-scale optimization problems for KPMG clients, such as resource planning, scheduling, facility location, portfolio optimization, and pricing/revenue optimization. Techniques include but are not limited to linear/mixed-integer programming with commercial (e.g. CPLEX) as well as open-source solvers (e.g. CBC), dynamic programming, heuristics, metaheuristics, and more. ', ' Proficiency in programming languages (e.g. Python, R, C++, Julia), data analysis packages (e.g.scikit-learn, pyomo) as well as the ability to implement, maintain, debug and test; experience in commercial optimization solvers (e.g. CPLEX, Gurobi, Xpress) ', 'Requisition Number:', ' Develop and employ simulation models (Discrete Event, Agent-Based, and System Dynamics modeling) by using simulation software AnyLogic (Preferred), NetLogo, Simulink and/or ARENA ']

job_title: Senior Data Engineer (Python, Spark, Airflow, AWS)
job_text: ['', 'Write code to ingest new data sources at high scale', '5-7+ years implementing data engineering and distributed systems.\xa0', 'Design, develop, and implement distributed data systems using Spark or similar technologies to ingest incoming data at scale.\xa0', 'Collaborate with data scientists to implement validation and/or data quality enhancements.', 'As one of the members of this business-critical team, you will:', 'Evaluate new technologies for continuous improvements in Data Engineering.', 'We Breathe Life Into Data', 'What you bring to Komodo Health:\xa0', 'At Komodo Health, our mission is to reduce the global burden of disease. Smarter use of data is essential to this mission. We combine the world’s most comprehensive view of patient encounters with innovative algorithms and decades of clinical expertise to power our Healthcare Map, the industry’s most precise view of the U.S. healthcare system. With the Healthcare Map as our foundation, we offer a suite of powerful software applications that deliver exceptional value to the industry.', 'Basic knowledge (college level or hands on) of machine learning and statistics.', 'Ability to work as part of a collaborative team in a fast-paced environment.', 'Design, develop, and implement distributed data systems using Spark or similar technologies to ingest incoming data at scale.\xa0Create automation systems and tools to configure, monitor, and orchestrate the data services and data pipelines.Evaluate new technologies for continuous improvements in Data Engineering.Collaborate with data scientists to implement validation and/or data quality enhancements.', 'The Opportunity at Komodo Health', 'Nice to have:', 'Our people are the center of our success. We are a smart, supportive team with diverse perspectives and a shared passion for fixing what’s broken in healthcare. It’s fun, challenging and important. Join us!', 'BS/MS in Computer Science, related degrees or relevant technical experience.', 'After three months, you will:\xa0', 'Building and deploying large-scale, complex data services and data pipelines.', 'Python development', 'You are an experienced technologist who has a proven track record of designing and building large scale solutions using big data technologies, ideally using Spark, Airflow and Python.\xa0', 'Sincere interest in working at a healthcare startup and passion for healthcare data.', 'Pipeline scheduling and monitoring systems, like Airflow or Luigi', 'Data processing platforms such as Spark, Hadoop, etc.', 'Help architect and implement new data ingestion framework', 'We are looking for an experienced Data Engineer on the Healthcare Map / Data Platform team to play a key role in enabling Komodo scalability. In this role, you will have the opportunity to help solve complex challenges and be a part of a great team. Our engineering team is currently about 90 and growing rapidly. You will be able to use one of the biggest, most complete healthcare datasets to solve real world problems that deliver value to clients and positive impact on the world.\xa0Some of the tools we use are: Python, Snowflake, Airflow, AWS EMR, AWS Lambda, Spark, AWS EKS, and Docker.', 'Create automation systems and tools to configure, monitor, and orchestrate the data services and data pipelines.', 'Help operate existing data sources', 'Help architect and implement new data ingestion frameworkWrite code to ingest new data sources at high scaleHelp operate existing data sources', 'BS/MS in Computer Science, related degrees or relevant technical experience.5-7+ years implementing data engineering and distributed systems.\xa0Building and deploying large-scale, complex data services and data pipelines.Python developmentPipeline scheduling and monitoring systems, like Airflow or LuigiData processing platforms such as Spark, Hadoop, etc.Ability to work as part of a collaborative team in a fast-paced environment.Sincere interest in working at a healthcare startup and passion for healthcare data.']

['', "We are located in the heart of Irvine's technology hub in UCI Research Park. We offer all full-time employees unlimited paid time off to allow our team members to properly recharge, competitive base salaries, bonuses, equity, and affordable health coverage with generous company contributions.", 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or relevant field.5+ years’ experience as a DevOps Engineer or equivalent software-engineering role.Deep knowledge in code deployment tools, expertise in TFS/Azure DevOps.Maintain and troubleshoot .NET applications.Experience in network, server, and application-status monitoring.Working knowledge of software-automation production systems (Jenkins and Selenium).Expertise in software development methodologies.Experience using a scripting language such as Perl, PowerShell or Python and know DevOps tools like CloudFormation or Terraform.Working knowledge of databases and proficiency in MS SQL Server.You possess a problem-solving attitude.You can work independently and as part of a team.', 'Where You’ll Work:', 'Develop and maintain cloud infrastructure design and troubleshooting documentation.', 'You can work independently and as part of a team.', 'You possess a problem-solving attitude.', 'Deep knowledge in code deployment tools, expertise in TFS/Azure DevOps.', 'Develop\xa0and maintain network, system and application monitoring and utilize that in an actionable manner: alerting and automation (scaling)', 'Experience using a scripting language such as Perl, PowerShell or Python and know DevOps tools like CloudFormation or Terraform.', 'Analyze code and communicate detailed reviews to development teams to ensure a marked improvement in applications and the timely completion of projects.', "As our\xa0DevOps Engineer, you will work as part of a passionate agile project team to ensure every software deployment and release meets the quality standards our customers have come to rely on. You will wear many hats as a software developer responsible for building software releases and testing new code; as an automation expert using tools that automate the development, testing and integration of software releases/fixes; as a release manager who ensures each and every release is stable and; as a security officer, continually monitoring our product's health and security after update deployment. Specifically, you will: ", 'Cloudvirga is a FinTech startup that is disrupting the lending industry with an intelligent consumer point of sale platform. We’re tackling the home loan process, while creating a better experience for consumers, reducing loan costs and time to close, and eliminating the hassle of multiple touch points. We encourage our employees to be innovative and we empower our teams to deliver creative solutions to automate the trillion-dollar home loan market. Having been adopted by several top lenders in the country, Cloudvirga is one of the fastest growing companies in this space!', 'Design, develop, and implement software that defines and evolves our infrastructure.', 'Experience in network, server, and application-status monitoring.', 'What You’ll Need', '\xa0DevOps Engineer', 'Conduct systems tests for security, performance, and availability.', 'Apply both on-premise (Hyper-V, VMware) and cloud (AWS, Azure) computing skills to deploy upgrades and fixes.', 'Implement automation tools and frameworks (CI/CD pipelines).', 'Working knowledge of databases and proficiency in MS SQL Server.', 'Cloudvirga is a FinTech startup that is disrupting the lending industry with an intelligent consumer point of sale platform. We’re tackling the home loan process, while creating a better experience for consumers, reducing loan costs and time to close, and eliminating the hassle of multiple touch points.', 'Cloudvirga strives to make the process of securing a mortgage easier for consumers while making the American Dream more achievable. Our digital mortgage platform radically cuts mortgage loan costs, increases transparency and reduces the time to close a loan. We process over $200 billion in loans per year for some of the largest mortgage lenders in the US as we help them reduce the time and cost to manufacture a loan.\xa0', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or relevant field.', 'Optimize the company’s computing architecture.', 'Collaborate with team members to improve the company’s engineering tools, systems and procedures, and data security.', 'Apply both on-premise (Hyper-V, VMware) and cloud (AWS, Azure) computing skills to deploy upgrades and fixes.Design, develop, and implement software that defines and evolves our infrastructure.Troubleshoot production issues and coordinate with the development team to streamline code deployment.Implement automation tools and frameworks (CI/CD pipelines).Analyze code and communicate detailed reviews to development teams to ensure a marked improvement in applications and the timely completion of projects.Collaborate with team members to improve the company’s engineering tools, systems and procedures, and data security.Optimize the company’s computing architecture.Conduct systems tests for security, performance, and availability.Develop and maintain cloud infrastructure design and troubleshooting documentation.Develop\xa0and maintain network, system and application monitoring and utilize that in an actionable manner: alerting and automation (scaling)', 'Maintain and troubleshoot .NET applications.', 'What You’ll Do', 'Troubleshoot production issues and coordinate with the development team to streamline code deployment.', '5+ years’ experience as a DevOps Engineer or equivalent software-engineering role.', 'Expertise in software development methodologies.', 'Working knowledge of software-automation production systems (Jenkins and Selenium).']

job_title: Sr. Data Engineer - Prediction and Behavior Modeling
job_text: ['', 'Help translate algorithms into production-level code', 'We are looking to add a highly talented Prediction and Behavior Modeling Sr. Data Engineer to help us build probabilistic models of the future state of the world. As a software engineer, you will help design, measure, test, and visualize the performance of motion prediction models that we use to improve our interactions with cars, pedestrians, and other road users. Your software engineering and data analytics experience will inform your pragmatic approach to making a more intelligent autonomous vehicle. Does this sound like you?', 'Bonus points (not required):', 'Experience working with large data sets', 'Develop real-time visualizations of our estimates of the future state of the world', 'Dive into data to understand behaviors of external world actors such as cars, bikes, and pedestrians; leverage machine learning methods where appropriateHelp translate algorithms into production-level codeHelp implement and evaluate a variety of ML modelsDefine, implement, and visualize performance metricsDevelop real-time visualizations of our estimates of the future state of the world', 'Experience using common Machine Learning and Deep Learning algorithms (e.g., for classification, regression, and clustering)Experience developing autonomous vehicles or robotsExperience with C++', 'Fluency with Python, including standard scientific computing libraries', "What you'll be doing:", "What we're looking for:", 'Dive into data to understand behaviors of external world actors such as cars, bikes, and pedestrians; leverage machine learning methods where appropriate', 'The Motional Santa Monica office is located in the heart of 3rd Street Promenade in Santa Monica at 312 Arizona Avenue. With all the modern amenities for productive work and play, it is steps away from the popular pedestrian outdoor shopping area and Santa Monica beach.', 'Experience with C++', 'Help implement and evaluate a variety of ML models', 'Experience using modern software engineering tools (e.g., version control, CI)', 'BS in computer science, engineering, or applied math with 3+ years practical experience in data science, modeling, statistics, and analysis of large data setsFluency with Python, including standard scientific computing librariesExperience working with large data setsExperience using modern software engineering tools (e.g., version control, CI)', 'Experience using common Machine Learning and Deep Learning algorithms (e.g., for classification, regression, and clustering)', 'Experience developing autonomous vehicles or robots', 'Define, implement, and visualize performance metrics', 'BS in computer science, engineering, or applied math with 3+ years practical experience in data science, modeling, statistics, and analysis of large data sets']

Our market-leading product is used and loved by companies such as Turner, Disney, NASA, Snapchat, BBC, BuzzFeed, TED, Adobe, Udemy, and many more.', 'Requirements', 'All-company week-long winter and summer breaks', 'Contribute to our analytics infrastructure by continuing to build and extend on top of our data models with an eye towards performance and maintainability', 'Hands-on experience with data modeling and reporting in data visualization tools such as Looker, Tableau or a similar tool', 'Apply software engineering best practices to the analytics workflow (ex: version control, testing)', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills with the ability to explain technical concepts to a non-technical audience', 'We’re seeking a talented Sr. Analytics Engineer to support our data-driven culture and our growing data consumption needs. As a software company serving more than 1 million users to date, we’re sitting on billions of rows of transactional data that powers our application, activity data captured through Segment, customer traits and communication data from a variety of marketing and sales tools, financial data from Stripe and Salesforce, and a multitude of others from which new opportunities can be unlocked.', "We’re proud to be an equal opportunity employer, and are committed to providing all employees with a work environment that celebrates individuality and remains free from any form of discrimination and harassment. We base our employment decisions on the needs of our business, job requirements, and applicants' qualifications. In other words, we only care that you’re the best person for the job."]

['', ' Ensure the quality of solutions configured through data validation and UAT testing. Responsible for creating data driven solutions and business insights that help answer complex business problems. Conceptualize, develop, implement, and maintain reporting solutions for monitoring and analyzing business performance for wide audiences within Power BI. Maintain Power BI visualization suite including report access, building new reports, dashboards, and visualization solutions, and app creation while adhering to reporting standards and best practices. Translate end-user requirements into technical specifications for development and BI teams. Tell stories with data, and help our business make data driven decisions through data visualization and BI reporting. Develop and document test plans, new procedures, training, and communications for end-users. Perform and document data analysis, data validation, and data mapping/design. Play a key role in planning and delivery of BI solutions, integrations and analysis. Desired Skills and Experience Bachelor’s Degree in related field preferred Experience with reporting and data visualization tools such as Power BI, SSRS, Tableau, or similar BI tools. Relational database foundational understanding plus data modeling experience Experience with T-SQL, DAX, and Power Pivot, & Power Query Programming preferred but not required: KQL, JavaScript. Adaptable, observant, and approachable with a strong collaborative spirit. Results-oriented with a robust drive to accomplish objectives and meet high standards. Superior critical thinking and creative problem-solving skills. Excellent organizational, verbal, and written communication skills. Understanding of and complete alignment with n2y culture, mission, and values.', 'Responsibilities']

['5+ years of experience wrangling and analyzing data using a scientific programming language and statistical analysis software; more experience is welcome ', ' ', 'Design and prototype electrical test stands to meet data collection requirements for testing Form Energy’s electrochemical reactors ', 'Provide hands-on support for initiating and monitoring large-scale battery prototype testing ', "What you'll do:", "What you'll need:", 'Wrangle and analyze data from new performance qualification tests; automate data analysis with a scientific programming language Design and prototype electrical test stands to meet data collection requirements for testing Form Energy’s electrochemical reactors Aggregate data analysis and testing requirements from an interdisciplinary team of engineers all contributing to the reactor development effort Collaborate with team members developing Form Energy’s automated data pipeline to introduce new data sources and automated analysis methods Provide hands-on support for initiating and monitoring large-scale battery prototype testing ', 'We are looking for a Senior Test Engineer to aid in qualifying the performance of the core energy-storing reactor for implementation in a long duration energy storage system. The Test Engineer will be responsible for wrangling data from new performance qualification test protocols and automating data analysis with Python scripts and statistical analysis software (i.e., JMP). The Test Engineer will also be responsible for designing, prototyping, and validating electrical test stands to qualify the performance of Form Energy’s battery systems. Additionally, this role will support defining the operational build and test workflow aimed at advancing Form Energy’s product development efforts. The Test Engineer II will collaborate with design engineers for the energy-storing reactor, software developers creating our automated data analysis pipeline, and the technical operations team managing the test lab. The ideal candidate will exhibit advanced programming skills in a scientific programming language (i.e., Python, MATLAB) and have experience designing custom electrical test systems composed of off the shelf hardware (i.e., DAQs, power supplies, amplifiers). ', 'Familiarity with statistical analysis software, such as JMP, Minitab, or similar', 'Aggregate data analysis and testing requirements from an interdisciplinary team of engineers all contributing to the reactor development effort ', 'Role Description', '5+ years of experience designing hardware data acquisition and electrical test systems; more experience is welcomeAdvanced programming skills in Python, MATLAB or similar language ', 'BS degree (or higher) in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering or Mechanical Engineering ', "What you'll do: ", 'Wrangle and analyze data from new performance qualification tests; automate data analysis with a scientific programming language ', 'Collaborate with team members developing Form Energy’s automated data pipeline to introduce new data sources and automated analysis methods ', 'Role Description ', "What you'll need: ", 'BS degree (or higher) in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering or Mechanical Engineering 5+ years of experience wrangling and analyzing data using a scientific programming language and statistical analysis software; more experience is welcome 5+ years of experience designing hardware data acquisition and electrical test systems; more experience is welcomeAdvanced programming skills in Python, MATLAB or similar language Familiarity with statistical analysis software, such as JMP, Minitab, or similar']

['', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills with the ability to tailor messaging based on the audience.\xa0', 'Key Responsibilities', 'Develop new machine learning models using multiple and new data inputs to derive estimated and predictive market measures. Optimize and calibrate models to improve accuracy.', 'Act as both a leader and a doer moving machine learning applications from conception to prototype.', 'Experience not only in the development of machine learning models, but the operationalization of those models to support automation and transition to a production environment.', '4+ years of experience developing, deploying, and optimizing machine learning algorithms.Experience working on AI-driven B2B products.3+ years’ experience embedded or partnered with a business organization to drive tangible results and revenue.Demonstrated success in solving business problems using a diverse skill set in data management, processing, and modeling.Strong programming skills in python, R, and SQL, and experience applying analytical and statistical methods leveraging those languages.Experience with SAS desirable.Experience not only in the development of machine learning models, but the operationalization of those models to support automation and transition to a production environment.Proven ability working in a cloud-based architecture.Visualization and communication of analytic results.Excellent written and verbal communication skills with the ability to tailor messaging based on the audience.\xa0An understanding and acceptance that preparatory data cleansing and processing is core to successful modeling. \xa0This role will be governed by this principle.\xa0Exposure to or experience modeling “alternative” data such as geolocation, financial transaction, passive metering, or clickstream to solve business problems is a plus.', 'The NPD Group, Inc. is an Affirmative Action/Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by law.', 'Partner with global stakeholders across different business verticals to understand customer needs, gaps and strengths in current data, and current methods and data operations.\xa0', 'Work with vendors and third-party data suppliers to optimize data inputs according to model needs and outcomes.', 'Position Overview', 'Experience working on AI-driven B2B products.', 'A blend of education and professional experience demonstrating both business and data savvy is required for this role.\xa0', 'Qualifications:', 'In addition to core modeling skills, the role requires strong analytical and data processing aptitude, and an ability to quickly integrate new ideas into functional prototypes poised to scale. \xa0The successful candidate will be a highly motivated team player with wide-ranging curiosity and creativity, along with common sense and a demonstrated ability to produce high-quality outcomes from methodologies to models to processes.', 'Explore new techniques for providing prescriptive and predictive analytics from existing data.', 'Learn and work on meaningful initiatives with some of the best and brightest in the market research industry. The NPD Group provides the world’s most successful brands with leading market research, combining consumer and retail point-of-sale data with analytic solutions to interpret today’s market trends while anticipating tomorrow’s. In addition, we offer a career filled with innovation and growth to the forward-thinking problem solvers who join our team.', 'An understanding and acceptance that preparatory data cleansing and processing is core to successful modeling. \xa0This role will be governed by this principle.\xa0', 'Visualization and communication of analytic results.', '4+ years of experience developing, deploying, and optimizing machine learning algorithms.', 'NPD Group is charting the future of retail analytics. You will be leading the way in applying machine learning to expand the breadth and the value that our insights deliver to customers. In bringing your expertise to our groundbreaking innovation team, you will collaborate with team members to prototype new methods and modeling techniques using diverse sets of data inputs. You will create and apply strategies for normalization, estimation, prediction, calibration, and optimization in addition to developing new techniques for deriving insight. \xa0', 'Experience with SAS desirable.', 'Exposure to or experience modeling “alternative” data such as geolocation, financial transaction, passive metering, or clickstream to solve business problems is a plus.', 'Partner with global stakeholders across different business verticals to understand customer needs, gaps and strengths in current data, and current methods and data operations.\xa0Develop new machine learning models using multiple and new data inputs to derive estimated and predictive market measures. Optimize and calibrate models to improve accuracy.Explore new techniques for providing prescriptive and predictive analytics from existing data.Work with vendors and third-party data suppliers to optimize data inputs according to model needs and outcomes.Document modeling procedures and transfer learnings and knowledge to other organizational stakeholders.Act as both a leader and a doer moving machine learning applications from conception to prototype.', '3+ years’ experience embedded or partnered with a business organization to drive tangible results and revenue.', 'Strong programming skills in python, R, and SQL, and experience applying analytical and statistical methods leveraging those languages.', 'Demonstrated success in solving business problems using a diverse skill set in data management, processing, and modeling.', 'Proven ability working in a cloud-based architecture.', 'Document modeling procedures and transfer learnings and knowledge to other organizational stakeholders.']

job_title: Entry Level Process Improvement "Software" Engineer- (ISO 9001 / CMMI / Auditing) – (Remote)
job_text: ['', 'Support customer engagements in all aspects of documentation quality, technical writing, quality audits and training. ', 'Summary', 'You have 2+ years of relevant experience in Process Improvement/ISO 9001/CMMI/auditing in a software development environment.', 'What You Will Do', 'Maintain alignment to the ISO 9001, CMMI-DEV and CMMI-SVC models and the PMBok.', 'CMMI Associate', ' Support customer engagements in all aspects of documentation quality, technical writing, quality audits and training.  Work closely with the PD’s, PM’s and support leads throughout CNSI on all customer and internal engagements. Lead the CNSI EPG meetings, tracking and reporting. Ensure CNSI processes and practices are aligned with CMMI V2.0 practices. Assist in maintaining and enhancing the process asset library to improve value and/or to respond to changing needs. Establish and maintain the process and tools for the intake, prioritization, and tracking of improvement ideas. Facilitate integration and harmonization of new business unit processes and procedures into the enterprise operating model. Maintain alignment to the ISO 9001, CMMI-DEV and CMMI-SVC models and the PMBok. ', 'You must be able to work on multiple projects at the same time.', 'You must be able to adjust quickly and smoothly to shifting needs and company/departmental priorities.', 'Ensure CNSI processes and practices are aligned with CMMI V2.0 practices.', 'You have demonstrated experience using CMMI and ISO 9001.', 'Assist in maintaining and enhancing the process asset library to improve value and/or to respond to changing needs.', 'Facilitate integration and harmonization of new business unit processes and procedures into the enterprise operating model.', 'You have 2+ years of experience leading and/or participating in process Change control boards.', ' You have 2+ years of relevant experience in Process Improvement/ISO 9001/CMMI/auditing in a software development environment. You have 2+ years of experience in roles that involved working directly with clients to understand the client’s quality and process requirements. You have 2+ years of experience leading and/or participating in process Change control boards. You have demonstrated experience using CMMI and ISO 9001. You have demonstrated experience creating process flow diagrams. You must be able to work on multiple projects at the same time. You must be able to interact positively and effectively with others including the ability to work well in a team environment. You must be able to adjust quickly and smoothly to shifting needs and company/departmental priorities. If you have any of the following certifications, it would be “a plus”: CMMI Associate ISO Lead Auditor CMMI High Maturity   ', 'Working remotely within the United States is acceptable for this position.', 'About Us', 'Establish and maintain the process and tools for the intake, prioritization, and tracking of improvement ideas.', 'Who You Are', 'CMMI High Maturity', 'You must be able to interact positively and effectively with others including the ability to work well in a team environment.', 'Work closely with the PD’s, PM’s and support leads throughout CNSI on all customer and internal engagements.', 'ISO Lead Auditor', 'You have 2+ years of experience in roles that involved working directly with clients to understand the client’s quality and process requirements.', 'If you have any of the following certifications, it would be “a plus”: CMMI Associate ISO Lead Auditor CMMI High Maturity  ', 'You have demonstrated experience creating process flow diagrams.', 'Lead the CNSI EPG meetings, tracking and reporting.', ' CMMI Associate ISO Lead Auditor CMMI High Maturity ']

['', '+1 646 253 0050', 'Actively interview so please reach out to me via this post or at;', 'Looking for an experienced software engineer with a strong engineering background. You will work on a wide range of data processing, application and integration projects. The ideal candidate will have a wide range of engineering experience, a strong technical background and a flexible skillset.', 'Strong experience with Python, Django, Postgres, NoSQL, DRF, AWS, Kubernetes, and ideally a bit of React experience as well.', 'CS / Engineering degree or equivalent work experience', 'We are building a world-class B2B search engine that rivals anything on the market by using AI and ML technology to give deeper insights in to the data needed.', 'Design and deploy scalable infrastructure', 'About You:', 'Ship production, tested code for our data infrastructure and web application', 'Expand and scale our search application and data models', 'Contribute to building a cutting edge B2B search engineDevelop web applications and data microservices in PythonDesign and deploy scalable infrastructureShip production, tested code for our data infrastructure and web applicationExpand and scale our search application and data models', 'Develop web applications and data microservices in Python', 'Ideally experience with data libraries like numpy, pandas, etc.', 'Experience with data modeling and structuring databases', '3+ years of experience as a software engineer.', '3+ years of experience as a software engineer.Strong experience with Python, Django, Postgres, NoSQL, DRF, AWS, Kubernetes, and ideally a bit of React experience as well.Experience building and consuming APIs.Experience with data modeling and structuring databasesIdeally experience with data libraries like numpy, pandas, etc.CS / Engineering degree or equivalent work experience', 'Experience building and consuming APIs.', 'Joshua.Harrison@glocomms.com', 'Contribute to building a cutting edge B2B search engine', 'About the Role:']

', '  We recognize and reward hard work with: ', ' remote working friendly perks such as expanded telehealth options for mental and physical well being, virtual yoga, meditation and health and fitness app reimbursements ', "COVID-19 Hiring Update--Dataminr is still actively hiring.As the health and safety of our candidates and our employees come first, we're excited to provide virtual experiences for interviews and new hire on-boarding.This role can be office-based or fully remote within the United States.Job Type: Full timeMinimum Experience Required: 3 yearsWho We AreDataminr puts real-time AI and public data to work for our clients, generating relevant and actionable alerts for global corporations, public sector agencies, newsrooms, and NGOs. Our leading AI platform detects the earliest signals of high-impact events and emerging risks from vast amounts of publicly available information. Our real-time alerts enable tens of thousands of users at hundreds of public and private sector organizations to learn first of breaking events around the world, develop effective risk mitigation strategies, and respond with confidence as crises unfold.Dataminr is making its mark for growth and innovation, recently earning recognition on the Deloitte Technology Fast 500, Forbes AI 50 and Forbes Cloud 100 lists. We also earned accolades for ‘Most Innovative Use of AI’ from the 2020 AI & Machine Learning Awards.Join our team and help the world manage risk in real time. You’ll work with 600+ talented people across seven offices, united by our passion to collaborate, make a difference, and have fun while doing it!What You’ve Done BeforeYou have built software test automation and scaled automation frameworks for back-end services and APIs to help build a high-quality product. You have experience working with containers in a cloud environment, and are familiar with distributed systems using a microservices architecture. Mentor more junior members of our growing team. ['', "Be responsible for delivering the best deployment experience to customers. You will contribute to the development of software for supporting customers' installation, upgrade, recovery from node failure, node scaling, system monitoring, and troubleshooting.", "dotData Pioneered AutoML 2.0 to help business intelligence professionals add AI/ML models to their BI stacks quickly and easily. Fortune 500 organizations around the world use dotData to accelerate their ML and AI development to drive higher business value. dotData's automated data science platform accelerates ROI and lowers the total cost of ownership by automating the entire data science process that is at the heart of AI/ML. dotData ingests raw business data and uses an AI-based engine to automatically discover meaningful patterns and build ML-ready feature tables from relational, transactional, temporal, geo-locational, and text data. dotData's automated platform discovers patterns, optimizes ML models and makes it easy to deploy predictive algorithms without impacting operational data.", 'you should be a team player', 'Preferred', "Build and maintain a robust, scalable and flexible data platform that is deployed both on-premises and in a variety of cloud environmentsBe responsible for delivering the best deployment experience to customers. You will contribute to the development of software for supporting customers' installation, upgrade, recovery from node failure, node scaling, system monitoring, and troubleshooting.Help us measure and improve reliability and performance of the data platform by working with product owners and engineering teams.", 'Experience building and maintaining data platforms that process huge amounts of data securely and efficiently on a variety of platforms such as on-premise, AWS and Azure.', 'Things you will do', "If you're looking to work with the team of amicable colleagues and make an impact, this is the place.", 'Experience in developing analytics, machine learning, distributed computing, and/or Big Data platforms is a plus.', 'Experience in other build and automation tools such as Jenkins and Packer is a plus.', 'About DotData', "Experience installing and supporting enterprise-grade software products in the datacenters of large companies with tools such as Python, Ansible and Terraform. You've done this successfully, many times.Experience building and maintaining data platforms that process huge amounts of data securely and efficiently on a variety of platforms such as on-premise, AWS and Azure.Experience in programming in PythonExperience in IaC(Infrastructure as Code) tools like Ansible/TerraformExperience in data platform software like Spark/HadoopExperience in containers/container orchestration systems (Docker/Kubernetes)Experience in public clouds (mostly AWS/Azure)", 'Experience in other build and automation tools such as Jenkins and Packer is a plus.Experience in developing analytics, machine learning, distributed computing, and/or Big Data platforms is a plus.', 'Non-technical', 'you have passion to support our customers in achieving their goals, even if it requires wearing multiple hats,', 'you work collaboratively with multi-cultural engineering teams around the globe,', 'Experience in data platform software like Spark/Hadoop', 'dotData platform is a unique end-to-end solution for data science, including data import and export, automated Machine Learning, and its distinctive AI-powered feature engineering, which eliminates the most time-consuming and labor- and skill-intensive aspects of the full data science process, freeing up data scientists for higher-value tasks and enabling data engineers and business analysts to drive data science projects.', 'Job Requirements', 'Experience in programming in Python', "Experience installing and supporting enterprise-grade software products in the datacenters of large companies with tools such as Python, Ansible and Terraform. You've done this successfully, many times.", 'Good knowledge of English (both spoken and written)', 'dotData has raised $43M funding as of July 2020 and is in its growth stage. dotData has been recognized as a leader by Forrester in the 2019 New Wave for AutoML platforms. dotData has also been recognized as the "best machine learning platform" for 2019 by the AI breakthrough awards, was named an "emerging vendor to watch" by CRN in the big data space and was named to CB Insights\' Top 100 AI Startups in 2020.', 'Technical', 'Experience in IaC(Infrastructure as Code) tools like Ansible/Terraform', 'Experience in public clouds (mostly AWS/Azure)', 'Help us measure and improve reliability and performance of the data platform by working with product owners and engineering teams.', 'dotData is hiring a high caliber senior senior platform engineer who is highly motivated to build AI platforms.', 'Experience in containers/container orchestration systems (Docker/Kubernetes)', 'you have passion to support our customers in achieving their goals, even if it requires wearing multiple hats,you love learning, and are not afraid to jump into something with which you have no prior experience and fill in the blanks,you work collaboratively with multi-cultural engineering teams around the globe,you should be a team playerGood knowledge of English (both spoken and written)', 'Build and maintain a robust, scalable and flexible data platform that is deployed both on-premises and in a variety of cloud environments', 'you love learning, and are not afraid to jump into something with which you have no prior experience and fill in the blanks,']
