Here is a nonexclusive list of technologies we currently use:', 'You understand the balancing game an engineer has to play while weighing new feature development with technical debt.', 'Our team is comprised of very talented and highly motivated individuals, who pride themselves on working smarter, not harder.We’re empowered to make local decisions, reducing the overhead of getting things done.We aim for operational excellence, having a DevOps culture and a “you build it, you run it” mentality.We favor a Lean approach to our product development, following agile workflows such as Scrum and Kanban depending on the directive of the team.We welcome new technologies and are constantly self-evaluating our tech stack to make sure we are providing software of the highest quality.Continuous Delivery is important to us and we are constantly looking to improve our automated testing and continuous integration.', 'Our Tech Stack', 'Java, JavaScriptAmazon Web Services (AWS) – ECS, Lambda, RDS, Kinesis, etc.Amazon Aurora, DynamoDB, MS SQL, MongoDBDropwizard, Grails, SpockNode.js, React.js, Next.js, Express.js', 'A blank piece of paper doesn’t scare you. You are excited to design products from the ground up.', 'You view software engineering as a craft and welcome the opportunity to share knowledge with fellow enthusiasts.You find learning new technologies/patterns exciting and love experimenting with them.“Good enough” is not in your vocabulary. You find innovative ways to ensure quality without restricting development speed.You understand the balancing game an engineer has to play while weighing new feature development with technical debt.A blank piece of paper doesn’t scare you. You are excited to design products from the ground up.For you, it is more than a job.', 'We favor a Lean approach to our product development, following agile workflows such as Scrum and Kanban depending on the directive of the team.', 'The Engineering department at CommerceHub employs some of the top engineering talent in the area who are constantly working to improve on processes, quality and techniques, with the goal of producing the highest quality software solutions in the industry. The lines between traditional QA and software engineering are blurred here, with quality being considered at all stages of development.', '\xa0', 'For you, it is more than a job.', 'About Us', 'You view software engineering as a craft and welcome the opportunity to share knowledge with fellow enthusiasts.', 'Node.js, React.js, Next.js, Express.js', 'You find learning new technologies/patterns exciting and love experimenting with them.', 'Amazon Aurora, DynamoDB, MS SQL, MongoDB', 'We aim for operational excellence, having a DevOps culture and a “you build it, you run it” mentality.', 'About You', 'Continuous Delivery is important to us and we are constantly looking to improve our automated testing and continuous integration.', 'Dropwizard, Grails, Spock', 'Java, JavaScript', 'We welcome new technologies and are constantly self-evaluating our tech stack to make sure we are providing software of the highest quality.', '“Good enough” is not in your vocabulary. You find innovative ways to ensure quality without restricting development speed.']

['', 'Our Infrastructure is moving to AWS, with the back-end powered by Docker containers running in Fargate/ECS, our front-end served by CloudFront, and data stored in Aurora. We strive for a serverless architecture to minimize the operational burden on engineers.', 'A take-home coding exercise', 'On the front-end, we use React for our desktop and mobile web products. We use React Native to power our iOS and Android apps. A single code base cross compiles to all platforms using a custom technology we developed.', "Exemplary Practitioners: Our software engineers write quality code to build features and fix bugs.Specialization: We are looking for a mix of people with specialization across the technology stack, including front-end web, back-end web, and native mobile app experience.Continuous Learners: We believe the best engineers are interested in learning new tools of the trades, including programming languages, development frameworks, and platforms.Collaborators: Engineers work closely with product managers and designers to create the best products for our customers.Experience: We are looking for engineers with a solid foundation, which you can demonstrate through a combination of formal education, self teaching, personal projects, or work experience. If you've never written code, this is not the job for you. We do not limit our search to engineers who have a computer science degree and 5+ years of experience", 'Our Interview Process', 'Description', 'Continuous Learners', 'On the back-end, we use Ruby on Rails, Go, and NodeJS.', 'On the front-end, we use React for our desktop and mobile web products. We use React Native to power our iOS and Android apps. A single code base cross compiles to all platforms using a custom technology we developed.On the back-end, we use Ruby on Rails, Go, and NodeJS.Our Infrastructure is moving to AWS, with the back-end powered by Docker containers running in Fargate/ECS, our front-end served by CloudFront, and data stored in Aurora. We strive for a serverless architecture to minimize the operational burden on engineers.For error reporting and monitoring, we use Airbrake and New Relic.For video, we use WebRTC services from Twilio and Vonage.And of course, there is much more!', 'A 30-minute info call with our recruiter or VP of engineering', 'Collaborators', 'Experience', 'For video, we use WebRTC services from Twilio and Vonage.', 'Here’s How It Works', 'For error reporting and monitoring, we use Airbrake and New Relic.', 'And of course, there is much more!', "Experience: We are looking for engineers with a solid foundation, which you can demonstrate through a combination of formal education, self teaching, personal projects, or work experience. If you've never written code, this is not the job for you. We do not limit our search to engineers who have a computer science degree and 5+ years of experience", 'Specialization: We are looking for a mix of people with specialization across the technology stack, including front-end web, back-end web, and native mobile app experience.', 'Three 30-minute, back-to-back, one-on-one interviews with our engineers.', 'Our Technology', 'Specialization', 'A 30-minute info call with our recruiter or VP of engineeringThree 30-minute, back-to-back, one-on-one interviews with our engineers.A take-home coding exercise', 'Requirements', 'Continuous Learners: We believe the best engineers are interested in learning new tools of the trades, including programming languages, development frameworks, and platforms.', 'Where’s the job?', 'Exemplary Practitioners: Our software engineers write quality code to build features and fix bugs.', 'Collaborators: Engineers work closely with product managers and designers to create the best products for our customers.', 'Exemplary Practitioners:']

job_title: Software Engineer III - CV/ML and Data Intelligence
job_text: ['', 'The above information has been designed to indicate the general nature and level of work performed in the role. It is not designed to contain or be interpreted as a comprehensive inventory of all duties, responsibilities and qualifications required of employees assigned to this job. The full Job Description can be made available as part of the hiring process', 'About The Team', 'Demonstrated expertise in architecting and deploying solutions into production.', '2+ years’ overall agile software development, preferably in one or more of the following areas: AR/VR, surveillance, inventory tracking, autonomous vehicles.1+ years in cloud platform preferably in AzurePython, Java, and C++Experience with any and all of these frameworks/libraries: PyTorch, OpenCV, Keras, TensorFlow, Cuda, SciPy, NumPy, BoofCVExperience with low-powered devices such as development boards: raspberry pi, Arduino, Coral, Jetson, etc. or mobile phones.Experience working in small teams', 'Outlined below are the required minimum qualifications for this position. If none are listed, there are no minimum qualifications. ', 'Experience with low-powered devices such as development boards: raspberry pi, Arduino, Coral, Jetson, etc. or mobile phones.', ' Encouraging the project teams that you oversee to work collaboratively and to aim for insight-driven outcomes.', 'Research latest industry trends in software, Computer Vision, Machine Learning, and Cloud Computing to enhance Sam’s Club technology resources and the experiences for both our associates and members.', 'Benefits & Perks', 'Experience working in small teams', '2+ years’ experience in Computer Vision and Machine Learning', ' You level up when you have the opportunity to teach others and empower those around you to excel.', ' You come to the table with a comprehensive knowledge of Robotics as well as modern AI Algorithms.', 'Research latest industry trends in software, Computer Vision, Machine Learning, and Cloud Computing to enhance Sam’s Club technology resources and the experiences for both our associates and members.Take a data driven approach and propose solutions that aim at achieving the best in industry performance and experiences.Apply machine learning, computer vision, and data fusion tools to tackle big data and create new insights that generate value for the company and its customers.Perform POC’s to evaluate and develop new technologies to solve high value issues that weren’t solvable before.', 'Apply machine learning, computer vision, and data fusion tools to tackle big data and create new insights that generate value for the company and its customers.', "Position Summary... What You'll Do...", 'Perform POC’s to evaluate and develop new technologies to solve high value issues that weren’t solvable before.', '1+ years in cloud platform preferably in Azure', 'Who We Are', ' Effectively translating requirements into project parameters while working with agility from cradle to grave.', 'Experience with any and all of these frameworks/libraries: PyTorch, OpenCV, Keras, TensorFlow, Cuda, SciPy, NumPy, BoofCV', ' Your ability to rise above group think and see beyond the here and now is matched only by your intellectual curiosity.', '2+ years’ overall agile software development, preferably in one or more of the following areas: AR/VR, surveillance, inventory tracking, autonomous vehicles.', ' You consider yourself to be a student of the world who thrives in an ever-changing environment that holds within it new challenges and chances to prove your expertise.', 'Python, Java, and C++', 'Your Qualifications', 'Minimum Qualifications...', 'What You’ll Do', 'Outlined below are the optional preferred qualifications for this position. If none are listed, there are no preferred qualifications. ', 'Take a data driven approach and propose solutions that aim at achieving the best in industry performance and experiences.', ' Helping cross-functional teams to solve for business problems and develop solutions that enable us to redefine a “best-in-class” customer and associate experience.']

['', 'US applicants', 'COMPASS Pathways is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All employment decisions are based on business needs, job requirements, and individual qualifications, without regard to race, religion, color, national origin, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, and related medical conditions), ethnicity, age, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, military service, genetic information, familial or marital status, or any other status, category, or characteristic protected by applicable law.', 'Detailed responsibilities/accountabilities ', 'Additional qualifications - preferred', 'Experience with Tensorflow/Keras and/or Pytorch. Previous background in NLP and/or computer vision a strong plus', 'Familiar with R Shiny and/or other modern front-end development and data visualization technologies', 'COMPASS Pathways is a mental health care company dedicated to accelerating patient access to evidence-based innovation in mental health (https://compasspathways.com). Our focus is on improving the lives of those who are suffering with mental health challenges and who are not helped by current treatments. We are pioneering the development of a new model of psilocybin therapy, in which our proprietary formulation of synthetic psilocybin, COMP360, is administered in conjunction with psychological support.', 'If interested, please send your CV and statement of interest to hiring@compasspathways.com', 'Work closely with stakeholders to identify quantitative and technological needs for various COMPASS projects', 'Proficient in at least one of Python (scikit-learn, numpy, pandas, matplotlib) or R (tidyr, dplyr, ggplot2, Rstudio)', 'Job overview', 'Communicate insights with stakeholders with the ability to extract therapeutic intelligence by leveraging external and internal data sources', 'Ability to work in the US', 'hiring@compasspathways.com', 'Equal opportunities ', 'The position reports into the VP of Digital Health Research', 'Develop algorithms & analyses that incorporate digital and traditional biomarkers (voice, vision, smart device, EEG, others) in order to improve the treatment process via more accurate intervention, personalized therapeutics or real time post-treatment follow up', 'Strong analytical, project management, written and verbal communication skills', 'Strong alignment with core company mission and values Compassionate, Bold, Rigorous, and Inclusive', 'Substantial experience in the field either through industry and/or academia. Biotech & start-up experience a strong plus (Degree in: Statistics, Computer Science, Neuroscience, Engineering, Mathematics, Physics or related)', 'Ability to operate independently and in cross-functional teams in an entrepreneurial and rapid growth-oriented environment', 'Understanding of a variety of statistical and/or machine learning methods (regression, statistical hypothesis testing and design of experiments, tree-based algorithms, supervised vs unsupervised learning). Expert knowledge in a selection of several key areas', 'Background in EEG, fMRI, and other brain measurement technologies a strong plus', 'Roles and responsibilities', 'Profile', 'Provide expertise company-wide ranging from data science & analytics to more traditional statistical and computer science analysis in order to improve the patient journey and provide mission-critical applications as COMPASS grows', 'Note that we are not able to sponsor employment visas at this time, and therefore can only accept applications from people who have employment rights in the US.', 'Comfortable with Linux and the AWS cloud environment', 'Industry experience as a data scientist in a digital health organisation, pharma, or biotech', 'Experience in modern front-end development and data visualisation', 'How to apply', 'Work collaboratively with engineering (back-end/front-end/UI+UX/ and others) to deploy these algorithms in a highly scalable and distributed infrastructure to help patients in real time', 'The Data Scientist will support a diverse set of initiatives including statistical computational modelling, advanced analytics and AI projects. You will partner with internal and external stakeholders to develop insights and models to advance discoveries in mental health care.\xa0', 'A PhD in a computational field (Degree in Statistics, Computer Science, Neuroscience, Engineering, Mathematics, Physics or related)']

['', 'Mentor, hire and grow a team of analysts to build this instrumentation and validated underlying views consistent with the definition of core company KPIs.', 'Competitive Salary: Up to $250K/year, DOE', 'Unlimited PTO', 'The Offer', 'A curious person who wants to understand why and help curate and tell that story with stakeholders through experimentation and data.', '50% SDLC', '80% Hands On10% Management Duties (in the beginning)10% Team Collaboration (in the beginning)', 'Required Skills & Experience', 'Python experience preferred, but open to other languages', 'A company headquartered in San Francisco with an additional office here in the DC metro area is looking to bring on a Director of Analytics. The company itself created a mobile application that helps people to take control of their financial well-being. The application links to your bank account and in-turn, tracks spending habits by looking at monthly subscriptions, figure where an individual is spending most of their money, and even set savings goals.', 'Spark', 'A minimum of 4 years of professional experience as a Machine Learning Engineer (or related)', '10% Team Collaboration (in the beginning)', 'Medical Insurance & Health Savings Account (HSA)', 'Master’s degree preferred but at least a Bachelor degree in Analytics or related', 'LTV Projection', 'What You Will Be Doing', "You've helped build and maintain at least part of an analytics operation from stakeholder management, instrumentation design, quality measurement and iteration.", 'Statistical Modeling', 'Comfortability with relational databases, specifically PostgreSQL', '401(k)', 'You will receive the following benefits:', 'Paid Sick Time Leave', 'Pre-tax Commuter Benefit', '10% Management Duties (in the beginning)', '50% Analytics50% SDLC', 'Snacks, Kombucha & Coffee on tap', 'Tech Breakdown', 'Daily Responsibilities', '80% Hands On', 'AWS', 'Medical Insurance & Health Savings Account (HSA)401(k)Paid Sick Time LeavePre-tax Commuter BenefitUnlimited PTOSnacks, Kombucha & Coffee on tap', 'Python', '50% Analytics', 'For the role, they are\xa0looking for a Director of Analytics to be the first quantitative-centered hire at the company. You will be responsible for leading all Analytical aspects within the office in the DC area. You must be able to and experienced in building data pipelines and implementing Machine Learning algorithms, as well as have prior experience with Price Modeling and LTV projection. Since you are one the first of the data-focused team, you’ll essentially be able to choose the technologies/techniques that you want to use and eventually build out the team with more ML and Data engineers down the line. ', 'Desired Skills & Experience', 'PythonStatistical ModelingLTV ProjectionSparkAWS', "Master’s degree preferred but at least a Bachelor degree in Analytics or relatedA minimum of 4 years of professional experience as a Machine Learning Engineer (or related)Python experience preferred, but open to other languagesComfortability with relational databases, specifically PostgreSQLYou've helped build and maintain at least part of an analytics operation from stakeholder management, instrumentation design, quality measurement and iteration.A curious person who wants to understand why and help curate and tell that story with stakeholders through experimentation and data."]

['', 'We seek applicants of all backgrounds and identities, across race, color, ethnicity, national origin or ancestry, citizenship, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, veteran status, marital status, pregnancy or parental status, or disability. Applicants will not be discriminated against based on these or other protected categories or social identities. Cruise will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records, in accordance with applicable laws.', 'We’re Funded GM, Honda, Microsoft, SoftBank, & T. Rowe Price, have invested billions in Cruise. Their backing for our technology demonstrates their confidence in our progress, team, and vision and makes us one of the leading autonomous vehicle organizations in the industry. Our deep resources greatly accelerate our operating speed.  ', 'Cruise LLC is an equal opportunity employer. We strive to create a supportive and inclusive workplace where contributions are valued and celebrated, and our employees thrive by being themselves and are inspired to do the best work of their lives. ', 'Prior simulation experience, especially an understanding of autonomous vehicle simulation.', 'Our benefits are here to support the whole you:', ' Our benefits are here to support the whole you: Competitive salary and benefits  401(k) Cruise matching program  Medical / dental / vision, AD+D and Life One Medical membership Flexible vacation and company paid holidays Healthy meals and snacks provided for non-remote employees Paid parental leave Fertility Benefits  Dependent Care Flexible Spending Account, subsidized by Cruise Flexible Spending Account  Monthly wellness stipend Pre-tax Commuter Benefit Plan for non-remote employees   ', 'What You’ll Be Doing', 'We proactively work to design hiring processes that promote equity and inclusion while mitigating bias. To help us track the effectiveness and inclusivity of our recruiting efforts, please consider answering the following demographic questions. Answering these questions is entirely voluntary. Your answers to these questions will not be shared with the hiring decision makers and will not impact the hiring decision in any way. Instead, Cruise will use this information not only to comply with any government reporting obligations but also to track our progress toward meeting our diversity, equity, inclusion, and belonging objectives.', 'Work with your team, partners, product managers, and technical program managers to build, prioritize, and execute an engineering roadmap for your Simulation Systems Team.', ' We’re Independent We have our own governance, board of directors, equity, and investors. Our independence allows us to not just work on the edge of technology, but also define it.   ', 'We’re Remote Friendly We believe that your value to the team can be provided at a Cruise office or from the comfort of your home. Depending on your function, enjoy the flexibility of remote work and join our growing community of remote employees in the continental United States.  ', 'Ability to lead with multi-functional communication and collaboration skills, and to concisely and clearly advocate vision and present written documents and live presentations to partners, executive leadership, and Cruise as a whole.', 'Proven success in defining and implementing detailed test plans, designs and execution.', 'Bonus points! ', 'Lead and develop processes and methodologies to establish long-term and stable requirements, verification/validation, risk management, metrics and KPIs, and/or software solutions to advanced problems.', 'We’re Vested', 'Healthy meals and snacks provided for non-remote employees', 'Passion for safe, fully-electric, self-driving technology and its upcoming impact on the world.', 'Job Description', ' We believe that your value to the team can be provided at a Cruise office or from the comfort of your home. Depending on your function, enjoy the flexibility of remote work and join our growing community of remote employees in the continental United States. ', 'Cruise is committed to the full inclusion of all applicants. If reasonable accommodation is needed to participate in the job application or interview process please let our recruiting team know or email HR@getcruise.com.', 'A customer service approach, keeping a tight loop with internal users of simulation software, actively seeking out requirements, and adapting simulation designs to align with evolving needs.', 'Note to Recruitment Agencies: Cruise does not accept unsolicited agency resumes. Furthermore, Cruise does not pay placement fees for candidates submitted by any agency other than its approved partners.', '12+ years experience in systems engineering, requirements management, risk management, software development, and validation/testing.', '5+ years of experience as an engineer leader; recruiting, training, mentoring, leading, and retaining the best talent.', 'Competitive salary and benefits ', 'Lead and communicate engineering analyses that provide teams with all the information needed to develop and continuously improve the systems function and performance.', ' Prior simulation experience, especially an understanding of autonomous vehicle simulation. Experience with fast-growth companies and recruiting/retaining the best talent. Passion for learning new technologies every day, in a company with many, possibly-unfamiliar, cross-discipline skill sets, ranging from assembly line auto manufacturing to cutting edge ML/AI training. A customer service approach, keeping a tight loop with internal users of simulation software, actively seeking out requirements, and adapting simulation designs to align with evolving needs. Proven success in defining and implementing detailed test plans, designs and execution. ', 'Conceptualize and prepare clear proposals and design documents for large-scope, multi-functional programs, and advocate to relevant customers and partners.', 'We’re Vested You won’t just own your work here, you’ll have the potential to own equity in Cruise, too. We are competing in a market that is projected to grow exponentially, which gives our company valuation room to grow.  ', 'Through our partnerships with General Motors and Honda, we are the only self-driving company with fully integrated manufacturing at scale.', 'Day-to-day Responsibilities Include', 'GM, Honda, Microsoft, SoftBank, & T. ', 'Lead various analysis to optimize total system, subsystems and/or system architecture and performance; Establish critical telemetry, metrics, and standards for relevant feedback loops.', ' 12+ years experience in systems engineering, requirements management, risk management, software development, and validation/testing. 10+ years experience in integrated software engineering, simulation frameworks, 3D video game engineering, robotics, or similar. 5+ years of experience as an engineer leader; recruiting, training, mentoring, leading, and retaining the best talent. BS, MS, or PhD in Computer Science, Mechanical Engineering, Robotics, or equivalent experience in 3D software and simulation. ', 'Flexible vacation and company paid holidays', 'Pre-tax Commuter Benefit Plan for non-remote employees', 'Execute and iterate on requirements at all phases of development to ensure that requirements are implemented and tested within a timeframe that aligns with Cruise landmarks and the work you are doing.', 'We believe that your value to the team can be provided at a Cruise office or from the comfort of your home. Depending on your function, enjoy the flexibility of remote work and join our growing community of remote employees in the continental United States.', '10+ years experience in integrated software engineering, simulation frameworks, 3D video game engineering, robotics, or similar.', 'Hire, mentor, and empower exceptional teams of Systems Engineers responsible for designing, developing, and supporting products for testing autonomous vehicle software via simulation.', 'Collaboratively identify and close gaps in tooling and data introspection to accelerate engineer velocity within Simulation.', 'Passion for learning new technologies every day, in a company with many, possibly-unfamiliar, cross-discipline skill sets, ranging from assembly line auto manufacturing to cutting edge ML/AI training.', 'Employ an agile approach in identifying areas of critical need, and assist in maintaining a sharp focus of the Simulation System Engineering team according to urgency/priorities.', 'BS, MS, or PhD in Computer Science, Mechanical Engineering, Robotics, or equivalent experience in 3D software and simulation.', 'We have our own governance, board of directors, equity, and investors. Lead and develop processes and methodologies to establish long-term and stable requirements, verification/validation, risk management, metrics and KPIs, and/or software solutions to advanced problems. Collaborate with Engineering Managers to ensure design, implementation, and programs are on track, and regularly drive consensus among diverse partners on technical projects. Drive planning and execution by breaking complex products into projects and/or achievements that deliver incremental value to teams and customers. Execute and iterate on requirements at all phases of development to ensure that requirements are implemented and tested within a timeframe that aligns with Cruise landmarks and the work you are doing. Conceptualize and prepare clear proposals and design documents for large-scope, multi-functional programs, and advocate to relevant customers and partners. Employ an agile approach in identifying areas of critical need, and assist in maintaining a sharp focus of the Simulation System Engineering team according to urgency/priorities. ', 'Gentem is building the infrastructure to power the future of health services reimbursements. Complexity, friction and waste are the main features of healthcare transactions. Gentem leverages cutting-edge technology in machine learning, automation and fintech to accomplish this mission. ']

['', 'This position will work closely with project managers to develop project proposals, scope documents, process flow diagrams, entity-relationship diagrams, user stories, coding specifications, test plans and occasionally assist with training documentation. This position will also elicit and document functional, performance, test, and interface requirements for software systems. It ensures the logical and systematic conversion of customer requirements into system solutions that acknowledge technical, schedule, and cost constraints. This position performs functional analysis, timeline analysis, detailed trade studies, requirements allocation and interface definition studies to translate the customer requirements into software specifications. This position will develop UML based design packages, supporting analysis, architecture definition that are needed to document, allocate and trace system and element level requirements. This position requires effective communication with both technical and nontechnical users to explain IT solutions.', 'This position is responsible for leading the testing and troubleshooting for new applications and complicated legacy application changes. This involves system testing, integration testing, user acceptance testing and post deployment verification planning.']

job_title: Software Engineer - Machine Learning - Remote, USA
job_text: ['', 'Experience with large-scale distributed data processing systems, cloud infrastructure such as AWS, and container systems such as Docker or Kubernetes.', 'Experience designing and developing backend microservices for large scale distributed systems using gRPC or REST.', 'Deliver production-ready code from start to finish', ' 4+ years of relevant software engineering experience Familiarity with developing and deploying Spark and ML pipelines Expertise in multiple programming languages such as Python, Go, or C++  Knowledge of Docker and container orchestration frameworks such as Kubernetes Ideally, experience with AWS managed services such as S3, ElasticSearch, and DynamoDB Hands-on experience with big data technologies such as Airflow, Jupyter Experience building microservices and RESTful APIs ', 'Work in an Agile environment composed of software engineers, test engineers, research scientists, and product managers', 'Ideally, experience with AWS managed services such as S3, ElasticSearch, and DynamoDB', '4+ years of relevant software engineering experience', ' Design and develop infrastructure for the full cycle of machine learning, such as workflow orchestration and management interfaces, data discovery tools, data quality, and feature libraries. Experience designing and developing backend microservices for large scale distributed systems using gRPC or REST. Occasional in office is expected.', 'The primary focus of this role is Windows server and desktop management, systems administration, and providing network/systems administration. Our Windows environment provides authentication (AD), DNS, and DHCP services to our entire Windows and Linux environment. Some of our Windows systems are virtualized on a XenServer platform, some are housed within AWS, and some are physical and reside in our data center. Additionally, this role requires administration of Office 365 (Exchange) and Microsoft EMS (Intune, Azure AD, MDM/MAM, DLP, AIP). This role requires working with software developers and business users to provide for their computing needs while maintaining security and adhering to established standards. This is a HIPAA compliant, SOC 2 Type 2 certified, and NIST CSF aligned environment. Adherence to these standards is required.', 'Test and evaluate network systems to eliminate problems and make improvements. Majority of end user systems are laptops utilizing docking stations and are currently remotely used. ', 'DutiesSummaryThis position serves as a Statistician performing data science work that requires application of data mining techniques, statistical analysis, and building high quality prediction systems integrated with public health surveillance systems and programs at the local, state and national levels for: analysis; improved understanding and communication; development/visualization of new concepts, and/or processes that add value to health services delivery and the decision making process.ResponsibilitiesAs a Statistician (Data Scientist) you will: Design experiments, test hypotheses, and build scalable data science models. Conduct advanced data analysis and design complex algorithms. Identify relevant data available, including internal and external data sources, leveraging new data collection processes. Develop experimental design approaches to validate finding or test hypotheses. Support data collection, integration, storage, access, analysis, and retention requirements based on the surveillance data collected.  Identify the business requirements and the expected outcome. Suggest data science tools, methods, and statistical learning models of interest.  Collaborate with the data steward to ensure that the information used follows the compliance, access management, and control policies..  Present and depict rationale findings in layman\'s terms. Present results that contradict common assertions or beliefs. Travel RequiredOccasional travel - You may be expected to travel 5% domestic.Supervisory statusNoPromotion PotentialNone  Job family (Series)Similar jobs RequirementsConditions of Employment US Citizenship is required. Background Investigation is required. E-Verify: If you are selected for this position, the documentation that you present for purposes of completing the Department of Homeland Security (DHS) Form I-9 will be verified through the DHS "E-Verify" System. Federal law requires DHS to use the E-Verify System to verify employment eligibility of all new hires, and as a condition of continued employment obligates the new hire to take affirmative steps to resolve any discrepancies identified by the system. The U.S. Department of Health and Human Services is an E-Verify Participant. Direct Deposit: All Federal employees are required to have Federal salary payments made by direct deposit to a financial institution of their choosing. All qualification requirements must be met by the closing date of the announcement. One-year probationary period may be required. Travel, transportation, and moving expenses will be paid: No Bargaining Unit Position: No Drug Screening Required: No Recruitment Incentive may be authorized: No Annual Leave for non-federal service may be authorized: No Research position: No Promotion potential: No Supervisory position: No Time in grade (TIG) must be met within 30 days of the closing date of the announcement. QualificationsBasic Qualifications:Must have a Degree: that included 15 semester hours in statistics (or in mathematics and statistics, provided at least 6 semester hours were in statistics), and 9 additional semester hours in one or more of the following: physical or biological sciences, medicine, education, or engineering; or in the social sciences including demography, history, economics, social welfare, geography, international relations, social or cultural anthropology, health sociology, political science, public administration, psychology, etc. Credit toward meeting statistical course requirements should be given for courses in which 50 percent of the course content appears to be statistical methods, e.g., courses that included studies in research methods in psychology or economics such as tests and measurements or business cycles, or courses in methods of processing mass statistical data such as tabulating methods or electronic data processing.or-Combination Of Education And ExperienceCourses as shown in A above, plus appropriate experience or additional education. The experience should have included a full range of professional statistical work such as (a) sampling, (b) collecting, computing, and analyzing statistical data, and (c) applying statistical techniques such as measurement of central tendency, dispersion, skewness, sampling error, simple and multiple correlation, analysis of variance, and tests of significance.Minimum QualificationsApplicants must have one year of specialized experience at or equivalent to the GS-12 level of difficulty and responsibility in the Federal service as defined in the next paragraph.Specialized experience is experience at or equivalent to which is directly related to the position which has equipped the applicant with the particular knowledge, skills and abilities (KSAs) to successfully perform the duties of the position to include experience conducting statistical analyses and using data science methods, such as, predictive analytics and data visualization.Documenting Experience: In accordance with Office of Personnel Management policy, federal employees are assumed to have gained experience by performing duties and responsibilities appropriate for their official series and grade level as described in their position description. Experience that would not normally be part of the employee\'s position is creditable, however, when documented by satisfactory evidence, such as a signed memorandum from the employee\'s supervisor or an SF-50 or SF-52 documenting an official detail or other official assignment. The documentation must indicate whether the duties were performed full time or, if part time, the percentage of times the other duties were performed. It is expected that this documentation is included in the employee\'s official personnel record. In order to receive credit for experience in your resume that is not within the official series and grade level of your official position, you must provide a copy of the appropriate documentation of such experience as indicated above.Experience refers to paid and unpaid experience, including volunteer work done through National Service programs (e.g., Peace Corps, AmeriCorps) and other organizations (e.g., professional; philanthropic; religious; spiritual; community, student, social). Volunteer work helps build critical competencies, knowledge, and skills and can provide valuable training and experience that translates directly to paid employment. You will receive credit for all qualifying experience, including volunteer experience.EducationFor More Information On How Foreign Education Is Evaluated, VisitEducation completed in colleges or universities outside the United States may be used to meet the education requirements. You must provide acceptable documentation that the foreign education is comparable to that received in an accredited educational institution in the United States.Additional informationThis vacancy is also being announced concurrently with vacancy announcement HHS-CDC-D5-21-11042130 nder competitive procedures. Please review that announcement to see if you are eligible for consideration under competitive procedures.NOTE: Applicants must apply separately for each announcement in order to be considered.To Remain An Active Duty USPHS Commissioned Corps Officer Join more than 6,500 highly qualified public health professionals as part of the U.S. Public Health Service. Overseen by the Surgeon General, you will be part of an elite and diverse team of professionals essential to public health leadership and exemplary clinical service PHS Commissioned Corps Officers interested in performing the duties of this position with the Commissioned Corps, you are welcome to apply and receive a courtesy referral. Note that a courtesy referral is not a competitive civil service process and does not provide civil service status for the selected employee.   Additional selections may be made within the same geographical location CDC-wide.The utilization of shared certificates within multiple Centers of the Center of Disease Control and Prevention may be used from this vacancy announcement for specialties to include but not limited to: Applied Epidemiology, Behavioral Epidemiology, Chronic Diseases, Emergency Preparedness and Response, Emerging Infectious Diseases, Environmental Health, HIV/AIDS, Immunization, Infectious Diseases (e.g. Viral, Parasitic, etc.), Influenza, Malaria, Non-communicable Diseases, Outbreak Investigations, Sexually Transmitted Diseases (STDs), Surveillance, Tropical Medicine, Tuberculosis (TB), Viral Hepatitis, and/or Zoonotic Diseases.If you are a veteran with preference eligibility and you are claiming 5-points veterans\' preference, you must submit a copy of your DD-214 or other proof of eligibility. If you are claiming 10-point veterans\' preference, you must also submit an SF-15, "Application for 10-Point Veterans\' Preference" plus the proof required by that form. An employee with a disability needs an accommodation to perform the essential job duties or to gain access to the workplace. An employee with a disability needs an accommodation to receive equal access to benefits, such as details, training, and office-sponsored events. Federal law requires DHS to use the E-Verify System to verify employment eligibility of all new hires, and as a condition of continued employment obligates the new hire to take affirmative steps to resolve any discrepancies identified by the system. The U.S. Department of Health and Human Services is an E-Verify Participant. Direct Deposit: All Federal employees are required to have Federal salary payments made by direct deposit to a financial institution of their choosing. QualificationsBasic Qualifications:Must have a Degree: that included 15 semester hours in statistics (or in mathematics and statistics, provided at least 6 semester hours were in statistics), and 9 additional semester hours in one or more of the following: physical or biological sciences, medicine, education, or engineering; or in the social sciences including demography, history, economics, social welfare, geography, international relations, social or cultural anthropology, health sociology, political science, public administration, psychology, etc. Credit toward meeting statistical course requirements should be given for courses in which 50 percent of the course content appears to be statistical methods, e.g., courses that included studies in research methods in psychology or economics such as tests and measurements or business cycles, or courses in methods of processing mass statistical data such as tabulating methods or electronic data processing.', 'Collaborate with the data steward to ensure that the information used follows the compliance, access management, and control policies.. The experience should have included a full range of professional statistical work such as (a) sampling, (b) collecting, computing, and analyzing statistical data, and (c) applying statistical techniques such as measurement of central tendency, dispersion, skewness, sampling error, simple and multiple correlation, analysis of variance, and tests of significance.Minimum QualificationsApplicants must have one year of specialized experience at or equivalent to the GS-12 level of difficulty and responsibility in the Federal service as defined in the next paragraph.Specialized experience is experience at or equivalent to which is directly related to the position which has equipped the applicant with the particular knowledge, skills and abilities (KSAs) to successfully perform the duties of the position to include experience conducting statistical analyses and using data science methods, such as, predictive analytics and data visualization.Documenting Experience: In accordance with Office of Personnel Management policy, federal employees are assumed to have gained experience by performing duties and responsibilities appropriate for their official series and grade level as described in their position description. Experience that would not normally be part of the employee\'s position is creditable, however, when documented by satisfactory evidence, such as a signed memorandum from the employee\'s supervisor or an SF-50 or SF-52 documenting an official detail or other official assignment. The documentation must indicate whether the duties were performed full time or, if part time, the percentage of times the other duties were performed. It is expected that this documentation is included in the employee\'s official personnel record. In order to receive credit for experience in your resume that is not within the official series and grade level of your official position, you must provide a copy of the appropriate documentation of such experience as indicated above.Experience refers to paid and unpaid experience, including volunteer work done through National Service programs (e.g., Peace Corps, AmeriCorps) and other organizations (e.g., professional; philanthropic; religious; spiritual; community, student, social). Volunteer work helps build critical competencies, knowledge, and skills and can provide valuable training and experience that translates directly to paid employment. You will receive credit for all qualifying experience, including volunteer experience.EducationFor More Information On How Foreign Education Is Evaluated, VisitEducation completed in colleges or universities outside the United States may be used to meet the education requirements. You must provide acceptable documentation that the foreign education is comparable to that received in an accredited educational institution in the United States.Additional informationThis vacancy is also being announced concurrently with vacancy announcement HHS-CDC-D5-21-11042130 nder competitive procedures. Overseen by the Surgeon General, you will be part of an elite and diverse team of professionals essential to public health leadership and exemplary clinical service PHS Commissioned Corps Officers interested in performing the duties of this position with the Commissioned Corps, you are welcome to apply and receive a courtesy referral. Note that a courtesy referral is not a competitive civil service process and does not provide civil service status for the selected employee.   Additional selections may be made within the same geographical location CDC-wide.The utilization of shared certificates within multiple Centers of the Center of Disease Control and Prevention may be used from this vacancy announcement for specialties to include but not limited to: Applied Epidemiology, Behavioral Epidemiology, Chronic Diseases, Emergency Preparedness and Response, Emerging Infectious Diseases, Environmental Health, HIV/AIDS, Immunization, Infectious Diseases (e.g. Viral, Parasitic, etc.), Influenza, Malaria, Non-communicable Diseases, Outbreak Investigations, Sexually Transmitted Diseases (STDs), Surveillance, Tropical Medicine, Tuberculosis (TB), Viral Hepatitis, and/or Zoonotic Diseases.If you are a veteran with preference eligibility and you are claiming 5-points veterans\' preference, you must submit a copy of your DD-214 or other proof of eligibility. ', "DutiesSummaryThis position serves as a Statistician performing data science work that requires application of data mining techniques, statistical analysis, and building high quality prediction systems integrated with public health surveillance systems and programs at the local, state and national levels for: analysis; improved understanding and communication; development/visualization of new concepts, and/or processes that add value to health services delivery and the decision making process.ResponsibilitiesAs a Statistician (Data Scientist) you will: Design experiments, test hypotheses, and build scalable data science models. Conduct advanced data analysis and design complex algorithms. Identify relevant data available, including internal and external data sources, leveraging new data collection processes. Develop experimental design approaches to validate finding or test hypotheses. Support data collection, integration, storage, access, analysis, and retention requirements based on the surveillance data collected.  Identify the business requirements and the expected outcome. Suggest data science tools, methods, and statistical learning models of interest.  Collaborate with the data steward to ensure that the information used follows the compliance, access management, and control policies..  Present and depict rationale findings in layman's terms. Present results that contradict common assertions or beliefs. ', 'Software Engineer-KUKA Systems North America LLC. in Sterling Heights, MI:', 'Resumes to jobs@americas.kuka.com: Ref: K5 EOE. $120,000/yr. 9AM to 5PM. ['', 'Are you a C/C++ Software Engineer with an interest in getting into the investment management business?\xa0If so, this is the perfect role for you.\xa0Our client, an extremely successful international investment bank, is looking for a Senior Software Engineer to be part of a small team responsible for building in-house and external applications in support of the middle and back office aspects of the derivatives business.\xa0Will work with the business users to provide technical vision, strategic planning, design and coding.\xa0This includes providing architecture and performance metrics that provide proper trade booking, valuation, payments, settlements, margin and regulatory reporting.', 'Candidates must be college graduates with a minimum of 7-10 years of hands on coding and design experience using C along with some database work.\xa0Experience with C++, C#, Python, and .Net would all be plusses.\xa0Financial services experience as well as some knowledge of derivatives, would also be plusses.\xa0\xa0This is a new position with an extremely stable firm offering the opportunity to gain valuable knowledge and experience working with derivatives.\xa0\xa0']

['Responsibilities', '', 'Qualifications', 'BS/MS in Computer Science or Biology/Bio-Engineering. Experience in lieu of degree will be considered, preferably with a background in lab automation and scheduling software.', 'Demonstrable experience using and building applications using Cloud Infrastructure and technologies (Azure, AWS, IBM Cloud, etc.)', ' ', 'Focus', 'Excellent programming skills with a focus on C#, Dot Net, and WPFProven troubleshooter/problem solver with strong analytic skills and a determination to find win/win solutions. An ability to think strategically and to learn the rules that run our scheduler is a must.BS/MS in Computer Science or Biology/Bio-Engineering. Experience in lieu of degree will be considered, preferably with a background in lab automation and scheduling software.', 'Working knowledge of communication technologies (Serial, TCP/IP/CAN, etc.) and the ability to debug networking issues.', '.NET/C#', 'Develop software features and applications using .NET/C# for Biosero’s flagship Green Button Go scheduling software as well as other lab automation productsImprove products through bug resolutions, testing, and documentationParticipate in Product Development Team meetingsDevelop custom software and methods as per customer requirementsOccasionally travel to customer sites may be required', 'Excellent programming skills with a focus on C#, Dot Net, and WPF', 'Develop custom software and methods as per customer requirements', 'Develop software features and applications using .NET/C# for Biosero’s flagship Green Button Go scheduling software as well as other lab automation products', 'What would really set a candidate apart for this position would be:', 'Improve products through bug resolutions, testing, and documentation', 'Occasionally travel to customer sites may be required', 'Have good oral and written communication skills and communicate effectively with customers', 'Participate in Product Development Team meetings', 'Other Preferred Attributes:', '\xa0', 'Experience with all aspects of a product’s life cycle', 'This is a software engineer role within Biosero’s Product Development Team. The contributing team member will generate, test, and deploy code specific to our flagship lab scheduler, Green Button Go, as well as several other lab automation products. This team member will impact the world by providing the best laboratory scheduler and the best lab automation experience to scientists conducting medical research. The successful candidate will show a passion for good coding practices and an aptitude for solving intricate puzzles.', 'Experience in Pharma/Life Sciences industry and using laboratory instruments from Beckman, Tecan, Agilent, etc. preferred.An interest in logic puzzles and strategic challengesExperience with all aspects of a product’s life cycle', 'You will create software that changes the world! Biosero implements robotic automation in laboratories, primarily related to medical research and diagnostics. Our primary software product is Green Button Go, a powerful laboratory scheduler that is used to control laboratory robots. As a software engineer, you will help with the development and deployment of this product and its peripherals. The position is full-time and benefits include medical, dental, life insurance and matching 401k.', 'As a member of Biosero’s software team, the successful candidate will work on cutting edge Life Sciences scheduling software, Robotics, instrument drivers, Big Data and Analytics and work closely with customers to debug and resolve software and driver issues.', 'Experience in Pharma/Life Sciences industry and using laboratory instruments from Beckman, Tecan, Agilent, etc. preferred.', 'Preferred Candidate Attributes', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0We are not able to offer sponsorship, so valid candidates MUST have either US citizenship or a Green Card.', 'An interest in logic puzzles and strategic challenges', 'Demonstrable experience using and building applications using Cloud Infrastructure and technologies (Azure, AWS, IBM Cloud, etc.)Working knowledge of communication technologies (Serial, TCP/IP/CAN, etc.) and the ability to debug networking issues.Have good oral and written communication skills and communicate effectively with customers', 'Proven troubleshooter/problem solver with strong analytic skills and a determination to find win/win solutions. An ability to think strategically and to learn the rules that run our scheduler is a must.']

job_text: ['', ' Generous health, dental and vision coverage for employees and family members, along with commuter pre-tax program.', ' Experience in working with graph database such as TigerGraph or Neo4j', ' 2+ years of production-level machine learning model deployment', ' About Plum ', ' Development of data-driven products.', ' Visualize and communicate data clearly for use both internally and externally.', ' High proficiency in Java', ' Benefits ', ' Experience in working with big data technologies Spark, MapReduce, NoSQL databases', ' Have worked in a fast paced startup environment', ' Preferred Qualifications ', ' Conscientious and well organized', ' Bachelor’s degree in Mathematics, Statistics, Engineering, Computer Science or related discipline 2+ years of production-level machine learning model deployment Experience in working with big data technologies Spark, MapReduce, NoSQL databases Experience with AWS infrastructure such as EC2, S3 and Glue Hands-on Industry experience with machine learning frameworks like SageMaker, TensorFlow High proficiency in Java Knowledge of both neural networks and traditional ML techniques Experience with data visualization tools like Tableau An entrepreneurial spirit as well as passion for solving difficult challenges through innovation and creativity, with a strong focus on results Conscientious and well organized Eager to produce results and drive forward progress while managing deadlines', ' Job Summary ', ' Bachelor’s degree in Mathematics, Statistics, Engineering, Computer Science or related discipline', ' Participate heavily in architecture, design and implementation of machine learning pipelines Develop, refine and scale data management and analytics procedures, systems, workflows, best practices and other issues. Development of data-driven products. Visualize and communicate data clearly for use both internally and externally. Collaborate with our engineers to produce excellent products for Plum clients as well as streamline internal processes.', 'Must be authorized to work in the US. Plum does not sponsor employee visas.', ' Eager to produce results and drive forward progress while managing deadlines', ' Opportunity to make a meaningful impact on the disruption of an industry and to shape the building of a company and culture.', ' Early equity in a startup that is revolutionizing commercial real estate lending.', ' Required Qualifications ', ' Knowledge of both neural networks and traditional ML techniques', ' Experience in working with graph database such as TigerGraph or Neo4j Have worked in a fast paced startup environment Experience with finance technology/analytics and commercial real estate', ' Collaborate with our engineers to produce excellent products for Plum clients as well as streamline internal processes.', ' Hands-on Industry experience with machine learning frameworks like SageMaker, TensorFlow', ' Experience with data visualization tools like Tableau', ' An entrepreneurial spirit as well as passion for solving difficult challenges through innovation and creativity, with a strong focus on results', ' Unlimited vacation policy.', ' Experience with finance technology/analytics and commercial real estate', ' Responsibilities ', ' Freedom to stretch the boundaries of your past work experience, learn skills outside of your immediate job description and grow your career.', ' Participate heavily in architecture, design and implementation of machine learning pipelines', ' Chance for your direct input to be realized and put into action.', ' Develop, refine and scale data management and analytics procedures, systems, workflows, best practices and other issues.', ' Experience with AWS infrastructure such as EC2, S3 and Glue', ' Generous health, dental and vision coverage for employees and family members, along with commuter pre-tax program. Unlimited vacation policy. Opportunity to make a meaningful impact on the disruption of an industry and to shape the building of a company and culture. Chance for your direct input to be realized and put into action. Freedom to stretch the boundaries of your past work experience, learn skills outside of your immediate job description and grow your career. Autonomy, flexibility and a flat corporate structure.', ' Autonomy, flexibility and a flat corporate structure.']

['', '\xa0Why Would You Work With Us?', 'Why Would You Work With Us?', ' Twitter, LinkedIn, Facebook, ', 'PayIt', 'Nice to Haves:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Self-starter with a desire to learn. Motivated, self-directed, but with the ability to take direction from others. Desires to seek and then incorporate feedback. Able to multitask and resolve issues with creativity and minimal direction.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Competitive salaries along with an excellent benefits package.\xa0', 'The usability of our products, sharing of ideas across teams, and commitment to the cities, counties, and states we serve are values.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related experience including at least 1 year of professional experience working in a programming language (Java, Go, Elixir, JavaScript, C++, C#, etc.) and experience using applicable web frameworks.', 'Stay Up To Date On everything PayIt: Follow Us On Twitter, LinkedIn, Facebook, and Instagram.', 'This group of Software Engineers will be a part of our ongoing go-to-market strategy. The selected engineer will work within a team and build innovative applications and services that enable our clients to meet their goals with the PayIt platform. You will be responsible for, but not limited to the following: design, development, documentation, maintenance, and customer service of various applications and services. You will build integrations into various systems and incorporate new features from our products into new client implementations. Most importantly, you will improve the team and company by being an active participant in our culture.', 'Preferred Skillsets:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience developing with a MacOS or Linux environment.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Engineers come work with us because our problems are interesting to solve, come with complex challenges, and impact all of our lives.', '\ufeffWhat We Care About:\xa0', 'High aptitude, high integrity people who are great communicators and want to be part of a growing team. We’re about openness, integrity, accessibility and great communication.\xa0', '\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Jira, Rally or other Agile Development process tool', 'Stay Up To Date ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0You work collaboratively to ensure that your code is well is well-tested. You have experience in building unit tests.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experienced building Web Services, and integrations with third parties through APIs, SOAP, OAuth, etc.), knowledge of object-oriented programming (OOA/OOD/OOP), MVC and other design patterns, experience with databases and system, and experience with Agile development methodologies, especially SCRUM.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Saving someone’s day is a rewarding way to spend yours. We tackle complex challenges that are interesting to solve, and directly impact the lives of our neighbors, friends and ourselves.\xa0', 'PayIt:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Flexible and friendly work environment. We believe our culture permeates throughout our product and service, so it’s one of customer-first.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong knowledge of HTML, XML, XSLT, JavaScript.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0You have worked closely with stakeholders to respond quickly to issues and solve them in a repeatable and scalable way. You have strong oral and written communication skills and are to clearly document and communicate to team members. You enjoy communicating with management, customers, and technical staff in analyzing situations and resolving issues.', 'NOTE:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experienced supporting a production application, including deployments, troubleshooting, and tuning and are able to design small systems or parts of larger systems', 'About the Software Engineer Role:', 'NOTE: U.S. Citizens and all those authorized to work for any employer in the U.S. are encouraged to apply. We are unable to provide sponsorship at this time.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0We’ll provide all the resources you need to do your best work.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong analytical skills. Able to understand business problems.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Our tech stack is cutting-edge and cloud-native. We use modern languages like Java 13, Clojure and JavaScript (Node.JS, React, React Native). We build REST-based micro-services on top of SQL and NoSQL databases, running in Docker containers orchestrated by Kubernetes.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0We know how to have fun and work toward something bigger than ourselves.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Must be proficient with SSCS, preferably Git.', 'Digital transformation has accelerated, and is progressing the way constituents interact. This impacts goods, services, and our relationship with the government. Convenient, fast, personalized, and relevant is the expectation every time. Both governments and their people are living with sub-optimal solutions that serve anything but the greater good. It drives a deeper wedge between a government and its people, forcing agencies to continually underdeliver on their promise.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience working for a major internet company and knowledge of e-commerce sites is a huge plus', 'It’s time for something new in government… finally. With PayIt, unnecessary foot traffic decreases and digital engagement increases. Complaints become compliments. Citizens become and are treated like customers. Join us in a world where the promise of ‘government of the people, by the people, for the people’ is fulfilled. ', 'To all recruitment agencies: PayIt does not accept agency resumes. Please do not forward resumes to our careers’ alias, PayIt employees or any other company location. PayIt is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with Lucidchart, Draw.io or a similar tool, MS Word, MS Excel', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Our most important resource is our people. We value your feedback and have created a unique environment where collaboration and bottom-up feedback about the problems we are solving is critical to our daily success.\xa0', ' Instagram.', 'To all recruitment agencies: ']

['', '- Ability to implement automated testing into your code', "WHAT YOU'LL DO:", '- 4+ years of experience shipping software in a professional team setting', '\xa0- Competitive salary, equity and perks', "- Passion for writing well-architected, readable code that's easy to maintain by a team of developers", '- Cool, fun, friendly, people that love what we do', '- Design, build and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable Ruby code', '- Implement code review and continuous integration from a bottom-up approach with other developers', 'Your work will have a direct impact on our very fast-growing community and will be seen and used by millions of people around the world.', 'Every day, tens of thousands of filmmakers, writers and artists use FilmFreeway to discover, submit their work, and get tickets to over 810000 film festivals and creative contests all over the world.', '- You are available full-time, live in Las Vegas or are willing to relocate. This is NOT a remote position.\xa0', '- Understanding of fundamental design principles behind a scalable application', '- Experience with relational databases (e.g. MySQL, PostgreSQL)', 'Thank you and we look forward to hearing from you!', 'YOU SHOULD HAVE:', '- We value the creative process and our employees’ ideas and opinions. Input is always encouraged. We want to work with people who are driven, creative and excited to continue building the best product of its kind on the planet.', '- Identify bottlenecks and bugs and devise solutions to these problems\xa0', '- Experience using Linux-based operating systems and comfortable using command-line tools', 'WHY FILMFREEWAY?', '- Ability to create database schemas that represent and support business processes', '- Establish processes for ensuring maintainability of new code and bringing old code into new standards via refactor and replacement', '- Office stocked with fresh, organic coffee, Red Bull, juice, and an awesome snack selection', '- Good understanding of object-oriented programming & server-side templating languages\xa0', '- Integrate high levels of automated test coverage into workflows', '- Excellent health, dental and vision insurance', 'We are looking for a passionate engineer to help us take our company to the next level and continue to build and optimize the best user-focused product of its kind.', 'TO APPLY:', 'FilmFreeway is the world’s leading film festival marketplace and one the most influential companies in independent film, trusted by brands including HBO, The Oscars®, ESPN, NBC-Universal, Lionsgate, PBS, NPR, the Sundance Film Festival and more.\xa0', '- A comfortable and enjoyable work environment. We work hard but also take time to enjoy life outside of the office. Balance is important to us.', '- A knack for troubleshooting & resolving technical issues in development and production', '- Have a passion for staying up-to-date with current technologies in web development', '- Generous paid vacation policy (PTO) and paid holidays', 'Apply via LinkedIn or send us a quick intro email (jobs@filmfreeway.com) which includes your resume, relevant links to work (github), and your contact information.', '- A degree in Computer Science or similar field of study is preferred, but not required', '- Continuously monitor and improve our existing solutions to optimize performance and provide a seamless user experience', '- Collaborate with designers and product developers to conceptualize and build new features end-to-end']

['', ' Work with a wide range of internal customers, including computational linguists, machine learning engineers, and research scientists. ', ' Has experience with system design and building internal tools. ', '  Build a machine learning platform to accelerate the development of ML solutions across the company.   Work with a wide range of internal customers, including computational linguists, machine learning engineers, and research scientists.   Collaborate with people building user-facing features that rely on machine learning to understand the challenges and bottlenecks in the process.   Produce system architectures and designs that balance the needs of multiple constituencies and make core scenarios seamless.   Enable researchers to translate models they create into systems operating at scale.   Help make Grammarly’s diverse array of machine learning systems more maintainable by providing a common set of infrastructure, orchestration, and monitoring. job_text: ['', 'Responsibilities', ' Additional familiarity with fundraising database applications, especially Advance, highly desirable.   Ability to conceptualize and develop proactive approaches to support organizational goals, including sophisticated constituent database queries, preferred.  Knowledge of common practices in the fields of alumni relations and development, including a familiarity with advanced predictive analytics related to donor engagement, cultivation, and retention, preferred.   Knowledge of integrated marketing and CRM disciplines including segmentation, targeting, direct marketing and customer care is highly desirable.  Excellent oral and interpersonal skills and strong project management and problem-solving skills. Ability to work both independently and as part of a team in a demanding environment. ', ' Ability to work efficiently in a virtual environment with off-site colleagues.  The successful candidate must be a strategic thinker, effective in moving strategic agendas, politically savvy, flexible in nature, and have a sound judgment with a collaborative style that fosters teamwork and cooperation beyond the immediate team to the broader organization. Must have a passion for excellent customer service, commitment to exceptional quality, and an ability to inspire colleagues toward accomplishing common objectives and goals.', ' Knowledge of common practices in the fields of alumni relations and development, including a familiarity with advanced predictive analytics related to donor engagement, cultivation, and retention, preferred. ', ' Lead development of professional quality business intelligence, data visualization and analytics content in support of broader strategic priorities (e.g., omni-channel digital marketing campaigns and communications, engagement and fundraising KPIs) within OAD, primarily using Microsoft Power BI and data modeling via advanced PL/SQL.   Standardize and simplify I&A products and resources, including standard metrics and model outputs, to promote shared data understanding and ease comprehension across OAD.  Co-lead the design, enhancement, and maintenance of high-quality data architectures that align with business requirements and improve data reliability, efficiency, and quality. Partner with AFP and DMI to optimize marketing-related dataflows.  Utilize database query and scripting languages (such as PL/SQL) to create data extracts and establish datasets from OAD data sources for use in content delivered to end users.   Maintain proficiency in industry standard reporting and data delivery practices and software tools through self-guided learning, training, coursework, conference attendance, etc.  Other duties as assigned.', 'Preferred Qualifications', ' Lead development of professional quality business intelligence, data visualization and analytics content in support of broader strategic priorities (e.g., omni-channel digital marketing campaigns and communications, engagement and fundraising KPIs) within OAD, primarily using Microsoft Power BI and data modeling via advanced PL/SQL. ', ' Excellent oral and interpersonal skills and strong project management and problem-solving skills. Ability to work both independently and as part of a team in a demanding environment. ', ' Utilize database query and scripting languages (such as PL/SQL) to create data extracts and establish datasets from OAD data sources for use in content delivered to end users. ', 'Minimum Qualifications', ' Maintain proficiency in industry standard reporting and data delivery practices and software tools through self-guided learning, training, coursework, conference attendance, etc.', ' Ability to conceptualize and develop proactive approaches to support organizational goals, including sophisticated constituent database queries, preferred.', ' Standardize and simplify I&A products and resources, including standard metrics and model outputs, to promote shared data understanding and ease comprehension across OAD.', ' Ability to work efficiently in a virtual environment with off-site colleagues.', ' Knowledge of integrated marketing and CRM disciplines including segmentation, targeting, direct marketing and customer care is highly desirable.', ' Additional familiarity with fundraising database applications, especially Advance, highly desirable. ', ' Co-lead the design, enhancement, and maintenance of high-quality data architectures that align with business requirements and improve data reliability, efficiency, and quality. Partner with AFP and DMI to optimize marketing-related dataflows.', 'Other Requirements', ' The successful candidate must be a strategic thinker, effective in moving strategic agendas, politically savvy, flexible in nature, and have a sound judgment with a collaborative style that fosters teamwork and cooperation beyond the immediate team to the broader organization. Must have a passion for excellent customer service, commitment to exceptional quality, and an ability to inspire colleagues toward accomplishing common objectives and goals.', ' Other duties as assigned.']
