['', 'Able to reliably estimate and complete assignments with a minimum of oversight, but able to take direction as necessary.', "Never take risk in the market: We are not a hedge fund, we''re not a brokerage, and we never trade on our own behalf. By avoiding taking any side in financial transactions we are able to remain independent, impartial, and focused solely on making the best possible product for our customers.", 'Significant and demonstrably strong C++ development experience.', 'As part of a small international team of very senior developers you will be expected to help develop, enhance, and maintain of every aspect of the company’s technology suite. Your software will be held to a very high standard of efficiency, reliability, clarity, and usability by the development team and our customers.', 'A positive, team-oriented attitude. Our team has exceptional productivity and high employee morale because we respect one another and work well together.', 'Operate with integrity: Our products are designed to be uncompromisingly fair and transparent both to our clients as well as their customers.', 'Duties', 'Job Purpose', 'Never compromise on quality: We hire only the best people, giving them the best equipment and tools, so that we can build the highest performing, most stable, and best supported technology in the industry.', 'Must have legal authorization to work in the United States.', 'Job Requirements:', " Never compromise on quality: We hire only the best people, giving them the best equipment and tools, so that we can build the highest performing, most stable, and best supported technology in the industry. Operate with integrity: Our products are designed to be uncompromisingly fair and transparent both to our clients as well as their customers. Never take risk in the market: We are not a hedge fund, we''re not a brokerage, and we never trade on our own behalf. By avoiding taking any side in financial transactions we are able to remain independent, impartial, and focused solely on making the best possible product for our customers. ", 'You will write software primarily in C++ with a focus on performance and reliability; you may use modern language features so long as they don’t hurt performance or readability. Occasionally you will need to develop and debug in C# and Typescript/JavaScript.', 'As needed, you will assist the operations team to efficiently diagnose and resolve issues that occur in production (e.g. forensic log and crash dump analysis, hotfix build generation).', ' Significant and demonstrably strong C++ development experience. Able to reliably estimate and complete assignments with a minimum of oversight, but able to take direction as necessary. A positive, team-oriented attitude. Our team has exceptional productivity and high employee morale because we respect one another and work well together. Must have legal authorization to work in the United States.', 'Other duties as assigned.', 'Frequently you will be expected to collaborate with the business, design, operations, and QA teams as needed to refine product designs and advise on technical design.', 'Requirements', ' As part of a small international team of very senior developers you will be expected to help develop, enhance, and maintain of every aspect of the company’s technology suite. Your software will be held to a very high standard of efficiency, reliability, clarity, and usability by the development team and our customers. You will write software primarily in C++ with a focus on performance and reliability; you may use modern language features so long as they don’t hurt performance or readability. Occasionally you will need to develop and debug in C# and Typescript/JavaScript. Frequently you will be expected to collaborate with the business, design, operations, and QA teams as needed to refine product designs and advise on technical design. As needed, you will assist the operations team to efficiently diagnose and resolve issues that occur in production (e.g. forensic log and crash dump analysis, hotfix build generation). Other duties as assigned. ']

['', 'You will work with curious, driven teammates to build sophisticated search and delivery tooling on top of a unique registry of small business profiles.\xa0You will collaborate with data scientists, product managers, and engineers–all of whom are eager to embrace change to improve. You will have a platform to influence our engineering and product landscape.', '\xa0', '·\xa0Gets excited when working as part of a motivated, collaborative team', '·\xa0Is driven to work with customers to have an impact on the real world', '·\xa0Engineers best-in-class model-driven search infrastructure at scale (we use Elastic)', 'As a core member of the team, you will share technical ownership of our search and delivery infrastructure with a team of motivated, product-minded individuals.', '·\xa0Prides themselves on writing highly readable, thoroughly tested code (we use Python)', 'The Role:', "Rapidly growing global data intelligence firm seeks Senior Software Engineer. The company builds world-class data infrastructure, developer-friendly APIs, and intelligent tools to automate trusted decisions about every business. They're focused on making B2B risk frictionless so that their customers can focus on growing their businesses and radically improving their products and experiences.", '·\xa0Designs creative solutions to reliably deliver data and insights to customers', 'Responsibilities:', '·\xa0Identifies problems that others aren’t seeing and makes sure they get solved', '·\xa0Solves problems with containers, cloud infrastructure and infrastructure as code (we use Docker, AWS and Terraform)', 'Apply now to learn more!', 'As a Senior Software Engineer, your mission is to create the infrastructure that connects users to our rich analytical tools and data insights. As we pursue our mission of providing customers with unique insights on small businesses, your work will be integral to seamlessly delivering these insights.\xa0']

job_title: Lead Software Engineer/Architect (Analytics Platform as a Service)
job_text: ['', 'You will be accountable for delivering both technical and business outcomes, partnering across engineering, product teams, and domains to see how our existing platform capabilities can be leveraged to deliver more values to both internal and external customers.\xa0\xa0', 'Responsibilities', 'Expertise and/or understanding in big data technologies and platforms.\xa0', 'Experience with hands on coding in SQL/Java/Python/Data Engineering, experience with Azure (or other Cloud)', ' Responsibilities', 'Preference - Only W2 candidates', 'To be great at our company, we find our team members have these things in common:\xa0', 'To be great at our company, we find our team members have these things in common:\xa0Gain energy from working in a fast-paced, creative environment\xa0Decision making that employs a blend of data-driven insights and intuition\xa0Ability to multitask and handle multiple projects concurrently\xa0Resilience and positivity, able to address setbacks and bounce back quickly\xa0Resourcefulness, discovering creative ways to get things done\xa0Joy in making an immediate and positive impact\xa0Diverse interests that are welcomed in and extend beyond our organization\xa0', 'Joy in making an immediate and positive impact\xa0', 'You will actively participate in the our wide architecture community to define, drive and champion architecture standards patterns and best practices. You will also advise local architects, product, SRE, engineering leads and quality engineers on the alignment of solution implementations to conform to evolving standards.\xa0\xa0', 'Exceptional analytical, strategic and critical thinking skills; management by numbers with demonstrable abilities in data-driven decision making.\xa0', 'Decision making that employs a blend of data-driven insights and intuition\xa0', 'Experience with Spark, Oracle/MS Sqlserver, synaps', 'Partner with engineering, operations and product management teams to evaluate cloud strategy with regard to\xa0highest performance, reliability, lowest costs and best strategic fit.\xa0\xa0', 'Resourcefulness, discovering creative ways to get things done\xa0', '\xa0The Platform Innovation and Engineering is seeking a passionate architect with extensive experience building and driving complex platforms and systems. You enjoy working with a strong, cross-functional, and cross-geography team of engineers and you are passionate in working with our business and engineers to build best in class systems. You love experimenting with new and emerging technologies. Job Description:Our client is looking for an individual with expertise in the broader area of operations research to help build algorithms at the intersection of merchandising operations and supply chain. As part of the Merchant Tech Data science team, you would be responsible for research and development of the algorithms that power our core areas like pricing, assortment optimization, replenishment, labor planning etc. We are looking for individuals who are passionate about optimization and want to apply their skill set in field of retail.You will have the opportunity to do your best work while unlocking vast business opportunity by extracting key insights, using pattern recognition to develop predictive analytics, and translating results into goal-oriented business actions. Each day, you will be presented with a variety of new challenges and interesting projects that tap your interests and strengths. This isn't analyst work; you'll be leveraging data science methods, including AI and machine learning in an incredibly dynamic and engaging environment.ResponsibilitiesYou'll make an impact by:", "You're an inquisitive, out-of-the box thinker who's continually on the lookout for opportunities to improve and innovate data science solutions", 'You have experience with Spark, Hive and TensorFlow etc.', 'You have publications in Journals (ordered by rank): OR, EJOR, ORL, IJOC, IJPR, POM, WSC or INFORMS conference papers', "You'll sweep us off our feet if", " Data science, machine learning, optimization models, Master's degree in Machine Learning, Computer Science, Information Technology, Operations Research, Statistics, Applied Mathematics, Econometrics, Successful completion of one or more assessments in Python, Spark, Scala, or R, Using open source frameworks (for example, scikit learn, tensorflow, torch) ", ' Advising on analysis and modeling techniques, selecting the best fit for structured & unstructured, complex data, and developing custom analytics models to generate insights that drive value for our customers and unlock competitive advantage for our organization Conducting exploratory analysis including hypothesis testing, statistical inference, and statistical analysis (predictive and/or prescriptive) Partnering with business and technical stakeholders to translate challenging retail business problems into state-of-the-art data science solutions  Developing processes and tools that monitor, analyze and continuously improve model performance and data accuracy Using your 4+ years of direct work experience in Operations Research or Industrial Engineering. Leveraging your PhD in Industrial Engineering, Operations Research or equivalent with thesis involving math modeling, Mixed Integer programming, Optimization (convex, non-convex) etc. Using your experience with one or more of optimization toolkits/libraries like Cplex, Gurobi, Open source solvers (CBC, GLPK) Being proficient with coding in one of the following languages (Python or C++) Having effective verbal and written communications skills. ['ISYS Technologies is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, protected Veteran status, or disability status.', 'While performing the duties of this job, the employee will regularly sit, walk, stand and climb stairs and steps. May require walking long distance from parking to work station. Occasionally, movement that requires twisting at the neck and/or trunk more than the average person, squatting/ stooping/kneeling, reaching above the head, and forward motion will be required. The employee will continuously be required to repeat the same hand, arm, or finger motion many times. Manual and finger dexterity are essential to this position. Specific vision abilities required by this job include close, distance, depth perception and telling differences among colors. The employee must be able to communicate through speech with clients and public. Hearing requirements include conversation in both quiet and noisy environments. Lifting may require floor to waist, waist to shoulder, or shoulder to overhead movement of up to 20 pounds. This position demands tolerance for various levels of mental stress.', 'YS Technologies delivers emerging technology solutions through our diverse and talented employees who are dedicated to our customers’ success. We empower our teams, contribute to our country and operate responsibly. We are a reputable award-winning WOSB providing Engineering and Enterprise Information Technology (EIT) services to the Federal government. \xa0Headquartered in Colorado, ISYS serves key national customers throughout the United States with a presence in more than 16 states. [' Provide technical leadership and drives best practices for code development, review, testing, and deployment that will ensure high quality releases to production. Leads and participates as a Principal Engineer within scrum team(s) to provide leadership, industry best practices and conformance to team development guidelines, standards, and best practices. Partners with the Product organization to understand platform requirements in order to develop architectures and select technologies and approaches that enable the product vision. Develop and contribute to code. Add comprehensive automated testing to ensure quality and development productivity. Help resolve production and customers issues and engineer long-term solutions through triage and root cause analysis and data analytics. Encourage and facilitate technical discussions, ensure deadlines are met and drive our product forward. Help mentor new and existing engineers. Hands-on development. Designing new solutions. Exploring new technologies. Other duties and projects as assigned. ', 'Qualifications', 'Responsibilities & Duties', '3+ years experience developing production SaaS systems leveraging serverless design patterns on AWS (toolsets include AWS Lambda, Serverless framework, AWS SAM, etc.)', '3+ years of proven experience building scalable REST endpoints. ', 'Exploring new technologies.', 'Understand modern design patterns and architectures.', 'Our engineering organization is predominately a fully remote organization with team members having flexibility to work wherever they are most productive. We prioritize outcomes over physical presence but provide opportunities throughout the year for remote team members to meet in person and collaborate to work on the bigger picture and develop meaningful connections across the organization. It is required that team members reside in the United States and are available between regular working hours defined as being between 10am and 3pm PST with occasional requirements for availability outside of these hours to accommodate customer and engineering-specific planning and operational needs.', ' Deep understanding and experience with Agile principles and practices. Strong skills in interpersonal relationships and team building. Excellent English communication skills. Ability to troubleshoot and resolve production issues. Able to write high quality code. Understand modern design patterns and architectures. Bring a positive attitude to the team and presents a professional and optimistic outlook. High level of accountability when working within a team, responding quickly to development obstacles. Experience designing, implementing, and supporting scalable cloud SaaS platforms.  Strong collaboration skills, learning, communicating, documenting, training, and empowering team members to succeed.  BS, BA or MS in Computer Science, Information Systems, or equivalent experience.  10+ years in full-lifecycle software engineering or equivalent. 5+ Years experience building SaaS platforms delivered on Amazon Web Services (AWS) 5+ years working with the NodeJS utilizing common design patterns and practices  3+ years experience developing production SaaS systems leveraging serverless design patterns on AWS (toolsets include AWS Lambda, Serverless framework, AWS SAM, etc.) 3+ Years experience developing web applications using ReactJS 5+ years professional experience with relational databases (e.g. AuroraDB, MySQL etc.) 5+ years professional experience with NOSQL databases (e.g. DocumentDB, MongoDB,?DynamoDB etc.) 5+ years developing software in an agile environment utilizing the Scrum framework. 3+ years experience developing leveraging containers and supporting technologies for the deployment and management of production systems (e.g. Docker, Amazon ECS, etc.)  3+ years of proven experience building scalable REST endpoints.  ', 'Previous experience working with or integrating with enterprise accounting systems.', '5+ Years experience building SaaS platforms delivered on Amazon Web Services (AWS)', '5+ years professional experience with NOSQL databases (e.g. DocumentDB, MongoDB,?DynamoDB etc.)', 'Ability to troubleshoot and resolve production issues.', 'Strong collaboration skills, learning, communicating, documenting, training, and empowering team members to succeed. Over the last 6 years, we haves grown at a very rapid pace, partnering with giants in the construction software space like Sage, PlanGrid, and AutoDesk. We are headquartered in San Diego with our home office located in the UTC area with team members located all across the United States. Our engineering organization is predominately a fully remote organization with team members having flexibility to work wherever they are most productive. We prioritize outcomes over physical presence but provide opportunities throughout the year for remote team members to meet in person and collaborate to work on the bigger picture and develop meaningful connections across the organization. ['', 'We deal with medical data and we take our work very seriously, but not ourselves. We’re committed to attracting good people who are passionate about the work they do.', '• Extract data from Client’s machines and restoring databases.', 'Qualifications', '• Programming experience required in any object oriented programming languages like C#, Java etc.', '• Be very proficient with SQL Server.', 'Interested applicants should submit a letter of interest with salary requirements and resume.', '• Working with Several Different Database Management Systems.', '• Excellent SQL skills, with experience in building and interpreting complex queries.', 'For more information on our company, visit www.ELLKAY.com.\xa0', 'ELLKAY', 'ELLKAY was founded over a decade ago on the values of innovation, efficiency, and service created in a collaborative work culture. As we have grown, we are proud to still possess the same energy and passion for what we do. We strive to provide exceptional customer experiences to our clients, which begins with first employing amazing people. ELLKAY is proud to maintain a high-quality, innovative, and diverse workforce.', '• A minimum 3 years of professional experience as SQL Developer or Data Engineer', 'ELLKAY LLC is a Smoke-Free Workplace.\xa0', '• Work with our clients Subject Matter Experts to obtain a greater understating of the business needs and goals.', "• A minimum of bachelor's or higher in Computer Science, Information Systems, or equivalent degree or strong industry experience.", '• Contribute to knowledge management activities and promote best practices for project execution.', '• Identify data elements from various database as requested by client.', 'This is a full-time, onsite position at our HQ\xa0located in Elmwood Park, NJ. Remote work may be\xa0available.\xa0', 'ELLKAY\xa0is a nationwide leader in healthcare connectivity, providing innovative, customizable solutions and unparalleled services for over a decade. We empower diagnostic laboratories, PM/EMR vendors, ACO and HIE companies, hospitals, and other healthcare organizations with cutting-edge technologies and solutions that improve their bottom lines.', '• Experience in database design and structure, with an emphasis on scalability.', 'AA/EOE.', '•\xa0Healthcare Domain knowledge preferred.', "Our 'Client-first' focus has made ELLKAY one of the most respected healthcare IT companies in the nation. We value our clients and believe that strong relationships are the foundation for a strong company, and we're dedicated to providing connectivity to the healthcare industry.", '• Experience in HL7,CCDA preferred.', 'Job Description', '\ufeffAdditional information', '• A strong desire to develop new and innovative ways to improve our data storage and processing.', '• A minimum 5 years of professional experience in information technology.', '• Strong SQL skills (SQL Server, Oracle, MySQL, Postgres etc.).', '• Prepare and perform data analysis and transformations to align data to business rules.', 'Nice-to-Haves:']

['', 'Access to well-being tools, resources, and freebies', 'As a Software Engineer on the Messaging Platform team, you will build and manage services that scale to support millions of customers, across a wide range of devices and surfaces. You will need to orchestrate messages across multiple notification platforms and messaging providers, as well as support the multiple products and brands available at HBO. Your services are expected to drive improvements in customer engagement and churn reduction. You will also partner with our data and experimentation platform teams, to ensure that we have the ability to send messages to custom segments and test different experiences among multiple groups, to see which works the best.', ':', 'Be passionate about software engineering with a strong sense of ownership for the code that you and your team write', 'The Essentials', 'HBO Max is the future of entertainment and storytelling', 'Build and support a message orchestration platform that allows product and marketing teams to reach customers across a wide range of surfaces (email, mobile devices, connected TVs, etc.)Have a deep understanding of software data structures and algorithmsBe a self-starter that can independently solve complex engineering problemsMaintain high quality coding standards for yourself and your teamDesign and deliver components of a complex architecture or distributed systemBe passionate about software engineering with a strong sense of ownership for the code that you and your team writeSeek self-improvement and are adaptable to suggestions and feedbackHold yourself and your team to high standards while maintaining friendly, respectful relationships', 'Paid time off every year to volunteer', 'The Perks', 'Warner Media, LLC and its subsidiaries are equal opportunity employers. Qualified candidates will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, mental or physical disability, and genetic information, marital status, citizenship status, military status, protected veteran status or any other category protected by law.', 'Build and support a message orchestration platform that allows product and marketing teams to reach customers across a wide range of surfaces (email, mobile devices, connected TVs, etc.)', 'BS degree in Computer Science, or a related field with 2+ years of relevant experience', 'Experience with messaging and notification APIs (Firebase, APNs)Experience with customer relationship management platforms (Braze)Full-stack industry experience, or hands-on familiarity with both client and server technologySuccess in delivering and operating reliable low-latency, services operating in a 24x7 environment', 'WarnerMedia’s streaming entertainment offering, HBO Max launched in May 2020 and is the culmination of some of the most innovative new technology and greatest creative talent in the industry. Anchored by the entire HBO service, arguably the greatest brand in television, HBO Max also features fan favorites from the WarnerMedia library including Warner Bros., New Line, DC, CNN, TNT, TBS, truTV, Turner Classic Movies, Cartoon Network, Adult Swim, Crunchyroll, Rooster Teeth, Looney Tunes, and more. HBO Max is home to key third-party library acquisitions such as Friends, South Park and Doctor Who, and more than 50 exclusive Originals in its first year, from the likes of groundbreaking creative talent such as J.J. Abrams, Ridley Scott, Jordan Peele, Steven Soderbergh, Michael Mann, Mindy Kaling, Reese Witherspoon, Anna Kendrick, Greg Berlanti, Melissa McCarthy, Robert Zemeckis and other visionaries. Find out more information at HBOMax.com.', 'The Nice to Haves', 'The Job', 'Seek self-improvement and are adaptable to suggestions and feedback', '2+ years of professional development experience using languages such as Java, C, C++, C#, Javascript, Typescript, Golang', '\xa0', 'Part of the WarnerMedia family of powerhouse brands', 'The Daily', 'Full-stack industry experience, or hands-on familiarity with both client and server technology', 'Warner Media, LLC and its subsidiaries are equal opportunity employers.\xa0Qualified candidates will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, mental or physical disability, and genetic information, marital status, citizenship status, military status, protected veteran status or any other category protected by law.', 'Have a deep understanding of software data structures and algorithms', 'Be a self-starter that can independently solve complex engineering problems', 'Maintain high quality coding standards for yourself and your team', 'Hold yourself and your team to high standards while maintaining friendly, respectful relationships', 'Experience with customer relationship management platforms (Braze)', 'We are the team responsible for the messaging platform of HBO Max. This platform is used to communicate with HBO members across the entire customer lifecycle, from acquisition, to onboarding, engagement, and retention. We enable our product and marketing teams to reach millions of our customers, notifying them about new shows, providing personalized content recommendations, and alerting when there are account issues. We leverage a variety of communication channels, such as push notifications and email, to reach customers wherever they prefer to be contacted.', 'WarnerMedia is a leading media and entertainment company that creates and distributes premium and popular content from a diverse array of talented storytellers and journalists to global audiences through its consumer brands including: HBO, HBO Now, HBO Max, Warner Bros., TNT, TBS, truTV, CNN, DC Entertainment, New Line, Cartoon Network, Adult Swim, Turner Classic Movies and others.', 'Business Unit Overview :', 'Success in delivering and operating reliable low-latency, services operating in a 24x7 environment', 'Design and deliver components of a complex architecture or distributed system', 'Exclusive WarnerMedia events and advance screeningsPaid time off every year to volunteerAccess to well-being tools, resources, and freebiesAccess to in-house learning and development resourcesPart of the WarnerMedia family of powerhouse brands', 'Experience with messaging and notification APIs (Firebase, APNs)', 'Exclusive WarnerMedia events and advance screenings', 'Access to in-house learning and development resources', 'BS degree in Computer Science, or a related field with 2+ years of relevant experience2+ years of professional development experience using languages such as Java, C, C++, C#, Javascript, Typescript, Golang\xa0']

job_title: Data engineer -Sagemaker Feature Store/Data Wrangler - remote
job_text: ['', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa05+ years working with Data Warehousing systems like Teradata/Vertica/Redshift including development of complex stored procedures', 'o\xa0\xa0\xa0Reinforcement Learning', 'Position Summary:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Cloud Migration Experience', 'not a data science position', 'Feature Management:', 'Please contact:', 'Duties and Responsibilities:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa03+ years of experience cloud experience (AWS certification highly preferred)', '732-203-6038', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Support for existing code base while it is being migrated from SQL to cloud based services', '●\xa0\xa0AWS Certification – Associate or Professional (Preferred) level', 'o\xa0\xa0\xa0Model Inference', 'The position will primarily be involved in helping the team automate feature engineering while supporting the legacy systems to the extent we can. The position may also require Operation Support/Troubleshooting as needed', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0ML Model Management: Enable Teams to seamlessly monitor, refactor, swap and retire models. This is largely a manual process at present that we envision will become more end-user driven or automated to some extent', 'renu.goel@comrise.com', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Creation of data /ML pipelines that use the services above for', 'This position is in the Enterprise Data Products (EDP) division of the Enterprise Data Office. There are multiple teams within EDP that deal with various aspects of creating world class data products such as the Market place, LDAX (Listener Data Exchange) that, along with Cloud tools from GCP and AWS, aim to supercharge knowledge discovery and process innovation . This position is in ML/AI Team within EDP. The goal of this team is to enable different divisions in to use ML/AI for their needs in a seamless manner that either amplifies revenue streams or surfaces issues using Machine Learning.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Architectural planning/ Development for Features as a Service (FaaS) that migrates the Legacy Dynamic SQL to an API Based Service that can be leveraged to create data feeds for Model training.', '●\xa0\xa05+ years of experience with data warehouse technical architectures, ETL/ ELT, reporting/analytic tools and, scripting.', '●\xa0\xa0Expert knowledge on various Data modeling techniques: OLTP (normalized), ODS, EDW (dimensional).', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0B.S., M.S. or Ph.D. degree in computer science or a related field or equivalent work experience.', 'CORE ML Capabilities Across various platforms ', 'This is more of a platform engineering role -- not a data science position ..\xa0The person will be working with Sagemaker Feature Store/Data Wrangler\xa0\xa0and not developing ML models .. ( although we may develop a few models - that is not the primary ask)\xa0--\xa0He/She will mainly migrating SQL based feature store to Sagemaker.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa05+ years of building and delivering working software through an iterative, agile process.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Documentation of all work on confluence pages in a business-friendly language along with technical design where needed.', '●\xa0\xa0SQL-based and NoSQL-based technologies.', 'Renu Goel', 'Technical Skills:', 'Minimum Qualifications:', ' automate feature engineering', 'Location_ NYC (Penn Plaza), DC\xa0- will start off remote.\xa0After office re-opens, will need to come in once a month', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0CORE ML Capabilities Across various platforms –We are building Platform using the Sagemaker SDK on AWS.\xa0We also support various legacy platforms including on-prem R and Python servers and a SAS environment which are all scheduled to retired. The end goal is to enable teams to easily train, validate and serve ML models for batch and real time scoring at scale.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa03+ years of demonstrated facility with ML problems and tools.', '●\xa0\xa0Python/PySpark\xa0- Expert user', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Feature Management: Providing ML feature management to efficiently engineer, share, discover, and access features for ML models. Products: Feature Store, Feature Engineering Tools. Most of this exists as dynamic SQL libraries developed over many years that will need to be translated into API based services that will leverage cloud compute service for creating features on-demand for model training and inference', 'This team supports the following functions:', 'ML Model Management: ']

', "W2 ONLY, NO VISA SPONSORSHIP We are the world's leading live streaming platform for gamers and the things we love. We make it possible to watch, play and chat with millions of other fans from around the world. We are looking for a Software/Data Engineer to join our team ASAP! Our Ad Prod team is looking to hire an experienced data engineer. This position is focused on empowering staff throughout our organization to use and trust our advertisement data for financial reports. Your responsibilities may range from maintaining and enhancing our data warehouse which acts as sources of truth across the company, driving data quality across product departments and teams, building self-service business intelligence infrastructure for reporting, and connecting into data interfaces that allow finance and other functions to discover and analyze the data. In the process, you will work with technical and non-technical staff members throughout the company.You Will Keep existing data sources fresh against data quality issues, design, develop and maintain data quality assurance framework and improve the processes for developing new ones raising the level of quality expected from our work.  Conduct unit, integration, and system tests on our data sources to validate data against source systems, and optimize performance to improve query speed and reduce cost.  Design, build and maintain a set of trusted data assets for a product or a group of products.  Act as our team’s thought leader for defining data telemetry, storage and ETL processes.  Partner with Analytics, Product and Engineering teams to understand data needs.  Write software code and data solutions that are high quality and comprehensible.  Have rigor around data architecture best practices:  Balance customer requirements with technology requirements.  Be proficient in a broad range of data design approaches.  Be judicious about introducing dependencies.  Create flexible data solutions without over-engineering.  Understand how to be efficient with resource usage (e.g., system hardware, data storage, query optimization, AWS infrastructure etc.)  Have knowledge of engineering and operational excellence best practices. Be able to make enhancements that improve data processes (e.g., data auditing solutions, management of manually maintained tables, automating, ad-hoc or manual operation steps). You Have 5+ years of experience in data engineering, software engineering, or other related roles.Preferably in the consumer internet or gaming space, or working with a high-velocity, high-growth product / business.  3+ years in relational database concepts with a solid knowledge of star schema, SQL, SQL Tuning, OLAP, Big Data technologies  3+ years of experience maintaining data pipelines from multiple data sources, in collaboration with diverse partners.  Experience with best practices for development including query optimization, version control, code reviews, and documentation.  Proficient in SQL -- comfortable working with complex joins, window functions and writing SQL for aggregations. Knowledge in data modeling, data warehousing, and ETL pipeline. Experience with designing and implementing Web API. Experience with AWS infrastructure is a plus. A good understanding of the characteristics of clickstream and consumer behavior data such as customer identification, timestamp management and tracking beacon design is a plus. Experience with one or more Web/Digital Analytics Tools (e.g. Adobe Analytics, Google Analytics etc.) and Tag Management System (e.g. Adobe DTM, Google Tag Manager) is preferred but not required. A Bachelor degree in computer science, mathematics or engineering is required. Advanced/Graduate degree is preferred. ', ' Architect, design and develop scalable data and analytics systems that capture consumer clickstream as well as other behavioral data from different touchpoints (e.g. web or mobile applications). Work collaboratively in different Agile/Scrum teams to build high-quality, scalable and reliable solutions. Collaborate across organization boundaries with product managers, data scientists, data analysts and marketers to develop data solutions that solve important customer problems. Apply a systematic approach to the design, development, delivery, maintenance and operation of our software services and offerings that will delight our customers and also real estate professionals. Work diligently and contribute to a fun, fast-paced, motivating, collaborative and rewarding environment. ', 'Skills & Experience', 'Work collaboratively in different Agile/Scrum teams to build high-quality, scalable and reliable solutions.', 'About Realtor.com', 'Knowledge in data modeling, data warehousing, and ETL pipeline.', 'A good understanding of the characteristics of clickstream and consumer behavior data such as customer identification, timestamp management and tracking beacon design is a plus.', 'Knowledge in database design including experience in SQL, and data modeling.', 'Work diligently and contribute to a fun, fast-paced, motivating, collaborative and rewarding environment.']

job_title: Sr. Data Analyst / Data Engineer – SQL / SSIS / PowerBI / Snowflake
job_text: ['', 'The role will be a split between traditional Data development, BI, and data project planning, and you will serve as a SME for Development and IT Departments. The role will require candidates to use SQL to query, scrub and validate data, and pull together key data points as requested by the business. Very strong SQL skills and a “data mindset” are required to be successful in this role.', 'Migration from On-Prem to SnowFlake HIGHLY DESIRED', 'Prior experience in Python', 'PREFERRED', 'Sr. Data Analyst / Data Engineer – SQL / SSIS / PowerBI / Snowflake', 'ABOUT THE POSITION', 'SnowFlake Cloud Platform', 'Salary:', 'Experience working with a star-schema data warehouse', 'PowerBI report building tools including online environment.', 'Salary:\xa0100k to 120k, plus excellent benefits. ', 'SnowFlake Cloud PlatformPrevious production experienceMigration from On-Prem to SnowFlake HIGHLY DESIREDPrior experience in Python', 'Delivering reporting or cloud-based data support', 'SQL / T-SQL', 'Previous production experience', 'PowerBI', 'GTN Technical Staffing is seeking a Sr. Data Analyst / Data Engineer for a Direct-Hire opportunity in Dallas, TX. We are looking for a Sr. Data Analyst / Data Engineer with a strong SQL, SSIS, and PowerBI background to contribute to a Data Analytics team. The Sr. Data Engineer will be responsible for SSIS and PowerBI development with over 40 TBs of data on SQL Server 2014. Our customer will be migrating to the Cloud (Snowflake) in 2021, and any previous experience with Cloud migrations or working with Snowflake for Data Analytics is highly desired.\xa0', 'DETAILS', 'Candidates must be able to create their own complex queries to query SQL Server 2014 databases.', '\xa0', 'Location:', 'Excellent communication skills and ability to engage with senior leaders and coworkers to design compelling dashboards that lead to actionable insights.', 'TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS', 'Data scrubbing, data cleansing, data validation', 'JIRA', 'Residency Requirements:\xa0', '5+ years in the following skill sets…', 'SQL / T-SQLCandidates must be able to create their own complex queries to query SQL Server 2014 databases.Data scrubbing, data cleansing, data validationExperience working with a star-schema data warehousePowerBIPowerBI report building tools including online environment.Delivering reporting or cloud-based data supportJIRAWorkflow management and project trackingExcellent communication skills and ability to engage with senior leaders and coworkers to design compelling dashboards that lead to actionable insights.', 'Residency Requirements:\xa0Only US Citizens and Green Card holders can be considered as the client is not offering sponsorship.', 'Workflow management and project tracking', 'Position Type:', 'Only Dallas/Fort Worth candidates can be considered. ', 'Position Type:\xa0Direct-Hire', 'Location:\xa0100% REMOTE until Q3\xa0of 2021, then onsite in Dallas afterwards. Only Dallas/Fort Worth candidates can be considered. ']

['·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Understanding of Software Architecture, Design, and Principles, including SOLID, SOA, EAI, ESB, EDA, DDD.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Treat performance and scalability as a feature.', 'BankMobile is reinventing banking by focusing on the unmet needs of millennial and underbanked consumers to provide frictionless and free banking with the full suite of financial products. We are building a disruptive multi-partner distribution model, known as “Bank as a Service”, that places our innovative bank products in natural account opening moments as part of multiple startup banking brands. Our banking experience is built with a customer-centric digital-first model and requires industrial-strength financial technologies and innovation.', 'Responsibilities:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Treat quality as “team owned”.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa05+ years of experience in C#/ASP.NET/.NET CORE/SQL Server.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Be an expert in and evangelist for simple, safe, and sustainable solutions to complex problems.', '\xa0\xa0', 'We are seeking a Software Engineer to join our growing team in Radnor, PA. We are looking for an additional team member at the mid-level\xa0who is looking to be a part of an innovative team while continuing to grow.\xa0\xa0\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with Agile/Scrum.', 'Qualifications:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with HTML/CSS/JavaScript.', '\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ensure that software architecture and design decisions are peer reviewed and can be traced back to overarching business objectives.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience building Multi-Tenant SaaS systems.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with Angular, or related web framework.', 'The candidate filling this role will be responsible for the product development of our core “Bank as a Service” (BaaS) platform. They will deliver innovative product capabilities, multi-tenant systems, and integrations with third-party systems.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with DevOps practices and modern CI/CD deployment models.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with Public Cloud computing (IaaS, PaaS, FaaS)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Document your work so that others can understand it.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with Xamarin, or related mobile framework.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Collaborate with a cross-functional team on features up and down the technology stack.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Relevant Bachelor’s degree, or equivalent combination of education and experience', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Identify and deliver improvements to the SDLC in general and the development experience, in particular, to ensure that the status quo is safe, high-quality, rapid releases.']

Should be proficient in Business Analysis, Business Knowledge, Software Engineering, Testing, Data Management, Architecture Knowledge and Technical Solution Design.', 'About Capgemini', 'Must Have', 'Schedule', 'Organization', ' Qualification: Minimum 5 years experience, Bachelor’s Degree.', 'Primary Location', 'Required Skills And Experience', ' Should be proficient in Business Analysis, Business Knowledge, Software Engineering, Testing, Data Management, Architecture Knowledge and Technical Solution Design.', 'Would Be a Plus', 'Job', ' Certification: Should have SE Level 1 and seeking level 2.']

['', '2+ years of experience mentoring junior data scientists or machine learning team.', 'Working virtually this year has helped us make quicker decisions, remove location barriers across our global team, be more flexible in our personal lives and spend less time commuting. \xa0Today, we are reimagining the tech workplace of the future by making a permanent transition to virtual work for most of our team. Of course, being together in person is an important part of our culture and shared success. We’ll collaborate in person at a regular cadence and with purpose. \xa0\xa0', 'Build advanced feature extraction algorithms that feed into various advertising applications, including audience targeting, relevance and ranking, measurement and optimization.', 'Build compelling data visualizations and interactive dashboards for monitoring and sharing business insights internally and externally.', 'You’ll make an impact by:\xa0', 'You have strong hands-on skills in sourcing, cleaning, manipulating, and analyzing large volumes of data using distributed computing platform.\xa0', "Option 1: Bachelors degree in Statistics, Economics, Analytics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Information Technology or related field and 4 years' experience in an analytics related field. ", 'Data science, machine learning, optimization models, PhD in Machine Learning, Computer Science, Information Technology, Operations Research, Statistics, Applied Mathematics, Econometrics, Successful completion of one or more assessments in Python, Spark, Scala, or R, Using open source frameworks (for example, scikit learn, tensorflow, torch)', 'We’re virtual\xa0', 'About Global Tech\xa0', 'Run large scale statistical A/B testing to evaluate performance of machine learning and statistical models in advertising applications which serve hundreds of millions of impressions per day.', 'Build machine learning and statistical models to predict or estimate key signals that are used to optimize advertising product performance.', 'You’re experienced with traditional as well as modern machine learning/statistical techniques, including Regression, Classification, Ensemble Methods, Deep Learning and Reinforcement Learning.', 'We are a highly motivated group of Big Data Geeks, Machine Learning Scientists and Applications Engineers, working in small agile group to solve sophisticated and high impact problems. We are building smart data systems that ingest, model, and analyze massive flow of data from online and offline user activity. We use cutting edge machine learning, data mining and optimization algorithms on ad relevance, ranking and campaign optimization.\xa0', "Option 3: 6 years' experience in an analytics or related field", 'You have experience in online advertising, recommender system, ranking, ecommerce or relevant areas.\xa0', '\xa0', 'You’re experienced with end-to-end modeling projects emerging from research efforts.', 'You have strong written and oral communication skills.', 'You’re experienced with traditional as well as modern machine learning/statistical techniques, including Regression, Classification, Ensemble Methods, Deep Learning and Reinforcement Learning.You have strong implementation experience with at least one programming language (Python preferred).\xa0You have strong hands-on skills in sourcing, cleaning, manipulating, and analyzing large volumes of data using distributed computing platform.\xa02+ years of experience mentoring junior data scientists or machine learning team.You have strong written and oral communication skills.You have a Ph.D. in a computational science with an emphasis in Machine Learning.\xa0You have experience in online advertising, recommender system, ranking, ecommerce or relevant areas.\xa0You’re experienced with end-to-end modeling projects emerging from research efforts.You have an excellent academic or industrial track record of proposing, conducting, and reporting results of original research, plus collaborative research with publications.\xa0', "What you'll do...", 'You have strong implementation experience with at least one programming language (Python preferred).\xa0', "Option 2: Masters degree in Statistics, Economics, Analytics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Information Technology or related field and 2 years' experience in an analytics related field. ", 'Research, design, and implement data models and cutting edge algorithms on high-dimensional, fast-moving, unstructured and structured data.', 'Minimum Qualifications...', 'Process complicated and large scale datasets using distributed computing platform, extract insights from data, predict future trends, and optimize towards business metrics.', 'Research, design, and implement data models and cutting edge algorithms on high-dimensional, fast-moving, unstructured and structured data.Process complicated and large scale datasets using distributed computing platform, extract insights from data, predict future trends, and optimize towards business metrics.Build advanced feature extraction algorithms that feed into various advertising applications, including audience targeting, relevance and ranking, measurement and optimization.Build machine learning and statistical models to predict or estimate key signals that are used to optimize advertising product performance.Run large scale statistical A/B testing to evaluate performance of machine learning and statistical models in advertising applications which serve hundreds of millions of impressions per day.Build compelling data visualizations and interactive dashboards for monitoring and sharing business insights internally and externally.', 'You’ll sweep us off our feet if:\xa0', 'You have a Ph.D. in a computational science with an emphasis in Machine Learning.\xa0', 'You have an excellent academic or industrial track record of proposing, conducting, and reporting results of original research, plus collaborative research with publications.\xa0', 'Imagine working in an environment where one line of code can make life easier for hundreds of millions of people and put a smile on their face. That’s what we do at Walmart Global Tech. We’re a team of 15,000+ software engineers, data scientists and service professionals within Walmart, the world’s largest retailer, delivering innovations that improve how our customers shop and empower our 2.2 million associates. To others, innovation looks like an app, service or some code, but Walmart has always been about people. People are why we innovate, and people power our innovations. Being human-led is our true disruption.\xa0', 'The mission of the Advertising Technology organization is to advance Walmart eCommerce by driving higher value for our customers and vendor partners. Walmart is investing in building a world class advertising platform and the Ads team is responsible for defining and performance advertising products that drive discovery, sales, and profits.', 'Preferred Qualifications...']

['', 'The desire to teach and mentor effectively, successfully facilitate teams and different personalities in training sessions, and to care deeply about his/her colleague’s growth, understanding, and experience.', 'Hold a bachelor’s degree (or its equivalent) in mathematics/statistics or a related field is required, and a Master or PhD is preferred', ' Ability to Deliver Results: A track record for being able to set a vision and strategy, organize and direct a team, and implement to meet and exceed expectations. Entrepreneurial Attitude: A proactive outlook that provides the chutzpah needed to overcome barriers, creatively problem solve, and test conventional thinking. Comfort with Ambiguity: A willingness and aptitude for spending time in and thriving with deep uncertainty and environments where there is no clear “right answer”. Passion for Innovation: A demonstrated interest and desire to participate in innovation through personal study, on-the-job initiative, or other endeavors. Positive Outlook: A desire to look past the objections in search of the opportunity. The desire to teach and mentor effectively, successfully facilitate teams and different personalities in training sessions, and to care deeply about his/her colleague’s growth, understanding, and experience. A need for speed; demonstrated ability to make decisions quickly and to act upon them. Alongside a team of entrepreneurial, high-performing, curious people, you’ll deliver breakthrough solutions to drive sustainable growth for Fortive. ', 'Ability to Deliver Results: A track record for being able to set a vision and strategy, organize and direct a team, and implement to meet and exceed expectations.', 'Positive Outlook: A desire to look past the objections in search of the opportunity.', 'Alongside a team of entrepreneurial, high-performing, curious people, you’ll deliver breakthrough solutions to drive sustainable growth for Fortive.', ' As a Data Scientist, you’ll drive execution and play a vital role in building a culture of innovation at Fortive. You will build, manage, and inspire alongside a multi-functional team, that solves for our toughest growth obstacles. Collaborate with cross-functional stakeholders to understand their business needs, formulate and complete end-to-end review that include: data gathering, review, scaled deliverables, recommendations and presentations to stakeholders. Contribute to a wide variety of research projects using statistical analysis and modeling. Develop and automate reports, iteratively build and prototype dashboards to provide insights at scale, solving for analytical needs. If building a data-driven app in a matter of hours or pushing the frontiers of AI or IoT sounds like your kind of thing, our Data Scientist role might right for you. ', 'Coding experience with Java, C++, Python, PHP or similar language.', 'These Are The Traits We Value', 'Fortive Corporation Overview', 'Strong written and verbal communication skills.', 'Experience with creating complex data sets (SQL), data modeling and reporting.', 'If building a data-driven app in a matter of hours or pushing the frontiers of AI or IoT sounds like your kind of thing, our Data Scientist role might right for you.', 'Experience in translating data results into business recommendations and business questions into an analysis framework.', 'About Us', 'Deep interest and aptitude in data, metrics, analysis and trends.', ' FOR000674', 'Contribute to a wide variety of research projects using statistical analysis and modeling.', 'Develop and automate reports, iteratively build and prototype dashboards to provide insights at scale, solving for analytical needs.', 'Work experience with an emphasis on quantitative research methods (Mathematics, Computer Science, Statistics, Economics or related fields). Experience in statistics and Machine Learning Models, working with statistical packages (R, SAS, Stata, MATLAB, etc.).', 'Excellent problem-solving capabilities and critical thinking skills, as well as the ability to work on your own.', ' Hold a bachelor’s degree (or its equivalent) in mathematics/statistics or a related field is required, and a Master or PhD is preferred Work experience with an emphasis on quantitative research methods (Mathematics, Computer Science, Statistics, Economics or related fields). Experience in statistics and Machine Learning Models, working with statistical packages (R, SAS, Stata, MATLAB, etc.). Experience in translating data results into business recommendations and business questions into an analysis framework. Experience with creating complex data sets (SQL), data modeling and reporting. Preferred Qualifications: Coding experience with Java, C++, Python, PHP or similar language. Deep interest and aptitude in data, metrics, analysis and trends. Applied knowledge of measurement, statistics and program evaluation. Distinctive reasoning skills and impeccable business judgment. Strong written and verbal communication skills. Excellent problem-solving capabilities and critical thinking skills, as well as the ability to work on your own. ', 'Collaborate with cross-functional stakeholders to understand their business needs, formulate and complete end-to-end review that include: data gathering, review, scaled deliverables, recommendations and presentations to stakeholders.', 'Applied knowledge of measurement, statistics and program evaluation.', 'Entrepreneurial Attitude: A proactive outlook that provides the chutzpah needed to overcome barriers, creatively problem solve, and test conventional thinking.', 'Comfort with Ambiguity: A willingness and aptitude for spending time in and thriving with deep uncertainty and environments where there is no clear “right answer”.', 'Passion for Innovation: A demonstrated interest and desire to participate in innovation through personal study, on-the-job initiative, or other endeavors.', 'A need for speed; demonstrated ability to make decisions quickly and to act upon them.', 'Distinctive reasoning skills and impeccable business judgment.', 'Preferred Qualifications:', 'As a Data Scientist, you’ll drive execution and play a vital role in building a culture of innovation at Fortive. ['', 'Lawrence Berkeley National Lab’s (LBNL) Joint Genome Institute (JGI) Division has an opening for a Data Scientist to join the team.\xa0', '\xa0Desired Qualifications:', 'Demonstrated ability to work independently and assist with the preparation of research data, trends, and information for presentations within the principal investigator’s lab.', 'Experience with advanced data analysis, including integrating data from multiple OMICS technologies for visualization and statistical analysis.', 'Demonstrated expertise in bioinformatics software usage and/or development to support molecular and synthetic biology efforts.', 'A minimum of 5 years of related experience with a Bachelor’s degree; or 3 years and a Masters’ degree; or equivalent experience.', 'Develop optimized workflows for large-scale computational prediction of biosynthetic gene clusters from a variety of inputs – draft and isolate genomes, metagenomes, from a variety of potential hosts (bacteria, plant, fungi).', 'Design, lead and conduct computational approaches for investigating the biosynthesis of novel secondary metabolites.\xa0', 'Develop and deploy advanced algorithms and benchmark existing algorithms. Deploy software and tools across multiple computing venues, including JGI’s internal computing systems, National Energy Research Scientific Computing (NERSC), Lawrence Berkeley National Lab (LBNL), and the cloud.', 'The Data Scientist will work in close partnerships across JGI to predict and validate secondary metabolite biosynthetic gene clusters that will allow us to refine our methods for biosynthetic pathway prediction and characterization. The successful candidate will also work with the Secondary Metabolites Group and with the Data Science & Informatics group (DSI) to develop and refine a new data portal for biosynthetic gene cluster analysis into a world-leading resource for the natural products’ scientific community.\xa0', 'Postdoctoral experience in the discovery, analysis, annotation, and prediction of chemical products of biosynthetic gene clusters, especially with large, public data sources.', 'Design, lead and conduct computational approaches for investigating the biosynthesis of novel secondary metabolites.\xa0Develop optimized workflows for large-scale computational prediction of biosynthetic gene clusters from a variety of inputs – draft and isolate genomes, metagenomes, from a variety of potential hosts (bacteria, plant, fungi).Participate in and help guide development of a new community-focused secondary metabolism data portal. Develop software for its data access and visualization and communicate with the data portal’s scientific user community.Develop and deploy advanced algorithms and benchmark existing algorithms. Deploy software and tools across multiple computing venues, including JGI’s internal computing systems, National Energy Research Scientific Computing (NERSC), Lawrence Berkeley National Lab (LBNL), and the cloud.Prepare results for publication and make presentations at seminars and scientific meetings. Contribute to scientific research papers and reports.Establish effective and productive collaborations with leading secondary metabolite researchers.Independently provide creative problem solving and work within a larger group of analysts/scientists to address and resolve challenges, questions, or issues.', 'Effective problem-solving, decision-making, organizational and analytical skills.', 'Desired Qualifications:', 'Demonstrated experience working in Unix, Python or other scripting languages, HTML, version control and continuous integration tools, containers, databases, open software and open science principles, and the capability to learn and adapt to new technologies.', 'A minimum of 5 years of related experience with a Bachelor’s degree; or 3 years and a Masters’ degree; or equivalent experience.Demonstrated experience and expertise in sequencing and functional genomic annotation.Demonstrated expertise in bioinformatics software usage and/or development to support molecular and synthetic biology efforts.Demonstrated experience working in Unix, Python or other scripting languages, HTML, version control and continuous integration tools, containers, databases, open software and open science principles, and the capability to learn and adapt to new technologies.Experience with advanced data analysis, including integrating data from multiple OMICS technologies for visualization and statistical analysis.Experience in preparing information for publications, presentations, seminars, and scientific meetings.', 'What is Required:', 'Demonstrated experience and expertise in sequencing and functional genomic annotation.', 'Expertise programming in Python, bash, and/or other scripting languages.', 'Establish effective and productive collaborations with leading secondary metabolite researchers.', 'Ph.D. in biochemistry, chemistry, computational biology, microbiology, or related field.Postdoctoral experience in the discovery, analysis, annotation, and prediction of chemical products of biosynthetic gene clusters, especially with large, public data sources.Demonstrated ability to conduct and perform individual and collaborative research and effectively interact with a broad/diverse range of colleagues with tact and diplomacy.Ability to design and oversee projects resulting from genomic analyses.Effective problem-solving, decision-making, organizational and analytical skills.Demonstrated ability to work independently and assist with the preparation of research data, trends, and information for presentations within the principal investigator’s lab.Knowledge of secondary metabolism biosynthesis.Expertise programming in Python, bash, and/or other scripting languages.', 'Participate in and help guide development of a new community-focused secondary metabolism data portal. Develop software for its data access and visualization and communicate with the data portal’s scientific user community.', 'Prepare results for publication and make presentations at seminars and scientific meetings. Contribute to scientific research papers and reports.', '\xa0', 'Experience in preparing information for publications, presentations, seminars, and scientific meetings.', 'Ability to design and oversee projects resulting from genomic analyses.', 'For more information and to apply: https://lbl.taleo.net/careersection/2/jobdetail.ftl?job=92177', 'Ph.D. in biochemistry, chemistry, computational biology, microbiology, or related field.', 'Knowledge of secondary metabolism biosynthesis.', 'What You Will Do:', 'Demonstrated ability to conduct and perform individual and collaborative research and effectively interact with a broad/diverse range of colleagues with tact and diplomacy.', 'Independently provide creative problem solving and work within a larger group of analysts/scientists to address and resolve challenges, questions, or issues.']

['', 'Responsibilities', 'Qualifications', ' Bachelors Degree in Operations Research, Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, Industrial Engineering, or related field from an accredited college or university with 1+ years of professional services experience  Professional knowledge of advanced analytical concepts, particularly ModSim (Modeling & Simulation), Optimization and Machine Learning;  Experience utilizing a strong mathematical background with advanced knowledge in one or more of the following fields: discrete optimization, integer programming (including commercial optimization solvers), discrete-event simulation, dynamic programming, local search heuristics, genetic algorithms, or other metaheuristics  Proficiency in programming languages (e.g. Python, R, C++, Julia), data analysis packages (e.g.scikit-learn, pyomo) as well as the ability to implement, maintain, debug and test; experience in commercial optimization solvers (e.g. CPLEX, Gurobi, Xpress)  Experience in software development using version control (Git), unit testing, Jira, and Confluence.  Ability to work with team members and clients to assess needs, provide assistance, and resolve problems, using excellent problem-solving skills, verbal/written communication, and the ability to present and explain technical concepts to business audiences  Professional experience with high proficiency in the use of Microsoft Office programs (Word, PowerPoint, Excel)  Active DoD Secret or DoD Top Secret (TS) clearance nice to have  Ability to travel up to 80% of the time; Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States without the need for visa sponsorship now or in the future ', ' Come up with innovative, repeatable, business use cases for real world optimization techniques, and quickly develop prototypes to test these use cases ', ' Bachelors Degree in Operations Research, Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, Industrial Engineering, or related field from an accredited college or university with 1+ years of professional services experience ', ' Experience utilizing a strong mathematical background with advanced knowledge in one or more of the following fields: discrete optimization, integer programming (including commercial optimization solvers), discrete-event simulation, dynamic programming, local search heuristics, genetic algorithms, or other metaheuristics ', ' Ability to travel up to 80% of the time; Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States without the need for visa sponsorship now or in the future ', ' Ability to work with team members and clients to assess needs, provide assistance, and resolve problems, using excellent problem-solving skills, verbal/written communication, and the ability to present and explain technical concepts to business audiences ', ' Apply various optimization techniques to generate solutions to large-scale optimization problems for KPMG clients, such as resource planning, scheduling, facility location, portfolio optimization, and pricing/revenue optimization. Techniques include but are not limited to linear/mixed-integer programming with commercial (e.g. CPLEX) as well as open-source solvers (e.g. CBC), dynamic programming, heuristics, metaheuristics, and more. job_title: Sr. Data Engineer - Prediction and Behavior Modeling
job_text: ['', 'Help translate algorithms into production-level code', 'We are looking to add a highly talented Prediction and Behavior Modeling Sr. Data Engineer to help us build probabilistic models of the future state of the world. As a software engineer, you will help design, measure, test, and visualize the performance of motion prediction models that we use to improve our interactions with cars, pedestrians, and other road users. Your software engineering and data analytics experience will inform your pragmatic approach to making a more intelligent autonomous vehicle. Does this sound like you?', 'Bonus points (not required):', 'Experience working with large data sets', 'Develop real-time visualizations of our estimates of the future state of the world', 'Dive into data to understand behaviors of external world actors such as cars, bikes, and pedestrians; leverage machine learning methods where appropriateHelp translate algorithms into production-level codeHelp implement and evaluate a variety of ML modelsDefine, implement, and visualize performance metricsDevelop real-time visualizations of our estimates of the future state of the world', 'Experience using common Machine Learning and Deep Learning algorithms (e.g., for classification, regression, and clustering)Experience developing autonomous vehicles or robotsExperience with C++', 'Fluency with Python, including standard scientific computing libraries', "What you'll be doing:", "What we're looking for:", 'Dive into data to understand behaviors of external world actors such as cars, bikes, and pedestrians; leverage machine learning methods where appropriate', 'Experience with C++', 'Help implement and evaluate a variety of ML models', 'Experience using modern software engineering tools (e.g., version control, CI)', 'BS in computer science, engineering, or applied math with 3+ years practical experience in data science, modeling, statistics, and analysis of large data setsFluency with Python, including standard scientific computing librariesExperience working with large data setsExperience using modern software engineering tools (e.g., version control, CI)', 'Experience using common Machine Learning and Deep Learning algorithms (e.g., for classification, regression, and clustering)', 'Experience developing autonomous vehicles or robots', 'The Motional global headquarters are located at 100 Northern Avenue in Boston, MA. Nestled in the busting Seaport district with sweeping views of Boston Harbor and downtown Boston, the offices are located close to major transit lines and a quick walk to various restaurants and popular attractions.', 'Define, implement, and visualize performance metrics', 'BS in computer science, engineering, or applied math with 3+ years practical experience in data science, modeling, statistics, and analysis of large data sets']

['', ' Demonstrate a commitment to support IEHP’s strategic priorities to become a 5-Star Health Plan and incorporate LEAN principles into daily work.', ' Works with and alongside business analysts by suggesting other products of interest to the client.', 'Working Conditions', ' Works with Institute stakeholders to identify the business requirements and the expected outcome.', ' Recommends ongoing improvements to methods and algorithms that lead to findings, including new information.', 'Knowledge Requirement', ' Support business operations, finance, quality systems, and other internal teams by building analytics and reporting to understand overall business performance and increase organizational efficiencies', 'Drivers License Required', 'Position Summary/Position', 'Abilities Requirement', ' Designs experiments, test hypotheses, and build models.', ' Build deep-dive analyses and eventually machine learning models to better forecast risk across the portfolio for our contracts and claims activity.', ' Work with data engineering and data solutions teams to ensure proper data tracking is set up for features and support debugging and development of new ETL processes.', ' Lead and drive cross functional data science projects from beginning to end: build relationships with partner teams, frame and structure questions, collect and analyze data. Apply descriptive and predictive analytics to help drive insights and business decisions. Apply a diverse set of tactics such as statistics, quantitative reasoning, and machine learning to research and produce insights. Work with data engineering and data solutions teams to ensure proper data tracking is set up for features and support debugging and development of new ETL processes. Build deep-dive analyses and eventually machine learning models to better forecast risk across the portfolio for our contracts and claims activity. Support business operations, finance, quality systems, and other internal teams by building analytics and reporting to understand overall business performance and increase organizational efficiencies Manage tests for specific provider and generate data to build out case studies and messaging strategies. Designs experiments, test hypotheses, and build models. Conducts data analysis and moderately complex algorithm. Works with Institute stakeholders to identify the business requirements and the expected outcome. Works with and alongside business analysts by suggesting other products of interest to the client. Models and frames business scenarios that are meaningful and which impact on critical business processes and/or decisions. Collaborates with Institute subject matter experts to select the relevant sources of information. Recommends ongoing improvements to methods and algorithms that lead to findings, including new information. Provides on-going tracking and monitoring of performance of decision systems and statistical models. Communicate analysis and decisions to high-level stakeholders and executives in verbal, visual, and written formats. Collaborate with business leaders, subject matter experts, and decision makers to develop success criteria and optimize new solutions, features, policies, and models. Demonstrate a commitment to support IEHP’s strategic priorities to become a 5-Star Health Plan and incorporate LEAN principles into daily work.', 'Starting Salary:', ' Collaborates with Institute subject matter experts to select the relevant sources of information.', ' Conducts data analysis and moderately complex algorithm.', 'Skills Requirement', ' Provides on-going tracking and monitoring of performance of decision systems and statistical models.', ' Apply a diverse set of tactics such as statistics, quantitative reasoning, and machine learning to research and produce insights.', 'Job Requisition ID:', 'Commitment to Team Culture', 'Preferred Education', ' Lead and drive cross functional data science projects from beginning to end: build relationships with partner teams, frame and structure questions, collect and analyze data.', 'Preferred Experience', 'Education Qualifications', 'Experience Qualifications', ' Apply descriptive and predictive analytics to help drive insights and business decisions.', 'Physical Requirements', ' Manage tests for specific provider and generate data to build out case studies and messaging strategies.', ' Models and frames business scenarios that are meaningful and which impact on critical business processes and/or decisions.', 'Major Functions (Duties And Responsibilities)', ' Communicate analysis and decisions to high-level stakeholders and executives in verbal, visual, and written formats.', ' Collaborate with business leaders, subject matter experts, and decision makers to develop success criteria and optimize new solutions, features, policies, and models.']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer - CV/ML and Data Intelligence
job_text: ['', 'The above information has been designed to indicate the general nature and level of work performed in the role. It is not designed to contain or be interpreted as a comprehensive inventory of all duties, responsibilities and qualifications required of employees assigned to this job. The full Job Description can be made available as part of the hiring process', 'About The Team', 'Demonstrated expertise in architecting and deploying solutions into production.', 'Outlined below are the required minimum qualifications for this position. If none are listed, there are no minimum qualifications. ', 'Engineering Or Related Field. Preferred Qualifications...', 'Experience with low-powered devices such as development boards: raspberry pi, Arduino, Coral, Jetson, etc. or mobile phones.', ' Encouraging the project teams that you oversee to work collaboratively and to aim for insight-driven outcomes.', 'Research latest industry trends in software, Computer Vision, Machine Learning, and Cloud Computing to enhance Sam’s Club technology resources and the experiences for both our associates and members.', 'Benefits & Perks', 'Experience working in small teams', ' You level up when you have the opportunity to teach others and empower those around you to excel.', ' You come to the table with a comprehensive knowledge of Robotics as well as modern AI Algorithms.', 'Research latest industry trends in software, Computer Vision, Machine Learning, and Cloud Computing to enhance Sam’s Club technology resources and the experiences for both our associates and members.Take a data driven approach and propose solutions that aim at achieving the best in industry performance and experiences.Apply machine learning, computer vision, and data fusion tools to tackle big data and create new insights that generate value for the company and its customers.Perform POC’s to evaluate and develop new technologies to solve high value issues that weren’t solvable before.', 'Apply machine learning, computer vision, and data fusion tools to tackle big data and create new insights that generate value for the company and its customers.', "Position Summary... What You'll Do...", '4+ years’ overall agile software development, preferably in one or more of the following areas: AR/VR, surveillance, inventory tracking, autonomous vehicles.2+years in cloud platform preferably in AzurePython, Java, and C++Experience with any and all of these frameworks/libraries: PyTorch, OpenCV, Keras, TensorFlow, Cuda, SciPy, NumPy, BoofCVExperience with low-powered devices such as development boards: raspberry pi, Arduino, Coral, Jetson, etc. or mobile phones.Experience working in small teams', 'Perform POC’s to evaluate and develop new technologies to solve high value issues that weren’t solvable before.', 'Who We Are', ' Effectively translating requirements into project parameters while working with agility from cradle to grave.', 'Experience with any and all of these frameworks/libraries: PyTorch, OpenCV, Keras, TensorFlow, Cuda, SciPy, NumPy, BoofCV', ' Your ability to rise above group think and see beyond the here and now is matched only by your intellectual curiosity.', '2+years in cloud platform preferably in Azure', ' You consider yourself to be a student of the world who thrives in an ever-changing environment that holds within it new challenges and chances to prove your expertise.', 'Python, Java, and C++', 'Your Qualifications', 'Minimum Qualifications...', 'What You’ll Do', 'Outlined below are the optional preferred qualifications for this position. If none are listed, there are no preferred qualifications. ', '4+ years’ overall agile software development, preferably in one or more of the following areas: AR/VR, surveillance, inventory tracking, autonomous vehicles.', '4+ years’ experience in Computer Vision and Machine Learning', 'Take a data driven approach and propose solutions that aim at achieving the best in industry performance and experiences.', ' Helping cross-functional teams to solve for business problems and develop solutions that enable us to redefine a “best-in-class” customer and associate experience.']

['', '• Strong experience in one of the Columnar and MPP database (Vertica, Teradata, Netezza, etc.) is a must-have', 'Our Customer is an American business and financial software company that develops and sells financial, accounting, and tax preparation software and related services for small businesses, accountants, and individuals. They are laser-focused on their customers, live and breathe innovation, and champion those who dare to dream. Their Mission is powering prosperity around the world. They do it by attracting the world’s top talent, bringing vital partners into their global platform, and leaving the world a better place through exceptional corporate citizenship.', '• Advanced experience in writing complex SQL, ETL batch processes, SQL tuning is a must have', '• Skilled in developing Software for Java (Spring & Springboot), Scala for spark streaming & spark applications, or other JVM based languages.', 'Commitment Level:', '• The ability to get code in to production', '• Helps to align to overall strategies and reconcile competing priorities across the organization.', 'Health Benefits: Medical, Dental, Vision, 401k, FSA, and Commuter Benefits program', '• Designing/developing schema definitions', 'Our customer is looking for a Software Engineer on a contract basis to support their ongoing business needs.', 'What You’ll Do:', 'Hours & Location:', 'Standard M-F, 40 hours/week. This role will be remote while COVID restrictions are in place. The expectation is to be onsite at our Customer’s Mountain View, CA location once it is deemed safe to do so.', '• Contribute to the design and architecture of projects across the data landscape.', '• Resolve defects/bugs during QA testing, pre-production, production, and post-release patches.', 'Commitment Level: 40 hours per week, 90% remote, contract through March 2022', '• Experience working with large data volumes', 'Company Industry:\xa0Technology', '• Experience with Agile Development, SCRUM, or Extreme Programming methodologies.', 'Must Haves:', 'Company Industry:', 'Opportunity:', 'Education:', '• Experience with Amazon web services: EC2, S3, and EMR (Elastic Map Reduce) or equivalent cloud computing approaches', '• Designing/developing ETL jobs across multiple big data platforms and tools including S3, EMR, Hive, Vertica', '• Advanced experience with scripting language – Python or Shell is a must have', '• 3-5 years’ experience developing DB schemas, creating ETLs, and familiar with Hadoop/MPP systems.', 'Now for the Perks!', '• Roughly 70-80% hands-on coding.', '• Designs and develops software applications. Performs coding, debugging, testing, and troubleshooting throughout the application development process.', '• Work cross-functionally with various Intuit teams: Product Management, Project Management, Data Architects, Data Scientists, Data Analysts, Software Engineers, and other Data Engineers.', '• Gathering functional requirements, developing technical specifications, and project & test planning.', '• BS/MS in computer science or equivalent work experience.', '• Strong expertise in Data Warehousing and analytic architecture', 'Opportunity: The Mom Project is helping to source candidates for the above client who is looking for a Software Engineer']
